I've only ever had one streaming issue and they fixed it by the next day. I would definitely recommend Netflix. It is my to go while on lockdown.

preview: Very much enjoy the new programs/series however it seems limited on some other shows. Selection is limited when it comes to new programming.
review: Very much enjoy the new programs/series however it seems limited on some other shows. Selection is limited when it comes to new programming.

review: Usually has great shows and original productions. Not good for new movies though. Selection is limited for first run movies. It is also extra for 4k. Do not think the 4k is worth the money. We use this service for most of our favorite tv shows.

review: We enjoy Netflix and variety of movies and their series. We like that we can watch it wherever we go. The quality of the movies and the convenience is amazing. One of our favorite series was The Last Kingdom.

review: Inexpensive and suitable for viewers of all ages. High streaming quality. Would recommend more options for shows. Would recommend multiple devices utilizing service at once. More options for Popular movies.

preview: All good but I do find the quality of the picture quite dark and I have a Sony 65” tv the latest model. The sound is very good and the menu to pick out your shows is easy to navigate through but keep up the good work. Cheers.
review: All good but I do find the quality of the picture quite dark and I have a Sony 65” tv the latest model. The sound is very good and the menu to pick out your shows is easy to navigate through but keep up the good work. Cheers.

preview: I've had a few issues over the years with Netflix, but nothing that wasn't resolvable. There is so much variety that I really never feel like there isn't something to watch. My only issue is that sometimes they don't get the new seasons very quickly and
review: I've had a few issues over the years with Netflix, but nothing that wasn't resolvable. There is so much variety that I really never feel like there isn't something to watch. My only issue is that sometimes they don't get the new seasons very quickly and I feel the need to rewatch just so I can keep up.

preview: Netflix has quite a few high quality original programs. I can usually find movies on here that I cannot find on Amazon Prime video. The one area where Amazon Prime video is superior, is in the choice of documentaries. Netflix also makes it easy to have m
review: Netflix has quite a few high quality original programs. I can usually find movies on here that I cannot find on Amazon Prime video. The one area where Amazon Prime video is superior, is in the choice of documentaries. Netflix also makes it easy to have multiple users in our household which is a real bonus in the last few months.

preview: I first started with Netflix years ago. Then I tried Hulu... which I rarely watch because the plan I have makes me watch commercials. The whole reason for going to streaming was to alleviate those commercials. Although not having commercials, I find I am
review: I first started with Netflix years ago. Then I tried Hulu... which I rarely watch because the plan I have makes me watch commercials. The whole reason for going to streaming was to alleviate those commercials. Although not having commercials, I find I am not going to the fridge as much and thus have lost weight... win/win. Also on Hulu, if you stop the program you are watching, you have to start over again and find the place where you ended. Very poor. I also am currently on Prime through a promo. I have not been impressed with Prime. But that may be my inability to travel around the Prime conglomerate. All to say is that I came back to Netflix and it has everything that I need or want at this point in time.

preview: It's affordable, I just wish the newer movies were offered sooner. There are movies that have been out for a year and still not available. I do like the way you can pick back up where you left off from a movie.
review: It's affordable, I just wish the newer movies were offered sooner. There are movies that have been out for a year and still not available. I do like the way you can pick back up where you left off from a movie.

preview: Netflix is very good overall. It adjusts the streaming quality automatically based on the download speed and bandwidth available, in real time. Selection is pretty good, but tends toward violence and gore - far too much blood and violence. Suggestions ar
review: Netflix is very good overall. It adjusts the streaming quality automatically based on the download speed and bandwidth available, in real time. Selection is pretty good, but tends toward violence and gore - far too much blood and violence. Suggestions are just OK. App is straightforward and easy to navigate. Uptime is quite good.

preview: I got Netflix for free via a T-Mobile promotion which was amazing! They are adding some more classics like "Back to the Future" now which is awesome. Normally, my only complaint is that there isn't enough variety. I do like how unaffiliated they are with
review: I got Netflix for free via a T-Mobile promotion which was amazing! They are adding some more classics like "Back to the Future" now which is awesome. Normally, my only complaint is that there isn't enough variety. I do like how unaffiliated they are with the "political correctness" nonsense (unlike YouTube and their messed up censorship) and that they give artists and comedians room to create when they are doing a Netflix series.

preview: I am not a Netflix customer. I have not applied for Netflix membership. However, my credit card has been charged a netflix membership fee. How did they find my credit card information? How can they charge without my permission? Is Turkey also gives you t
review: I am not a Netflix customer. I have not applied for Netflix membership. However, my credit card has been charged a netflix membership fee. How did they find my credit card information? How can they charge without my permission? Is Turkey also gives you the right to make unauthorized transactions? I want my money back and I'm going to complain Netflix legally.

preview: I and my husband are both in hospitality. Due to coronavirus, we are both furloughed. We had Netflix subscription complimentary due to signing up for Verizon internet. It expired by the time we got furloughed unfortunately. Until we start receiving some
review:
I and my husband are both in hospitality. Due to coronavirus, we are both furloughed. We had Netflix subscription complimentary due to signing up for Verizon internet. It expired by the time we got furloughed unfortunately. Until we start receiving some compensation from government, we asked netflix customer service to extend the complimentary period by one more month and then we would sign up with the monthly fee. They offered us that they could do $8.99 service which we know we can do that. It was more like an insult to us.
Read full review

preview: Up until recently stream would drop 4 or 5 times per hour starting around 9:00 PM then would take 30-45 seconds to come back up. This was obviously not great but you could put up with it just to watch some U.S. stuff. Recently Nextflix announced that the
review: Up until recently stream would drop 4 or 5 times per hour starting around 9:00 PM then would take 30-45 seconds to come back up. This was obviously not great but you could put up with it just to watch some U.S. stuff. Recently Nextflix announced that they would be reducing their bit rate in international markets, and now the stream drops every 2 or 3 minutes and takes around a minute to come back up. Unsure how they expect to keep any customers if they keep doing this. Standard cable TV over the same external pipes from the home here in Hungary continue to work just fine. So this appears to be strictly a Netflix issue.

preview: Ex The platform, Blood Father, Ozark and others listed as top 10 movies in the US. That kids can select. Multiple movies that is acceptable for kids. I expect more from a large company. I am interested in Disney account for kids now.
review: Ex The platform, Blood Father, Ozark and others listed as top 10 movies in the US. That kids can select. Multiple movies that is acceptable for kids. I expect more from a large company. I am interested in Disney account for kids now.

review: Netflix has a new show called Tiger King which is deceptive, misleading, and attempts to portray an attempted murderer in a favorable light while attacking a legitimate animal rescue. Apparently Netflix hates animal rescues.

preview: Netflix is everything it claims to be. I access it via AppleTV and it usually works magnificently. However occasionally it fails to function for a variety of reasons. "Error. Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later." During business hours thi
review:
Netflix is everything it claims to be. I access it via AppleTV and it usually works magnificently. However occasionally it fails to function for a variety of reasons. "Error. Sorry, something went wrong. Please try again later." During business hours this isn't a problem, you can contact them via chat or telephone and they are very helpful. But during later hours the chat is unavailable. "English chat is available from 11:00 AM - 11:00 PM EDT. ... Please call us or try again later." However, so far I've never gotten an answer, just messages describing reasons they aren't answering.
Read full review

preview: Just a few days ago my Netflix account was hacked and they changed the email address and password so I couldn't log in anymore. I called Netflix and the situation was (supposed to be) resolved. My account was restored. I changed my password and then adde
review:
Just a few days ago my Netflix account was hacked and they changed the email address and password so I couldn't log in anymore. I called Netflix and the situation was (supposed to be) resolved. My account was restored. I changed my password and then added my cell phone number for verification. They told me they never implemented two-step verification like other companies but that I would be ok moving forward.
Read full review

preview: I’m on a monthly subscription with Netflix and have been for some time, everything had been working fine right up until last night. I log on, well tried to log on only to find that Netflix has canceled my account without notifying me but continues to wit
review: I’m on a monthly subscription with Netflix and have been for some time, everything had been working fine right up until last night. I log on, well tried to log on only to find that Netflix has canceled my account without notifying me but continues to withdraw funds. I have tried contacting Netflix a few times last night and today by both web chat and phone call, they refuse to explain the situation if even talk to me. When did Netflix become fraudulent?

preview: I can't believe that in the 21st Century the Netflix service department that barely speaks English can't figure out how to repair access to a hacked account. They are incompetent nitwits and should be arrested for impersonating an entertainment company.
review: I can't believe that in the 21st Century the Netflix service department that barely speaks English can't figure out how to repair access to a hacked account. They are incompetent nitwits and should be arrested for impersonating an entertainment company. I cancelled my subscription and wouldn't use Netflix if it was last option on the planet. Netflix, you suck!

preview: I have subscribed Netflix two weeks ago and after two weeks, Netflix, without giving notice, cancelled my subscription. When I signed in when I was in another country, it asked me to renew my subscription - but with the fees of that country which is much
review: I have subscribed Netflix two weeks ago and after two weeks, Netflix, without giving notice, cancelled my subscription. When I signed in when I was in another country, it asked me to renew my subscription - but with the fees of that country which is much higher than my original subscription fee. When I contacted the customer service, they said they cannot give the details but they suspected fraud and they cancelled my subscription. But, they said, I can renew my subscription. First, if you suspected fraud, why you are now allowing me to resubscribe? Second, why you do not contact me in advance and I find it out myself after some days? Third, why do I have to subscribe paying much higher fees? Should I suspect a case of fraud myself instead of Netflix?

preview: Just like Mike in Louisville, I have been a long time Netflix 3-at-home DVD service customer. But in the last 2 months, it seems all my in-queue, released to the public DVDs (now over 20 at this writing) show either a "short wait" or "long wait". So I si
review: Just like Mike in Louisville, I have been a long time Netflix 3-at-home DVD service customer. But in the last 2 months, it seems all my in-queue, released to the public DVDs (now over 20 at this writing) show either a "short wait" or "long wait". So I sit waiting for many days with no DVD despite turning around their sent DVDs quickly. When I called to complain they say that the problem is "high demand" to which I countered that the real problem is "low supply". So my account (and Mike's) are obviously very profitable for Netflix because I pay full price and get 20% of what I pay for. With the $17.23/month I now pay Netflix, I can buy 3 streaming services each month that I now do not have. Sadly, I believe the corporate strategy for Netflix is to discourage the DVD service subscribers so they can eventually eliminate mailing DVDs and move everyone to the much more profitable streaming service. Once again, corporate greed wins the day.

preview: A few months ago I found out Netflix was charging my mother's bank and credit cards twice a month. I thought it was something that she did because she is always messing up her checking account since her stroke a couple of years ago. I fixed everything an
review: A few months ago I found out Netflix was charging my mother's bank and credit cards twice a month. I thought it was something that she did because she is always messing up her checking account since her stroke a couple of years ago. I fixed everything and then today I found that they were charging MY bank twice a month also. I called them and they couldn't explain yet again why I had 2 accounts and why I have been charged for 3 moths in a row. When I told them to credit me back and fix it they stated they could only credit one this month and that I would have to call my bank and dispute the charges for December and January. They are ripping people off and the sad part is I have been paying for something I don't even have time to use. I only signed up so my mom could watch at home. I cancelled my account with netflix completely and I would suggest all of you check your bank or credit card statements to see if they are screwing you too.

preview: I decided to get Netflix even though a lot of people I know say it's expensive and their customer service suck. (I guess I wanted to suffer as well.) Anyway I was billed twice $17.91 and then $17.28. I called and spoke with a manager who told me I was bi
review: I decided to get Netflix even though a lot of people I know say it's expensive and their customer service suck. (I guess I wanted to suffer as well.) Anyway I was billed twice $17.91 and then $17.28. I called and spoke with a manager who told me I was billed twice because my card was issued outside the USA so I made him aware it was not and I am also in the the USA, his respond was "oh." Oh! Really? Then he said, "Well it should be refunded back to your card within 48hours so sorry about that." It's been 3 weeks total now, I spoke again with another manager who claim he doesn't see the charge and in the entire company of Netflix, there is no manager there name Chris!! Long story short I was billed twice and I can't get my money back and canceled my service this morning after speaking with an outsourced buffoon who also told I can't get a refund.

preview: I have been using Netflix DVD mail service for over 10 years. I have always had their best plan, 3 DVD's out one time & I pay $14.99 per month plus sales tax. For years Netflix DVD worked great, however that is no longer the case & I'm about to cancel th
review:
I have been using Netflix DVD mail service for over 10 years. I have always had their best plan, 3 DVD's out one time & I pay $14.99 per month plus sales tax. For years Netflix DVD worked great, however that is no longer the case & I'm about to cancel the service. I have trouble getting any DVD's now. I always keep 20 to 35 movies in my Netflix Queue. For about one year nearly all of these movies are listed as "Short or Very Long Wait". Even though I have their best plan (3 DVD's at a time) Netflix is "Throttling" my movie shipments. Netflix is showing nearly all of my movies as some type of wait in order to lower my movie shipments, thus making my account more profitable for them. They are shipping about 40% fewer movies than I previously received.
Read full review

preview: I just resigned up with Netflix. I ordered the standard plan for 13.99. When I was paying and checking out, the site informed me that they were starting me on a Premium Plan for the first 30 days for the price of a standard plan. It didn’t give me the ch
review:
I just resigned up with Netflix. I ordered the standard plan for 13.99. When I was paying and checking out, the site informed me that they were starting me on a Premium Plan for the first 30 days for the price of a standard plan. It didn’t give me the choice to reject this offer. When I turned on Netflix on my smart tv it asked me if I wanted to upgrade to premium and I checked “No”. Then I received an email informing me that I was upgraded to Premium as per my request and that I was being billed 16.99.
Read full review

preview: If you have Netflix be careful cause they’ve been overcharging me for over a year now. I just thought they were increasing the cost of their service but they hadn’t increased their prices. They were upgrading my plan without my knowledge. They offered me
review: If you have Netflix be careful cause they’ve been overcharging me for over a year now. I just thought they were increasing the cost of their service but they hadn’t increased their prices. They were upgrading my plan without my knowledge. They offered me a $3 refund???? Overcharged now for a year and offered to give me $3???? I have been a long standing customer. When I called Netflix and complained I was offered $3. I asked to speak to a supervisor and she just chose not to speak to me and hung up in my face.

preview: I love (sarcasm) Netflix. I just paid $170 for a Gift Card that doesn't work (rendered invalid). Talked to their support, and they gave me 1 month free trial. What a slap in the face and utter disrespect towards their clients.
review: I love (sarcasm) Netflix. I just paid $170 for a Gift Card that doesn't work (rendered invalid). Talked to their support, and they gave me 1 month free trial. What a slap in the face and utter disrespect towards their clients.

preview: I decided to do a one month trial of Netflix dvd. Ordered a dvd which arrived damaged, sent it back and ordered another which came damaged as well. Because I didn't want to pay for an additional month, I canceled my subscription. The agent on the phone s
review: I decided to do a one month trial of Netflix dvd. Ordered a dvd which arrived damaged, sent it back and ordered another which came damaged as well. Because I didn't want to pay for an additional month, I canceled my subscription. The agent on the phone said that since I had canceled, there was nothing he could do do to extend the time. HUH? NOTHING? Not my bad that BOTH dvd disks were damaged. I have been in management and I know there is something they could have done, like extend the time for a wk. This is bad business. I will tell my friends not to join because of this bad experience. They should have something in place to compensate customers who receive damaged discs.

preview: I like Netflix but I’m getting to the point where I don’t want to use it anymore because Netflix cuts out scenes from movies and tv shows. With the TV show Friends, almost every episode has scenes cut out.. For example The One with All The Poker. The sce
review: I like Netflix but I’m getting to the point where I don’t want to use it anymore because Netflix cuts out scenes from movies and tv shows. With the TV show Friends, almost every episode has scenes cut out.. For example The One with All The Poker. The scene where the monkey keeps play “in the jungle” and Ross, Chandler and Joey start dancing. Ya that scene is gone and so many more. Watching Jack** 3 they cut out the part where Bam super glues his hand to Dunn’s beard and when Bam uses the solution to clean the glue off his hands and burns himself. That’s also gone. This should not be allowed.. We as customers pay to watch out our favourite shows and movies in full. Not to have stuff cut out for no reason.

preview: I signed up for a free trial yesterday, today I'm expected to pay. Their reason is because an account is linked to the IPS. That is retarded considering some people do rent out rooms. Upon looking at what they offer viewers everything is old and frankly
review: I signed up for a free trial yesterday, today I'm expected to pay. Their reason is because an account is linked to the IPS. That is retarded considering some people do rent out rooms. Upon looking at what they offer viewers everything is old and frankly can be seen elsewhere free (streaming). So I'll be canceling. A waste of $8.99. Stay clear of Netflix. They are not only greedy but not worth the cost for what they are offering viewers. Invest into a Roku (I have one and find it useful).

preview: I was charged 2 times a month since March 2017 (34 times) which I noticed only a week ago. When I called Netflix customer service, they acknowledge it being incorrect and duplicate charges and credited for last 6 months. However, they said that they cann
review: I was charged 2 times a month since March 2017 (34 times) which I noticed only a week ago. When I called Netflix customer service, they acknowledge it being incorrect and duplicate charges and credited for last 6 months. However, they said that they cannot credit for 28 duplicate charges which totals around $400. I talked to the multiple times and I was always told that they cannot give me credit despite of its incorrect and duplicate charges. I don't know where should I go to complain or to whom should I talk further to get my money back. This seems to be SCAM from them to get more money and if consumer doesn't catch it then it is their money.

preview: I have never had much success with the Customer Service Dept. at NF but haven’t needed them enough for it to be a reason to stop my service... until today. I noticed a charge for my service as I always do but this month I noticed another charge two days
review:
I have never had much success with the Customer Service Dept. at NF but haven’t needed them enough for it to be a reason to stop my service... until today. I noticed a charge for my service as I always do but this month I noticed another charge two days later for another 9.71 (basic subscription). I tried logging in using old email addresses to see if an old account somehow was still open but no luck. This prompted me to call to address the issue and make sure I cancelled the other account. I assumed it was likely my oversight so I wasn’t necessarily looking for any refund or anything but I wasn’t even able to get to that point before this rep changed my feelings about the company altogether.
Read full review

preview: I had a Netflix account until today through my cell phone provider. When the fee for Netflix increased, my provider passed that $2 on to me. That was annoying, but not enough to cancel. I did cancel today over personal issues I have with content. I conta
review:
I had a Netflix account until today through my cell phone provider. When the fee for Netflix increased, my provider passed that $2 on to me. That was annoying, but not enough to cancel. I did cancel today over personal issues I have with content. I contacted my cell provider, requested the cancelation and it was completed. I immediately went to the Netflix site, canceled via the site and then attempted to remove my financial information which hadn't been used in a few years (due to the cell provider picking up the tab). I wasn't able to remove it but I did receive the cancelation verification email.
Read full review

preview: Actions on my account without permission. They reset my password on their own - unacceptable! I want to decide what actions are taken on my account. I've tried them before, but in Poland, my main show was not available beyond season 6, while the 8th has
review: Actions on my account without permission. They reset my password on their own - unacceptable! I want to decide what actions are taken on my account. I've tried them before, but in Poland, my main show was not available beyond season 6, while the 8th has been already aired, so I resigned. I wanted to check it again and paid for it as no free trial is available for me any longer (understandable) and most likely, not at all in Poland (not understandable, why treat people differently in different countries). After this action, I think I will cancel before renewal.

preview: If I can put 0 stars I would. I Purchased a Netflix gift card months ago and tried to sign up today and they credited my card to another account. After over an hour on hold I was told I needed to send them a picture or my gift card and the receipt but si
review: If I can put 0 stars I would. I Purchased a Netflix gift card months ago and tried to sign up today and they credited my card to another account. After over an hour on hold I was told I needed to send them a picture or my gift card and the receipt but since I didn't save my receipt they won’t help me after keeping me on hold for over an hour. He told me it went on someone else account and proceeded to ask why I didn’t I use the card when I purchased it. That question shouldn’t be asked. It’s my business when I use something that I spend my money on. Netflix is unprofessional especially when they see it was their mess up. I will not be wasting my money on them ever again. And after all when I said I been very patiently waiting on hold for nothing they replied that they also was patient. This is unbelievable.

preview: Get Disney Plus or Hulu. Way better. Netflix not not worth the hassle!... NETFLIX SUCKS. IT'S NOT WORTH IT! DISNEYPLUS IS BETTER. HULU HAS WAY MORE MOVIES AND A NICER SELECTION OF SHOWS!
review: Get Disney Plus or Hulu. Way better. Netflix not not worth the hassle!... NETFLIX SUCKS. IT'S NOT WORTH IT! DISNEYPLUS IS BETTER. HULU HAS WAY MORE MOVIES AND A NICER SELECTION OF SHOWS!
