review: After being a faithful Netflix subscriber for more than a decade I canceled today both, streaming and disc subscriptions just because of the piece of trash 'The First Temptation of Christ' is. I invite all Christians, Catholics and people who think God should not be mocked to do the same. It is hard and will be hard to live without Netflix but I am sure we will find another option.

preview: Netflix security is a joke. I have never used the service on public Wifi, or shared my password, yet my account got hacked by someone in Russia. Netflix customer support was unable to help unless I gave them my credit card details over the phone, as this
review: Netflix security is a joke. I have never used the service on public Wifi, or shared my password, yet my account got hacked by someone in Russia. Netflix customer support was unable to help unless I gave them my credit card details over the phone, as this is the only way they have of identifying you. I didn't want to do this without speaking to my card issuer, so they cancelled my account. When I eventually got my password reset, I found that couldn't log in. I then found that they couldn't restart the account, even though it was cancelled through their mistake and, as I was abroad at the time, I could only do so in a foreign currency. The service is OK when it works, but it's not worth the hassle when something goes wrong. The internet is awash with others who've had their account hacked. Netflix need to get their act together and sort this out.

preview: Over the past two years, my husband and I have watched the choices of films available on Netflix getting more offensive and harmful to families and our culture in general. We began signing petitions when shows like “13 Reasons Why” caused such concern, s
review:
Over the past two years, my husband and I have watched the choices of films available on Netflix getting more offensive and harmful to families and our culture in general. We began signing petitions when shows like “13 Reasons Why” caused such concern, spiking a rise in suicide rates among youth. Then there was the filthy pornographic film featuring a 14 year old child, and again, we signed a petition along with thousands of other concerned and horrified parents/subscribers.
Read full review

preview: Netflix failed to notify customers that Google Play Payments were to be cancelled. On December 16, 2019 I received a notice from Google Play with less than 24 hours notice that my Netflix account would be cancelled! When I contacted Netflix the customer
review:
Netflix failed to notify customers that Google Play Payments were to be cancelled. On December 16, 2019 I received a notice from Google Play with less than 24 hours notice that my Netflix account would be cancelled! When I contacted Netflix the customer service rep told me to wait until AFTER the cancellation then just restart my subscription. After interrogating the customer service rep it was clear they were going to INCREASE my rate when I resubscribed. The CS rep failed to tell me I could simply change my payment method in my Netflix account (I found that out myself) even after being asked several times.
Read full review

preview: Beware if you cancel your Netflix subscription and someone other than you such as a child or wife click on the Netflix icon and don't understand how Netflix operates Netflix will Bill your credit card and restart the service. If you call Netflix about th
review: Beware if you cancel your Netflix subscription and someone other than you such as a child or wife click on the Netflix icon and don't understand how Netflix operates Netflix will Bill your credit card and restart the service. If you call Netflix about this they will not help, you will be charged for the service, even when you explain the situation. You will need to cancel again and pay for a month of the services you cancelled. I suggest removing the Netflix icon (link).

preview: My account for Netflix was hacked. I never received an email to inform me. I tried to sign in and it was obvious my account had been erased. So as a loyal customer I called the help line to see what had happen. After being a customer of 4+ years all they
review: My account for Netflix was hacked. I never received an email to inform me. I tried to sign in and it was obvious my account had been erased. So as a loyal customer I called the help line to see what had happen. After being a customer of 4+ years all they did was looked my account up through my credit card and changed my password. All of my saved movies were lost. As if I never existed. After all was said and done, they hung up on me because I wanted answers for my lost account. So all I can say is don't get hacked from Netflix because they will do nothing for you except reset your password.

preview: Netflix streaming service is fine, BUT the "Netflix DVD by mail" division is HORRID. I hope that a competing company will start running the same kind of service, even at similar or maybe a few bucks higher. Price isn't the problem. Netflix is stalling se
review: Netflix streaming service is fine, BUT the "Netflix DVD by mail" division is HORRID. I hope that a competing company will start running the same kind of service, even at similar or maybe a few bucks higher. Price isn't the problem. Netflix is stalling sending out new releases (that have been in my queue for months) when they become available and putting its customers on a "Wait List" for weeks.

preview: Bought a Xbox One at Gamestop and when I went to use the 30 day free trial without warning was charged the hold which I got back plus the monthly fee without warning. When I reached out to customer service the remark that was made was, "Why don't you ask
review: Bought a Xbox One at Gamestop and when I went to use the 30 day free trial without warning was charged the hold which I got back plus the monthly fee without warning. When I reached out to customer service the remark that was made was, "Why don't you ask the person who owns the xbox." Wow!

preview: While going over my Bank Accounts today I realized that both my husband and I had Netflix accounts and the company have been charging the same Credit card number for over six months now just days apart and when I reached out to them with this printed inf
review: While going over my Bank Accounts today I realized that both my husband and I had Netflix accounts and the company have been charging the same Credit card number for over six months now just days apart and when I reached out to them with this printed info. They actually denied me any of my money back knowing this was the same card and same home address and account! They would not offer to refund not one red coin or Dollar! Please BE WARE OF THIS COMPANY GREED! Just a Shame! We work to hard for our money! They only care about one thing WHICH DOES NOT INCLUDE YOU, ONLY YOUR BANK OR CREDIT CARD!

preview: Was charged twice on my account and called them to figure out why... They say I was never charged twice, but it shows in my account two charges! They told me to contact my bank because there’s nothing they can do. All they did was ask questions and tell
review: Was charged twice on my account and called them to figure out why... They say I was never charged twice, but it shows in my account two charges! They told me to contact my bank because there’s nothing they can do. All they did was ask questions and tell me that the card they charged isn’t the card on file.. Excuse me? Then why would my card be charged?!?!? I haven’t changed cards since I opened the account years ago! Mark, not sure what location he’s from. But he sucks. Along with another gentlemen I talked to, but I can’t remember his name. My Netflix has been cancelled and I’m out $35.

preview: Subtitles, there must be more subtitled rubbish on Netflix, when I look at a film I don't want have to read. If I did I'd buy a book, cheap movies, I will cancelling it as I'm just sick of it now, can't wait for the competition to come to the market and
review: Subtitles, there must be more subtitled rubbish on Netflix, when I look at a film I don't want have to read. If I did I'd buy a book, cheap movies, I will cancelling it as I'm just sick of it now, can't wait for the competition to come to the market and put Netflix out of business.

preview: My account was hacked into by someone on Morocco (according to the new sign-in email from Netflix). The person changed my password then changed the account email address. Neflix's policies and support on this were HORRENDOUS. The only way I could potenti
review:
My account was hacked into by someone on Morocco (according to the new sign-in email from Netflix). The person changed my password then changed the account email address. Neflix's policies and support on this were HORRENDOUS. The only way I could potentially access my account was to give the representative on the phone extremely sensitive payment information which I did not want to do after just getting hacked. He said the only other thing they could do was to cancel my account entirely and that I could then go to the website and sign up for a brand new account.
Read full review

preview: For the past 3 months, I’ve tried to cancelled my membership and they continue to charge my account. Today I finally called customer service to determine why I’m still being charged after they sent an email acknowledging my cancellation for the last 3 ti
review:
For the past 3 months, I’ve tried to cancelled my membership and they continue to charge my account. Today I finally called customer service to determine why I’m still being charged after they sent an email acknowledging my cancellation for the last 3 times. The customer agent basically just confirmed that my account is still being charged and they must have issues with their “agent” not being successfully cancel my account. I asked him how could that happen for the last 3 times? It should have been automatically cancel my membership once they sent the email and that there should not have been any “agent” manually canceling my account! He just apologized and did nothing else. I proceeded to ask if they do this often to their members and try to see if they can swindle more money from them if they don’t call to confirm. He said... "No."
Read full review

preview: Twice Netflix sent email asking me to return for free, which I assumed was free one month trial. Each time I got fooled, did all the steps only to be told I do not qualify. It is misleading and likely a ploy to get me to continue on even on finding it is
review: Twice Netflix sent email asking me to return for free, which I assumed was free one month trial. Each time I got fooled, did all the steps only to be told I do not qualify. It is misleading and likely a ploy to get me to continue on even on finding it is not free.

preview: Netflix sent me an email saying my 30 day free trial would end (in 2 days) yet I never received a verification of this program (which would have been charged through Xfinity after this "free trial"). Netflix told me to call Xfinity. The Xfinity recording
review: Netflix sent me an email saying my 30 day free trial would end (in 2 days) yet I never received a verification of this program (which would have been charged through Xfinity after this "free trial"). Netflix told me to call Xfinity. The Xfinity recording directed me to call Netflix regarding problems with their service/program. I waited on hold for 15 minutes to speak to a manager at Netflix (who I am fairly certain was not in a management role). The could see this "trial" was not accessed or utilized but did not even offer to actually implement this program. One Netflix employee actually suggested I create a new email account and sign up for another 30 day free trial. (Really?) I do not recommend Netflix and am pleased to note that there are other options to choose from for tv/movie services.

preview: After taking some time off from DVD-by-mail rental, I decided to open a new account with Netflix. During the initial "free" month, dvd's I sent back were immediately received and new discs were sent to me. Once the initial month ended, this stopped happe
review: After taking some time off from DVD-by-mail rental, I decided to open a new account with Netflix. During the initial "free" month, dvd's I sent back were immediately received and new discs were sent to me. Once the initial month ended, this stopped happening. Now, if I put a disc in the mail on Monday, they don't receive it 'til Wednesday. And movies shipped on Wednesday don't arrive 'til (at the earliest) Friday and sometimes longer. Don't believe me? Open an account. You'll find fast turnover at first, which quickly turns slow once you start paying. I guess they just want to get sued again.

preview: Terrible update. Movie Info attached to the movie cover swallows now the whole screen. Impossible to find anything. They never removed the scandalous and upset anticipatory sound. You never find "My List"...
review: Terrible update. Movie Info attached to the movie cover swallows now the whole screen. Impossible to find anything. They never removed the scandalous and upset anticipatory sound. You never find "My List"...

preview: I have tried for 3 days to update my payment info with Netflix. The company will not take my new card!! They are declining my card. This is a card I use everyday and have other bills paid in recurring payments! My bank has assured me my card is active an
review: I have tried for 3 days to update my payment info with Netflix. The company will not take my new card!! They are declining my card. This is a card I use everyday and have other bills paid in recurring payments! My bank has assured me my card is active and free of any holds! They are telling me I will have to buy a gift card each month to pay my bill! No way!! So disappointed I this company!

preview: I decided to return to Netflix today, mainly because their ad stated "FREE" watch for 30 days free. You will NOT be charged until the 30 days are up, so I went for it. It wasn't even 1 frig--ng min they had charged to my account the $12.99! I demanded it
review: I decided to return to Netflix today, mainly because their ad stated "FREE" watch for 30 days free. You will NOT be charged until the 30 days are up, so I went for it. It wasn't even 1 frig--ng min they had charged to my account the $12.99! I demanded it back before the end of the day and they totally ignored me. If I had known that I wouldn't have ordered it as I only keep so much in my checking and never take out money from my savings. I am telling you this is NOT a good company, they have no good business ethics! Beware of this company. I had the similar incident the last time I was with them. At 76+ I should have learned my lesson the first time. :) They say you're never too old to learn. :) I am now filing a complaint with the FTC and another complaint with the BBB. It is a pain to have to do this at my age but I must, I'm a 100% Disabled Veteran and I need to do it for my comrades also.

preview: Here we go Netflix. Not even 3 months have been since the 15.99 a month increase for 4K streaming happened and now I just received my bill and they have decided to add this month a .87 cent Florida tax and a .88 cent local CST extra tax to the bill. No p
review:
Here we go Netflix. Not even 3 months have been since the 15.99 a month increase for 4K streaming happened and now I just received my bill and they have decided to add this month a .87 cent Florida tax and a .88 cent local CST extra tax to the bill. No proper notice or reaching out to inform me. I was ok with the 15.99 at first because I can recognize that with all their original series and things offered still seemed fair. But I don’t appreciate surprise bills. They never happened before and now all of the sudden I’m getting charged for things I haven’t been notified about.
Read full review

preview: I pay $17 a month for this service because I can't afford cable TV, but this service ends up being removed from devices. I can't afford to go out and buy a new TV or Blue Ray when this happens. I like to watch the big screen in my living room, not on som
review: I pay $17 a month for this service because I can't afford cable TV, but this service ends up being removed from devices. I can't afford to go out and buy a new TV or Blue Ray when this happens. I like to watch the big screen in my living room, not on some hand held device that is difficult for someone with MS.

preview: I checked my credit card statements and noticed that I have been double billed for service to my home for the past 9 months. Customer service told me that I had 2 accounts open and refused return the overpayment.
review: I checked my credit card statements and noticed that I have been double billed for service to my home for the past 9 months. Customer service told me that I had 2 accounts open and refused return the overpayment.

preview: I was trying to subscribe to Netflix but they declined all my credit cards, PayPal and other methods of payment (that work everywhere else). Called and spoke with a customer service representative who did not resolve the problem.
review: I was trying to subscribe to Netflix but they declined all my credit cards, PayPal and other methods of payment (that work everywhere else). Called and spoke with a customer service representative who did not resolve the problem.

preview: A monthly service that is soooo dependent on postal service is bound to fail. I was lucky to get 3 videos/month, and this is after watching them IMMEDIATELY. Phone call to Netflix did not get a replacement of a "lost" order, and customer service basicall
review: A monthly service that is soooo dependent on postal service is bound to fail. I was lucky to get 3 videos/month, and this is after watching them IMMEDIATELY. Phone call to Netflix did not get a replacement of a "lost" order, and customer service basically said "tough luck." They have a lot of competition and more are coming!

preview: The advertisement of free trial is misleading and false. I previously had Netflix which I canceled 5 months ago. Once I saw the ad of free trial I clicked and entered my email address. Bear in mind I had looked for any tnc. There was no indication that i
review:
The advertisement of free trial is misleading and false. I previously had Netflix which I canceled 5 months ago. Once I saw the ad of free trial I clicked and entered my email address. Bear in mind I had looked for any tnc. There was no indication that it was only for first time user. I rejoined think it will be free for the first 30 days only to be surprised that I was charged.
Read full review

preview: I got billed for premium instead of standard, after contacting support they just reassured me that it will be okay in the future and according to them they can't do anything about their mistake. I even received 2 emails confirming that my plan is standar
review: I got billed for premium instead of standard, after contacting support they just reassured me that it will be okay in the future and according to them they can't do anything about their mistake. I even received 2 emails confirming that my plan is standard and that's what I will be billed for, seems like you can't trust the emails they send you.

preview: I have been a Netflix subscriber for over 10 years. I have a Netflix queue for DVDs which Netflix seems to ignore. For the last 1 and a half years I routinely receive the 5th or 6th DVD in my queue. If Netflix is that short of available DVDs then they sh
review: I have been a Netflix subscriber for over 10 years. I have a Netflix queue for DVDs which Netflix seems to ignore. For the last 1 and a half years I routinely receive the 5th or 6th DVD in my queue. If Netflix is that short of available DVDs then they should buy more. By the time I receive the desired DVD I can probably find it on demand on my TV. If Netflix wants to keep its DVD service then it should provide better service to its customers! AND.. not having an opportunity to contact Netflix on-line is ridiculous!

preview: Sometimes when I enter Netflix from Comcast it boots me back out again. Also, I have ordered many dvds by mail and it seems to take forever to get them. It seems like it used to be better. I get so impatient to get new movies that I often use Redbox inst
review: Sometimes when I enter Netflix from Comcast it boots me back out again. Also, I have ordered many dvds by mail and it seems to take forever to get them. It seems like it used to be better. I get so impatient to get new movies that I often use Redbox instead.

preview: I canceled my account 11/2018. New charges showed up on card 9/2019 10/2019. I tried to do a log in with my old email and it did not work. I looked up my account with the card that is currently being charged and it would not show me an email. I started a
review:
I canceled my account 11/2018. New charges showed up on card 9/2019 10/2019. I tried to do a log in with my old email and it did not work. I looked up my account with the card that is currently being charged and it would not show me an email. I started a conversation on the chat method on the website. They "changed the email back to mine", I asked them to just delete it, refund my money and tell me what email it was linked. The gentlemen Micheal told me via chat that he has no need to provide me that email, my card number was safe and he would only refund one month of the charge.
Read full review

preview: I originally used to love Netflix, but now as I have been traveling the US for nearly 4 months, my perspective has changed. The system crashes, doesn't remember where I was last viewing, and worst of all won't work properly which requires hour to multi h
review: I originally used to love Netflix, but now as I have been traveling the US for nearly 4 months, my perspective has changed. The system crashes, doesn't remember where I was last viewing, and worst of all won't work properly which requires hour to multi hour calls to customer service people who seem to not care. If I could give negative stars here I would based on wasted time and frustration. On the flip side, Hulu is now allowing download options, so now I don't have to deal with a company that doesn't value my time.

preview: Netflix is a great service. It has tons of great movies, tv shows, and also monthly new movies and tv shows. There are lots of very good series that you can watch which include comedies, dramas, horror movies. I really like it but I do wish they had not
review: Netflix is a great service. It has tons of great movies, tv shows, and also monthly new movies and tv shows. There are lots of very good series that you can watch which include comedies, dramas, horror movies. I really like it but I do wish they had not raised the price. When you're not working anymore and are on SS paying bills can get tight. But I can still afford it and really enjoy it.

preview: I like to watch various series and then all related ones too. Netflix has a wide variety so I have yet to run out of interesting things. Sometimes they don't have all the related series but on the other hand they seem to have more overall than any other
review: I like to watch various series and then all related ones too. Netflix has a wide variety so I have yet to run out of interesting things. Sometimes they don't have all the related series but on the other hand they seem to have more overall than any other service. Truly they are my go-to when I have an hour or so to kick back. And if I get bored with series or have the time, they have a wide range of movies too.

preview: Only sometimes, I'll watch a movie and quit halfway through and continue the next day and instead of starting, where I left off, but goes back to the beginning. (not a big issue). I am so not crazy about the series, as you get too hooked on them.
review: Only sometimes, I'll watch a movie and quit halfway through and continue the next day and instead of starting, where I left off, but goes back to the beginning. (not a big issue). I am so not crazy about the series, as you get too hooked on them.

preview: I called in Sept 2019 to ask about a charge for a second Netflix account. In that call the first level tech support blacklisted my card even though I in the next few minutes told him not to do so, that it may have been a family member making the charge.
review: I called in Sept 2019 to ask about a charge for a second Netflix account. In that call the first level tech support blacklisted my card even though I in the next few minutes told him not to do so, that it may have been a family member making the charge. Netflix's faulty accounting algorithm blacklisted my cc which has a perfect payment record for many years.

preview: When I called they said, "You started a streaming "just now" which is the only activity on the account for a year and because of that, we can't refund you!!!" I asked them what I was streaming and they said they can't tell me. It seems like the agent I c
review: When I called they said, "You started a streaming "just now" which is the only activity on the account for a year and because of that, we can't refund you!!!" I asked them what I was streaming and they said they can't tell me. It seems like the agent I called clicked to view something and because of that, "the system" wouldn't let me get a refund. Thieves.

preview: I like Netflix because of the movies they offer. I don't pay anything extra and I can keep the movies as long a I want. I use to have streaming with netflix but I stopped that because I wasn't using it that much and they were very cooperative they didn't
review: I like Netflix because of the movies they offer. I don't pay anything extra and I can keep the movies as long a I want. I use to have streaming with netflix but I stopped that because I wasn't using it that much and they were very cooperative they didn't try to stop me from canceling. I watch the DVDs on Sunday and Monday, I mail them on Tuesday they let me know on Wednesday that they received them and send out my next two movies and I get them on Thursday just in time for the weekend. I would recommend Netflix to my friends and family. I have no complaints.

preview: You can't always find the movies, etc. that want to rent but you can usually find something else. The variety, however, is pretty good and often on a Saturday evening if nothing is happening we'll rent from Netflix on our smart tv.
review: You can't always find the movies, etc. that want to rent but you can usually find something else. The variety, however, is pretty good and often on a Saturday evening if nothing is happening we'll rent from Netflix on our smart tv.

preview: I have enjoyed Netflix for more than a decade. I use both disc and streaming options. Their service has always been outstanding and their prices are right. I like a lot of their original offerings too. Their recommendations could be better, since "popula
review: I have enjoyed Netflix for more than a decade. I use both disc and streaming options. Their service has always been outstanding and their prices are right. I like a lot of their original offerings too. Their recommendations could be better, since "popularity" is rarely an indicator of whether I will like something.

preview: I have been a Netflix customer for over 10 years and the DVD service has gone from excellent to poor! We used to mail to a local center in the same state and would receive a replacement DVD in 2-3 days tops, now we wait about 3-5 days for them to receive
review:
I have been a Netflix customer for over 10 years and the DVD service has gone from excellent to poor! We used to mail to a local center in the same state and would receive a replacement DVD in 2-3 days tops, now we wait about 3-5 days for them to receive the DVD in another state and another 3-5 days to get the DVDs they mail out. On top of that, the first 20 items in my DVD queue have a short, long or very long wait, especially new releases. I have waited upwards of 6 months for a new release as it sat in the first slot of my queue, which is ridiculous.
Read full review

preview: Unless you have cable to access movies, Netflix has proven a winner with our family. Their list of outstanding movies, past and present, are always available, and at a reasonably low price. It sure beats spending $6-$10 bucks at the movie theater with al
review: Unless you have cable to access movies, Netflix has proven a winner with our family. Their list of outstanding movies, past and present, are always available, and at a reasonably low price. It sure beats spending $6-$10 bucks at the movie theater with all the cell phone conversations interfering with what at times are life-changing moments of the visions of the human race as they struggle and transcend crappy, heartbreaking stuff. It has also been a joy to view some outstanding foreign films plus the classics from Hollywood and documentaries. To know that we can always choose Gone with the Wind, ROSEBUD, CHINA TOWN, CLOSE ENCOUNTERS of the THIRD KIND, One flew over the CUCKOO'S NEST, TINKER TAILOR SOLDIER SPY, Being There, STAR MAN, on and on, as well as catching up on the latest films. Being a member of Netflix can't be beat.

preview: I had a bad experience with Netflix. I did register my credit card for a couple of months to watch movies over the mobile. I could not continue according to my business so that I terminated my Netflix account. The tricky part that Netflix could not allow
review: I had a bad experience with Netflix. I did register my credit card for a couple of months to watch movies over the mobile. I could not continue according to my business so that I terminated my Netflix account. The tricky part that Netflix could not allow you to remove the credit card. Furthermore, they don't advise you either the way to remove it which is only through the call centre. After the service has been stopped within two weeks I realised that someone hacked my account and watched the movies over the web portal. I tried to cancel the membership again as they returned back automatically and refund back the payment with no avail. The conclusion that Netflix is not secured so that I never recommend it at all.

preview: When I first joined Netflix DVD, the service was wonderful. When I mailed back a DVD I received another one from my Queue in 2-3 days. Now it's 6-7 days. They sometimes act like I don't have a queue and delay sending me another selection despite my lengt
review: When I first joined Netflix DVD, the service was wonderful. When I mailed back a DVD I received another one from my Queue in 2-3 days. Now it's 6-7 days. They sometimes act like I don't have a queue and delay sending me another selection despite my lengthy queue. When I request a TV show sometimes, they pretend they never heard of it, even when it's a current Netflix show. I have called several times to complain about this without satisfaction. Are they just trying to drive away their DVD customers?

preview: Always something to watch was able to ditch cable. Shows for adults and children keeps my grandchild occupied when needed. Geers for everyone and every interest. On demand means a lot so it is there when you are ready to watch, can pause and come back, o
review: Always something to watch was able to ditch cable. Shows for adults and children keeps my grandchild occupied when needed. Geers for everyone and every interest. On demand means a lot so it is there when you are ready to watch, can pause and come back, or resume in another room.

preview: Generally good choices including their own features for a reasonable fee. Ability to view using any device as well as TV is a positive capability. Also being able to download for later viewing and ability to do so without an internet connection is great
review: Generally good choices including their own features for a reasonable fee. Ability to view using any device as well as TV is a positive capability. Also being able to download for later viewing and ability to do so without an internet connection is great for travel.

preview: Netflix is still competitively priced and offers a pretty good variety of shows. They rarely have outages, and the video itself is very good. 4 screens at $16.99 per month is not too terrible and allows me to share it with my daughter and father.
review: Netflix is still competitively priced and offers a pretty good variety of shows. They rarely have outages, and the video itself is very good. 4 screens at $16.99 per month is not too terrible and allows me to share it with my daughter and father.

preview: Good variety, a little pricey but good nonetheless. Perhaps a little more time between shows so as to not get sucked into binging when you need to get to sleep. That’s it for me, we use it and like it.
review: Good variety, a little pricey but good nonetheless. Perhaps a little more time between shows so as to not get sucked into binging when you need to get to sleep. That’s it for me, we use it and like it.

preview: Netflix is available whenever I have the time ie. on my own schedule and for a reasonable cost a month. I have spend $10 a month in worse ways. Netflix has a vast variety of shows no matter what I feel like watching-comedies, westerns, dramas, whatever.
review: Netflix is available whenever I have the time ie. on my own schedule and for a reasonable cost a month. I have spend $10 a month in worse ways. Netflix has a vast variety of shows no matter what I feel like watching-comedies, westerns, dramas, whatever. I like that I can binge watch shows that I didn't see when they on prime time and now I can go back and watch them now. For example I just discovered FRIENDS/what a hoot. I also enjoy the movies and British series like Midsomer Mysteries, Father Brown, etc. I even went back and watch Mork and Mindy. Now I would love to find Magnum p.i. (the original of course).

preview: I am having horrible experience with Netflix. I cancelled my account and Netflix kept billing me for many months. Now when I call them, customer service simply blame on me saying you are at fault as you didn't see those charges in the credit card stateme
review: I am having horrible experience with Netflix. I cancelled my account and Netflix kept billing me for many months. Now when I call them, customer service simply blame on me saying you are at fault as you didn't see those charges in the credit card statement before. They can't provide me proof of reactivation, they can't provide me proof of any details if I did any streaming after cancellation. In summary once you have given your Credit Card, all the best keep checking your credit card for rest of your life as Netflix can start autobilling you again.

preview: NETFLIX promotes the availability of movies and television shows however when I look to see if there is anything recent it will not be there. I also believe NETFLIX should include incentives when watching certain movies or TV shows.
review: NETFLIX promotes the availability of movies and television shows however when I look to see if there is anything recent it will not be there. I also believe NETFLIX should include incentives when watching certain movies or TV shows.

preview: Don't give Netflix your card #. I received e-mail last 2 years come back free trial, meanwhile I'm being charged as member very deceitful. I'm in process disputing, if you ever had 30 day trial, check your debit card, you will get come back email as they
review: Don't give Netflix your card #. I received e-mail last 2 years come back free trial, meanwhile I'm being charged as member very deceitful. I'm in process disputing, if you ever had 30 day trial, check your debit card, you will get come back email as they take your money.

preview: Be careful about cancelling your Netflix. They'll restart your membership without your consent and say someone else in your household could've restarted it my ** when I'm the only one who knows the p.w and info. Now they're putting the 16 back but my ban
review: Be careful about cancelling your Netflix. They'll restart your membership without your consent and say someone else in your household could've restarted it my ** when I'm the only one who knows the p.w and info. Now they're putting the 16 back but my bank will charge a 36.00 charge. I tell the guy who could've cared less!!!! It's odd that the day it's due to pull from my account Netflix restarts my membership???? When I cancelled it a week ago and it's not the first time I've tried canceling in the past they did the same thing with pretty much the same response. Netflix sucks. Wouldn't offer a month free or anything considering I'm out almost 60.00. I'm done with Netflix. Rip someone else off to for a change.

preview: Why does my Netflix subscription keep increasing? I went from paying $10/month to $18/month in the span of 6 years. I’ve never strayed to Hulu. I’ve been loyal Netflix. I don’t want to give you any more money.
review: Why does my Netflix subscription keep increasing? I went from paying $10/month to $18/month in the span of 6 years. I’ve never strayed to Hulu. I’ve been loyal Netflix. I don’t want to give you any more money.

preview: I signed up for Netflix's free trial and canceled it just a few days later. My card was still charged. I went to customer service and they said it was because either my laptop, credit card, or email had had a free trial used on it before. My card and lap
review: I signed up for Netflix's free trial and canceled it just a few days later. My card was still charged. I went to customer service and they said it was because either my laptop, credit card, or email had had a free trial used on it before. My card and laptop are both new and my email has never been associated with Netflix in the slightest. It was only twelve days after I signed up and they said that it was already too far out to process a refund. I realize that it was only $9; but for a college student saving every penny that she can, that's a lot!

preview: They changed the delivery hub from Illinois to Ohio and now DVD turn around is about 10 days mail back on Sunday. Would have a new DVD by Wednesday same week. Now mail back on Sunday don't get next movie till the next week Wednesday. Not too good of a mo
review: They changed the delivery hub from Illinois to Ohio and now DVD turn around is about 10 days mail back on Sunday. Would have a new DVD by Wednesday same week. Now mail back on Sunday don't get next movie till the next week Wednesday. Not too good of a move to close Illinois delivery hub and move to Ohio.

preview: Over this past summer, the turn around on DVD's has slowed way down. I used to be able to do two exchanges in one week, but now, no. I sent my discs back in Saturday. I received the first exchange today, Thursday. It was disc 2 in a new series I wanted t
review:
Over this past summer, the turn around on DVD's has slowed way down. I used to be able to do two exchanges in one week, but now, no. I sent my discs back in Saturday. I received the first exchange today, Thursday. It was disc 2 in a new series I wanted to watch. Hopefully, disc 1 will show tomorrow, Friday. That makes almost a week between exchanges. It used to be I could send discs back on a Sunday, get replacements in a Tuesday, watch them, then return them, and still have new ones to watch on the weekend.
Read full review

preview: I have had Netflix for years and everything was fine until probably about a year or 2 ago. They up their prices but the DVDs that I get through the mail are extremely slow to get delivered. I probably get maybe 1 dvd a week if I'm lucky, where before I w
review: I have had Netflix for years and everything was fine until probably about a year or 2 ago. They up their prices but the DVDs that I get through the mail are extremely slow to get delivered. I probably get maybe 1 dvd a week if I'm lucky, where before I was getting around 3. And it seems like you have to have the dvd subscription if you want to watch anything good. Even really old movies can only be found through the dvd service most of the time. And the streaming selection is good but it takes a really long time to get new stuff on there. I'm a big fan of horror movies and we constantly see the same selections that have been there for months before a new one becomes available. So basically they charge more and I get less. Not happy.

preview: Netflix has fraud committed "frequently", per customer service. Not only do they not investigate, they do not reimburse. It is up to the consumer to do all the leg work. Glad I left a few years back because of poor selection, overpriced garbage and now a
review: Netflix has fraud committed "frequently", per customer service. Not only do they not investigate, they do not reimburse. It is up to the consumer to do all the leg work. Glad I left a few years back because of poor selection, overpriced garbage and now add CC Fraud to the list. 1 star is too generous.

preview: Just signed up for a Netflix subscription for Canada - no more free trial. Disappointed. Especially since no sign up screen explains this. Customer service responded, but not able/willing to do anything to help. Steve.
review: Just signed up for a Netflix subscription for Canada - no more free trial. Disappointed. Especially since no sign up screen explains this. Customer service responded, but not able/willing to do anything to help. Steve.

preview: Every year we receive Netflix gift cards from a family member. Last year after the gift subscription expired, we didn't renew right away. We noticed that Netflix continued charging the credit card we only use for Netflix. There was much back and forth af
review:
Every year we receive Netflix gift cards from a family member. Last year after the gift subscription expired, we didn't renew right away. We noticed that Netflix continued charging the credit card we only use for Netflix. There was much back and forth after we contacted Netflix, but we were finally told that someone in another country was using our credit card for Netflix. We immediately cancelled the credit card account. For security reasons, that card was only used for Netflix billing. Because this card was exclusive to Netflix and no other charges occurred before or after, we were confident that Netflix had been hacked.
Read full review

preview: Today I happened to notice that my Netflix monthly charge on my Amex bill had increased from $8.47 to $16.95 without any permission or authorization from me. I called customer service and asked who had authorized this and what date it had happened. They
review:
Today I happened to notice that my Netflix monthly charge on my Amex bill had increased from $8.47 to $16.95 without any permission or authorization from me. I called customer service and asked who had authorized this and what date it had happened. They have no record of this information but insist that I have to pay it anyway over the last five months that it was billed. I am an older widow who has only ever had the basic service for the many years that I subscribed to Netflix. I have no need to watch on four screens at once.
Read full review

preview: I've been a Netflix subscriber since 2012 and never had any issues. About a month ago our account shut down and we couldn't login. After multiple call and chat attempts I finally reached someone after 3 weeks! Apparently our account was hacked, email cha
review:
I've been a Netflix subscriber since 2012 and never had any issues. About a month ago our account shut down and we couldn't login. After multiple call and chat attempts I finally reached someone after 3 weeks! Apparently our account was hacked, email changed, profiles deleted, and package upgraded all without our consent. When asked to verify our info we had to provide our card# on file but was never asked any other relevant info. Netflix acted like they were doing us a favor by correcting everything and reinstating our account to the correct package. They would NOT credit us for service lost or provide a discount for our inconvenience. 7 years we have been customers and nothing.
Read full review

preview: Netflix WAS a 5 star experience! Then, most of what they add became nothing more than shows in every other language imaginable, except English! Most of the shows in English, you know, the language of this country, are old or just added seasons from curre
review: Netflix WAS a 5 star experience! Then, most of what they add became nothing more than shows in every other language imaginable, except English! Most of the shows in English, you know, the language of this country, are old or just added seasons from current shows. A user can no longer write a review on their site, I believe since 2018, because it caused their subscriptions to drop. That tells me something!! Subscribing to, and watching, shows and movies in the USA from a USA company should not make users have to read "sub titles" because the show is in some other foreign language. As my faith in Netflix drops, so does my desire to subscribe any further.

preview: I don't believe they are ordering enough copies of newer movies...I've been a customer for a long time but in the last year every new movie is short wait except it takes months to get that movie. I have 15 movies in my queue and they all say short wait.
review: I don't believe they are ordering enough copies of newer movies...I've been a customer for a long time but in the last year every new movie is short wait except it takes months to get that movie. I have 15 movies in my queue and they all say short wait. So you pay a monthly fee and your lucky to get a movie every 2 weeks. You get no help when you call them. If you want movies years old then you could be ok but if you are looking for new releases....beware.

preview: I was recently enjoying the Netflix Original Series "Cannon Busters" until the main Protagonist "Philly the Kid" made an Antisemitic remark as an insult to a robot salvaging scrap. Season 1, Episode 8 (English)... Philly the Kid calls a robot a Jew for s
review: I was recently enjoying the Netflix Original Series "Cannon Busters" until the main Protagonist "Philly the Kid" made an Antisemitic remark as an insult to a robot salvaging scrap. Season 1, Episode 8 (English)... Philly the Kid calls a robot a Jew for scrounging through "hot smelly garbage" in hopes of finding useful scrap. The Antisemitic remark was NOT included in the English subtitles. When I contacted customer support they had nothing but excuses.

preview: I recently cancelled my Netflix account because of the continuing to worsen selection! I canceled a month ahead of time and they still billed me for a new month through my cable provider but still canceled everything on my account! After 5 calls back and
review:
I recently cancelled my Netflix account because of the continuing to worsen selection! I canceled a month ahead of time and they still billed me for a new month through my cable provider but still canceled everything on my account! After 5 calls back and forth to Netflix customer service who basically had no answer, no info and kept pointing the finger at the provider who provided me proof Netflix is the one who billed them and received my money btw! The Netflix sup refused to let me speak to his manager claiming, "We're a 1 escalation company. We don't escalate beyond sup!"
Read full review

preview: I have been a Netflix customer for many years, and within the last year I have watched their service and business practices decline. First and foremost, the price hike is ridiculous! Yes it's convenient and cheaper than traditional cable but I just don't
review:
I have been a Netflix customer for many years, and within the last year I have watched their service and business practices decline. First and foremost, the price hike is ridiculous! Yes it's convenient and cheaper than traditional cable but I just don't see how it could go up so much in such a small amount of time. From the first time signing up for Netflix, the membership cost by month has increased $5-$7. Secondly, just this month I have watched every show or movie that interests me and have decided to stop my membership until new titles are added.
Read full review

preview: Do not download the app or sign up for Netflix. I've been having issues streaming Netflix for months yet paying for it. I've contacted customer service and they still don't solve the problem. It's obvious they have no knowledge about the app and zero wil
review:
Do not download the app or sign up for Netflix. I've been having issues streaming Netflix for months yet paying for it. I've contacted customer service and they still don't solve the problem. It's obvious they have no knowledge about the app and zero will to help. When you ask for any alternatives, they tell you they will e-mail you the link to unsubscribe. Who does that?? I'm not sure if they underpay their representatives but nobody seems to care about helping with customer service. They are very nonchalant about it. It's a "go ahead, we don't need you attitude". Considering the competition out there, I'm not surprised people are switching to Hulu and Amazon. However, they don't care. Plus, they lack common sense. They don't train their customer service department in anything about the app that may help, they are clueless but the worst part is that they are extremely rude.
Read full review

preview: Voiceover. I absolutely can't stand that voice that babbles on telling me what is happening. Do they think I am so dumb I can't see what they are doing? Or maybe it's for someone who can't see. I can stand so much of it and then I just quit watching.
review: Voiceover. I absolutely can't stand that voice that babbles on telling me what is happening. Do they think I am so dumb I can't see what they are doing? Or maybe it's for someone who can't see. I can stand so much of it and then I just quit watching.

preview: After more than 6 years as a Netflix customer, I’m walking away disappointed by the way your customer service was unable to resolve the second security issue my Netflix account experienced. After someone hacked my account, changing email address and prev
review:
After more than 6 years as a Netflix customer, I’m walking away disappointed by the way your customer service was unable to resolve the second security issue my Netflix account experienced. After someone hacked my account, changing email address and preventing me to log-in, I had to stay on the phone with you to fix the security issue. But the hacker updated the plan to one more expensive and trying to put back my older plan was not possible, now increased from 7.99 to 8.99.
Read full review

preview: If you have ever used Netflix on your cell phone, regardless if it was your account or not, the 1st month isnt free. It's a lie to get you to sign up. I used my phone on a friend's account and got my own and they charged my account.
review: If you have ever used Netflix on your cell phone, regardless if it was your account or not, the 1st month isnt free. It's a lie to get you to sign up. I used my phone on a friend's account and got my own and they charged my account.

preview: I've been a long time user of Netflix and have been very happy BUT just this week the subtitles have been on EVERYTHING!!! This is super frustrating! I love to binge watch Friends but every single episode, I have to turn them off. I've never had to do th
review: I've been a long time user of Netflix and have been very happy BUT just this week the subtitles have been on EVERYTHING!!! This is super frustrating! I love to binge watch Friends but every single episode, I have to turn them off. I've never had to do this before. I thought it was the app on my phone but it is on my TV as well. There needs to be a way of turning it off completely and not when you start watching something. This new occurrence makes me not want to watch Netflix anymore! It is so inconvenient. Please fix this!!!

preview: I have been using Netflix for a few years now. Up until two months ago, I was never charged "tax." Now I am charged a different "tax" every month. When I called and asked why I was being charged different percentages of tax Netflix said that they don't k
review: I have been using Netflix for a few years now. Up until two months ago, I was never charged "tax." Now I am charged a different "tax" every month. When I called and asked why I was being charged different percentages of tax Netflix said that they don't know how it works and that I should talk to a "tax expert." Every other place I'm required to pay taxes it states on the receipt what the tax is for and the amount. Netflix is probably doing some illegal shady business practices because their "explanation" doesn't make any sense.

preview: Somebody hacked my Netflix account and I lost some money as they subscribed using my card details. I could not delete my card details as well. Finally ended up blocking card. If our accounts can be hacked, we need to think about the confidential data tha
review: Somebody hacked my Netflix account and I lost some money as they subscribed using my card details. I could not delete my card details as well. Finally ended up blocking card. If our accounts can be hacked, we need to think about the confidential data that we keep in their database like card details. Stay safe!

preview: I have used Netflix DVD rental for more than 15 years. Streaming for 5+ years. It is really bad now. They do not let any star rating or review on movies to confuse people watching good and bad movies. They are crooks. Do not waste your time watching garb
review: I have used Netflix DVD rental for more than 15 years. Streaming for 5+ years. It is really bad now. They do not let any star rating or review on movies to confuse people watching good and bad movies. They are crooks. Do not waste your time watching garbage.

preview: Netflix kept charging me for 6 months after I canceled my account, even charging me twice in one month for supposedly having 2 accounts! When I called customer service, they told me they could not refund the money and I would have to talk to the bank. Th
review: Netflix kept charging me for 6 months after I canceled my account, even charging me twice in one month for supposedly having 2 accounts! When I called customer service, they told me they could not refund the money and I would have to talk to the bank. The bank refused to refund the money because I had actually had an account at some point. Be very careful with Netflix, there is no recourse if they decide to fraudulently charge your credit card. You will just get the runaround from some guy in India!

preview: We have been a customer of Netflix off and on for the last three years. This company has been one of the worst movie rental companies that we have ever used. The same movies that are listed today were the same ones listed over 3 years ago. They do update
review: We have been a customer of Netflix off and on for the last three years. This company has been one of the worst movie rental companies that we have ever used. The same movies that are listed today were the same ones listed over 3 years ago. They do update but VERY poorly! You could literally watch everyone of their top listed movies in 3 days. Following that you will run out of movies because all the rest are movies that have been running on everyday T.V. forever.. You may just have to find out on your own, but trust me you will be disappointed. I do not recommend it at all.

preview: Netflix double charged us for 17 months for a second account we never signed up for or knew about. When asked about this issue, four different Netflix managers acknowledged the issue, but refused to fully refund or credit us. To make matters worse, they
review: Netflix double charged us for 17 months for a second account we never signed up for or knew about. When asked about this issue, four different Netflix managers acknowledged the issue, but refused to fully refund or credit us. To make matters worse, they each actually *blamed* us for not checking our PayPal account that it was being drawn from! (We often have multiple transactions on that account in a single day.) Given multiple chances to fix this issue or make it right, Netflix refused and lost a customer of many years. Check your statements closely, they might be double billing you too.

preview: The experience I've had with Netflix is mostly good. I am happy with their streaming quality and I like that I can adjust the quality to match whatever bandwidth I've got going on. The cost of their service is very affordable. The customer service is gre
review: The experience I've had with Netflix is mostly good. I am happy with their streaming quality and I like that I can adjust the quality to match whatever bandwidth I've got going on. The cost of their service is very affordable. The customer service is great...Most issues I have encountered have been taken care of in a matter of minutes! Their exclusive movies and series are almost always winners and they regularly add new movies to their lineup - particularly family movies, which is nice for us! I would like to see more new movies added more often, especially blockbuster type movies. It would also be nice if they didn't have so many voiced over foreign films in their lineup. Nothing against these movies, it's just that the voice over drives me nuts!

preview: Netflix is continuously raising their prices while canceling their best shows after 2 seasons leaving garbage to watch and coming out with new original series that are sub-par. After canceling Sense8 and now the OA, there's no reason to pay for their ser
review: Netflix is continuously raising their prices while canceling their best shows after 2 seasons leaving garbage to watch and coming out with new original series that are sub-par. After canceling Sense8 and now the OA, there's no reason to pay for their services anymore. They're scamming their customers.

preview: The new releases coming out on Netflix DVD always go to some “wait” status and I never get them sent to me until they are months old. I list them as number 1 and 2 on my queue and NEVER get them sent. When I call and ask why, they tell me it’s all random
review: The new releases coming out on Netflix DVD always go to some “wait” status and I never get them sent to me until they are months old. I list them as number 1 and 2 on my queue and NEVER get them sent. When I call and ask why, they tell me it’s all random. Well “randomly”, I should get them once in a while, but NEVER do. They have so much money, they should buy enough copies so everyone can get them. I’m disgusted. DO NOT pay for this crap. Go to a Redbox or rent them through your cable or satellite service!!!!

preview: I signed up for a free trial and had been using it on my phone but a week later decided to put it on my smart TV and it would not work any longer. They said it’s because someone had used a trial on my TV before. Well the TV is more than 8 yrs old. I’m su
review: I signed up for a free trial and had been using it on my phone but a week later decided to put it on my smart TV and it would not work any longer. They said it’s because someone had used a trial on my TV before. Well the TV is more than 8 yrs old. I’m sure someone had at one point which was probably my husband's ex wife or something. So now they removed my free trial and are trying to charge me the reg service after only 5 days of the free trial. How is all this my fault.

preview: They have charged my account his month and the account is cancelled. We have been unable to use the service due to an internet speed issue. This was the message from customer support, "Netflix Mary Jean: Since here in Netflix we cannot apply a refund any
review: They have charged my account his month and the account is cancelled. We have been unable to use the service due to an internet speed issue. This was the message from customer support, "Netflix Mary Jean: Since here in Netflix we cannot apply a refund anymore, I recommend that you call your bank and dispute the charge." Thanks Netflix, but what has it got to do with the bank. They did what you asked them not me. Anyway, bye bye Netflix , another unhappy customer.

preview: We have been Netflix customers for many years receiving the DVDs thru the mail. Always thought it was an innovative service. The last 3 years have seen the prices climb and thru DVD delivery slow to a snail's pace, sometimes not coming at all. Most distu
review: We have been Netflix customers for many years receiving the DVDs thru the mail. Always thought it was an innovative service. The last 3 years have seen the prices climb and thru DVD delivery slow to a snail's pace, sometimes not coming at all. Most disturbing if repeatedly being sent DVDs that are not even functional. The technology is available, yet movies our routinely sent out unreadable. When we call to complain and express concerns, no effort is made to compensate customers for a product that often is unenjoyable. NO MORE NETFLIX! We cannot afford to support your lack of quality control!!!!

preview: Netflix does not care for there CUSTOMERS. We get setup for payments on the 1st of the months but they shot oFF Netflix 3 or 4 days early. So I do not recommend them because you have to pay monthly. They do not want you pay yearly at all. They got to cha
review: Netflix does not care for there CUSTOMERS. We get setup for payments on the 1st of the months but they shot oFF Netflix 3 or 4 days early. So I do not recommend them because you have to pay monthly. They do not want you pay yearly at all. They got to change their ways for the better.

preview: Netflix is okay and once in awhile, and blue moon while, Something different might appear. Unfortunately, I find the problem with netflix is they show the same stuff over and over. It can be mundane. You can request movies till you're blue in the face. I
review: Netflix is okay and once in awhile, and blue moon while, Something different might appear. Unfortunately, I find the problem with netflix is they show the same stuff over and over. It can be mundane. You can request movies till you're blue in the face. It's hopeless. They're never going to honor any requests. I've come to terms with that. Very Unfortunate. We're paying monthly to see the same stuff month in, month out. I went to watch a spanish show for a change, something different. No subtitles. Seriously!! I just feel like they've gone down hill. Almost feel bad for saying that because I've been with netflix for years. I really don't think they care as long as you're paying that monthly fee. Who's picking these shows out anyway? I would like to know. We're paying for a service and as the consumers, we deserve more. That's all I have to say.

preview: Netflix signed me out of my account and is bid telling me my login isn't correct when I know it is. I've had the same log in for YEARS. Y'all are increasing my charges and now this?! I want this fixed NOW!
review: Netflix signed me out of my account and is bid telling me my login isn't correct when I know it is. I've had the same log in for YEARS. Y'all are increasing my charges and now this?! I want this fixed NOW!

preview: I live in a rural part of N.M. and have been with Netflix DVD for over a year. I ALWAYS sent 2 movies back on Mondays. I had to call and report that I rarely get two movies back by Friday. I would receive one movie back by Thursday, but they waited to se
review: I live in a rural part of N.M. and have been with Netflix DVD for over a year. I ALWAYS sent 2 movies back on Mondays. I had to call and report that I rarely get two movies back by Friday. I would receive one movie back by Thursday, but they waited to send me that second movie until Thursday. Often times, that would leave me actually paying for two movies a week, but only receiving one a week. I would have to call every time and tell them "both movies were scanned at my post office on Monday, but "I only received one movie back!" They would send me out two, and make good for it, but I would have to call and complain every 4 to 5 weeks. This has gone on for over a year, so I dropped my plan back to one movie a week. It's a big issue to me to send out only one movie a week on a two movie a week plan.

preview: In June 2019, Netflix contacted me to do three time-consuming surveys, including watching videos. I did all three surveys because I was told I would receive 4 free months service as compensation. I waited 3 weeks after completion... Nothing. Called Netfl
review: In June 2019, Netflix contacted me to do three time-consuming surveys, including watching videos. I did all three surveys because I was told I would receive 4 free months service as compensation. I waited 3 weeks after completion... Nothing. Called Netflix and was told that within 7 (additional) days I would receive a gift card to be used for the free service. Waited another 2 weeks. Nothing. Emailed Netflix CEO... Nothing. Netflix lied to me and scammed me, and yes, their customer service confirmed that the surveys and the free service offer had come directly from Netflix. Between being cheated by Netflix in this way, and their pathetic offerings recently, we cancelled service after many, many years of being disc and streaming customers. I don't want to do business with a company I can't trust, and Netflix has turned into one of those companies.

preview: I was on my free trial of Netflix and last night I got a message that I need to resubmit my card details for just authorisation and it will cost 0 rupees but my money gets deducted and I contacted to their customer service and they said it is their polic
review: I was on my free trial of Netflix and last night I got a message that I need to resubmit my card details for just authorisation and it will cost 0 rupees but my money gets deducted and I contacted to their customer service and they said it is their policy and I think it's misleading and so wrong. How does all this makes sense how is it their policy?

preview: My Netflix acct was accessed in Thailand, my email was deleted and I noted streaming activity in Argentina. I was in the US. I made Netflix aware and they would not cut off access to these foreign individuals from using my account until I could provide t
review:
My Netflix acct was accessed in Thailand, my email was deleted and I noted streaming activity in Argentina. I was in the US. I made Netflix aware and they would not cut off access to these foreign individuals from using my account until I could provide them with an access code or my credit card number. I could not give them an access code because I couldn’t log in any longer due to someone changing the email associated with my acct. I was away and did not have access to my credit card for several days. I was unable to use any Netflix services but the hackers could while I continued to be charged by Netflix.
Read full review

preview: Everything worth watching was replaced by total propaganda and terrible Netflix originals promoting degeneracy. Netflix usually never has what you are searching for, while other services will almost always have it. Netflix needs to go away. It's honestly
review: Everything worth watching was replaced by total propaganda and terrible Netflix originals promoting degeneracy. Netflix usually never has what you are searching for, while other services will almost always have it. Netflix needs to go away. It's honestly so bad I can't even believe 95% this stuff makes a screen. How did we get to the point where such sub-par entertainment is acceptable? Been looking for a new series for multiple years and they have zero to offer.

preview: I updated my bank information recently and when I did, I clicked the box to charge my card as a debit card. Logically thinking, it would get charged instead of being charged a credit card process way. I was charge twice in one day. Even after contact wit
review: I updated my bank information recently and when I did, I clicked the box to charge my card as a debit card. Logically thinking, it would get charged instead of being charged a credit card process way. I was charge twice in one day. Even after contact with Netflix three times and my bank once, I canceled my Netflix account. No matter how large your company is, or large your client list is, if you can not resolve a problem after it being stated over and over, I do not want to be a part of your service.

preview: I was a past user of Netflix but discontinued the service well over a year ago. Recently I have been receiving emails asking me to "Enjoy another free trial". I thought I would give them a try since the email specifically said, "Enjoy another free trial"
review:
I was a past user of Netflix but discontinued the service well over a year ago. Recently I have been receiving emails asking me to "Enjoy another free trial". I thought I would give them a try since the email specifically said, "Enjoy another free trial" right on a button that linked to Netflix. They recognized my old account in in about 2 minutes I was up and running. Then I checked the billing area just to make sure it was free and it's then I determined I was being billed. I called Netflix and they said since I had once had a free trial, that I was no longer eligible. I told them the email said, "Enjoy another free trial" and they said read the fine print. Sure enough, the fine print said no additional free trials although in bold print the email sent to me which was from my previous registration said, "Enjoy another free trial". Chat with Netflix resulted in the same outcome.
Read full review

preview: I have only one account. Netflix has been charging both my bank account and credit card account to the tune of $15 a month. $30 a month for Netflix. When providing my debit card which was not authorized, to customer service they refused to tell me who wa
review: I have only one account. Netflix has been charging both my bank account and credit card account to the tune of $15 a month. $30 a month for Netflix. When providing my debit card which was not authorized, to customer service they refused to tell me who was using my debit card for Netflix. This is pretty much illegal to charge someone unauthorized then refuse to give the person in which the money was stolen from the information. They are working like a corrupt 3rd world government. This needs some serious investigation as they steal money then act like I'm in the wrong for asking them who is stealing my money? Criminals.

preview: Noticed when reading some reviews people are not aware physical renting legally anyone owns a physical product can rent it. If you buy it at store legally you can rent it out. Online streaming, the streaming company has to license the rights from the con
review:
Noticed when reading some reviews people are not aware physical renting legally anyone owns a physical product can rent it. If you buy it at store legally you can rent it out. Online streaming, the streaming company has to license the rights from the content owning company to stream it on an ongoing basis (meaning paying them forever else forfeiting the right to keep showing it). That's why if you do the physical disks via Netflix or anywhere you can get anything but the online streaming you can't find anything and have to find whichever service paid large outlay to solo license for multiple years a specific piece of content.
Read full review

preview: So I tried at multiple hotels and multiple times to log in on the hotel smart TV to watch Netflix. I kept getting a ui-113 error message. I called and spent over 2 hours on the line with Netflix and on chat - and was basically told that it was a problem
review:
So I tried at multiple hotels and multiple times to log in on the hotel smart TV to watch Netflix. I kept getting a ui-113 error message. I called and spent over 2 hours on the line with Netflix and on chat - and was basically told that it was a problem with the hotel internet. Funny thing was after all the TV resets, internet resets, clearing cookies etc., my niece could sign into her account no problem on the same TV in the same room on the same night (she was staying with me) - and my account would still get the ui-113 error.
Read full review

preview: On again, off again subscriber here. This go round I've subscribed for 3 months. The only 2 movies I've watched worth a darn, were Birdbox and The Highwaymen, along with a few seasons of The Office. Honestly, it's just not worth the $13 and change per mo
review: On again, off again subscriber here. This go round I've subscribed for 3 months. The only 2 movies I've watched worth a darn, were Birdbox and The Highwaymen, along with a few seasons of The Office. Honestly, it's just not worth the $13 and change per month. Also, not much that's family friendly or even adult friendly content. The raunch and filth is just getting worse. Cancelled today for the last time, and won't be back.

preview: I had my credit card information stolen two days ago. Waiting to receive my new card I realized my auto pay with Netflix didn't go through because that card is now cancelled. I called to see if there was anything I could do since it would take about 5 da
review: I had my credit card information stolen two days ago. Waiting to receive my new card I realized my auto pay with Netflix didn't go through because that card is now cancelled. I called to see if there was anything I could do since it would take about 5 days for my new card to arrive. Customer service was very friendly and helpful. They extended the due date for me, no extra charge and my Netflix streaming was back on immediately! I'm so thankful they made that incredibly easy for me and I was only on the phone for 5 mins! Netflix made my week much better. Thanks.

preview: Netflix allows child users access to upgrade their parents Netflix streaming Plan. Netflix allows you to set up up to 5 user profiles for your family including Children Profiles where you can prevent children from watching age inappropriate programs. How
review:
Netflix allows child users access to upgrade their parents Netflix streaming Plan. Netflix allows you to set up up to 5 user profiles for your family including Children Profiles where you can prevent children from watching age inappropriate programs. However they do allow Children to be able to upgrade the main account streaming plan with a click of a button with no restrictions or pin/password to enter. This I suspect has happen to me as my payment plan was upgraded without my permission and Netflix couldn't explain why this happen.
