preview: I really like Netflix but I would like it more if they had some of the old classic Christmas shows for kids like Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, or Frosty the Snowman. I would also like to see the Christmas family movies like Home Alone or The Santa Clau
review: I really like Netflix but I would like it more if they had some of the old classic Christmas shows for kids like Rudolph the Red-Nosed Reindeer, or Frosty the Snowman. I would also like to see the Christmas family movies like Home Alone or The Santa Clause.

preview: The selection of shows seem to be more for younger people - too much swearing, killing, and nonrealistic Action. Not enough shows for seniors, ie Like TCM. Even the family movies are all the latest, none of the good old originals like Annie, Sound of Mus
review: The selection of shows seem to be more for younger people - too much swearing, killing, and nonrealistic Action. Not enough shows for seniors, ie Like TCM. Even the family movies are all the latest, none of the good old originals like Annie, Sound of Music. Also no John Wayne, Gregory Peck, Spencer Tracy movies, or old war time movies. This Christmas - there were none of the classics like White Christmas, Miracle on 49th Street, A Christmas Carol, etc. Maybe you could make another category for old time movies.

preview: I have been with Netflix since they opened! Their prices went up, they are still very reasonable. They have plenty of different choices! You will be very happy with them. Very affordable, and if you can’t afford cable - they are your first choice!
review: I have been with Netflix since they opened! Their prices went up, they are still very reasonable. They have plenty of different choices! You will be very happy with them. Very affordable, and if you can’t afford cable - they are your first choice!

preview: We only stream and Netflix offers lots of options for our viewing pleasure! We really like the sci-fi options and appreciate the Netflix exclusives. I wish all the foreign films had english audio!!!
review: We only stream and Netflix offers lots of options for our viewing pleasure! We really like the sci-fi options and appreciate the Netflix exclusives. I wish all the foreign films had english audio!!!

preview: The original programming is well worth the cost. I also think their user interface is the best compared to Hulu and Amazon Prime. The variety of shows is definitely better than the other 2 services. The search function is quite useful too.
review: The original programming is well worth the cost. I also think their user interface is the best compared to Hulu and Amazon Prime. The variety of shows is definitely better than the other 2 services. The search function is quite useful too.

preview: Netflix is the first streaming service I’ve ever subscribed to though I now have three. I find that it has an extensive library of entertainment and have enjoyed countless hours of viewing. I’ve watched so many shows and movies that I even keel a list of
review: Netflix is the first streaming service I’ve ever subscribed to though I now have three. I find that it has an extensive library of entertainment and have enjoyed countless hours of viewing. I’ve watched so many shows and movies that I even keel a list of all my favorites which I happily supply to my family and friends who ask for recommendations. I feel like I’ve become quite a connoisseur of entertainment. I have especially enjoyed the many British and Australian shows; most of which I would probably have never gotten a chance to watch if it hadn’t been for Netflix. I also particularly like the Netflix original series - of course, starting with Orange is the New Black. I watch almost each and every recommendation that the service offers to me and it’s always on point!

preview: Although meager for foreign and good international films, it is perhaps the best option for streaming services in respect to cost and range of choices. Set up is easy and there have been few outages or interference with the streaming service as opposed t
review: Although meager for foreign and good international films, it is perhaps the best option for streaming services in respect to cost and range of choices. Set up is easy and there have been few outages or interference with the streaming service as opposed to cable.

preview: We use Netflix as it is an app on our cable pkg. I have used it on my TIVO as well. It works great. The quality is good and for the most part there's no FREEZING while streaming. Sometimes it happens but I think it's a buffering problem as we have severa
review: We use Netflix as it is an app on our cable pkg. I have used it on my TIVO as well. It works great. The quality is good and for the most part there's no FREEZING while streaming. Sometimes it happens but I think it's a buffering problem as we have several devices connected simultaneous. I'm NOT really satisfied with the movie/shows content. Too much of the same even under various categories. Better or more choices would be better.

preview: I have subscribed to Netflix for some time now. Overall, I would give them a 2 1/2 star rating out of five. Basically, they make it very difficult to actually find a variety in their offerings. I have regularly told them their volume level is low. (NOT a
review: I have subscribed to Netflix for some time now. Overall, I would give them a 2 1/2 star rating out of five. Basically, they make it very difficult to actually find a variety in their offerings. I have regularly told them their volume level is low. (NOT a problem with my computer.) When first arriving at the site, you are subjected to a preview of whatever they're touting at the moment. Unless you scroll immediately, you will be subjected to this preview. Live chats are all but worthless. Must assume that most of their representatives do not have English as their first language.

preview: I want to be able to opt out of the algorithm recommendations and truly see the entire catalog of what’s available and maybe even switch back and forth. Hear from friends how they are watching shows that I can’t. Also, original content is not that import
review: I want to be able to opt out of the algorithm recommendations and truly see the entire catalog of what’s available and maybe even switch back and forth. Hear from friends how they are watching shows that I can’t. Also, original content is not that important to me all the time.

preview: Love the options and the ease of use of the program. Wish it was slightly less expensive, as most of us are already paying a high cable bill. I also wish Netflix would not support anything the Obamas have to do with. They’ve gained too much money from us
review: Love the options and the ease of use of the program. Wish it was slightly less expensive, as most of us are already paying a high cable bill. I also wish Netflix would not support anything the Obamas have to do with. They’ve gained too much money from us as it is! I do not want to fund their racist lifestyle any further!

preview: Netflix should not try to produce or direct the amount of movies it does, they seem to be compromising quality. Amazon should offer more and quality series for their Prime membership as well as more up-to-date movies. If I were to compare these two I hav
review: Netflix should not try to produce or direct the amount of movies it does, they seem to be compromising quality. Amazon should offer more and quality series for their Prime membership as well as more up-to-date movies. If I were to compare these two I have have to say that Netflix is the best.

preview: Netflix doesn't offer enough streaming variety. They have taken away a lot of TV shows. The movie selection is okay. They do make changes to selections, but it takes a while. The shows they produce are usually very good to excellent.
review: Netflix doesn't offer enough streaming variety. They have taken away a lot of TV shows. The movie selection is okay. They do make changes to selections, but it takes a while. The shows they produce are usually very good to excellent.

preview: While not a fan of more subscription based products, most of the streaming services offer commercial free viewing, which is not the case with the more expensive cable networks. With a large variety of shows, I can most often find something to watch, agai
review: While not a fan of more subscription based products, most of the streaming services offer commercial free viewing, which is not the case with the more expensive cable networks. With a large variety of shows, I can most often find something to watch, again unlike cable where I have hundreds of channels and nothing new to watch.

preview: I love Netflix. So many good shows with great exclusive content that cannot be had anywhere else. Service works well and the cost is minimal for what you get. Incredibly awesome! The quality is always good and they offer suggestions to keep you informed
review: I love Netflix. So many good shows with great exclusive content that cannot be had anywhere else. Service works well and the cost is minimal for what you get. Incredibly awesome! The quality is always good and they offer suggestions to keep you informed of what is new so you don't have to spend so much time searching for something new to watch.

preview: The cost is outlandish for the quality of the content. Mostly third rate shows always found, I would search for hours before I could find anything remotely interesting to me. I tried Netflix on two different occasions and had the same experience.
review: The cost is outlandish for the quality of the content. Mostly third rate shows always found, I would search for hours before I could find anything remotely interesting to me. I tried Netflix on two different occasions and had the same experience.

preview: Some really good series. I especially like the original ones. It would be great to make some extra paid content where you could buy movies on demand that I really want to see such as a service that YouTube does.
review: Some really good series. I especially like the original ones. It would be great to make some extra paid content where you could buy movies on demand that I really want to see such as a service that YouTube does.

preview: I have never had any technical problems with Netflix. I like the variety, especially when I was in Ecuador. Being able to watch American tv was great, especially since I don't speak Spanish. I do watch a lot of regular tv but when it goes into replays, I
review: I have never had any technical problems with Netflix. I like the variety, especially when I was in Ecuador. Being able to watch American tv was great, especially since I don't speak Spanish. I do watch a lot of regular tv but when it goes into replays, I love seeing movies on Netflx.

preview: The selection is small. And the way it’s set up sucks. Used to watch Kodi. That was great. The way they had it set up was better genres, by the year, movies or tv shows. Netflix makes you watch what they think you want to see.
review: The selection is small. And the way it’s set up sucks. Used to watch Kodi. That was great. The way they had it set up was better genres, by the year, movies or tv shows. Netflix makes you watch what they think you want to see.

preview: I have had Netflix for many years & never had a problem or single complaint. Never had any streaming issue on iPad, phone or computer. Have more choices than I even have time for, even now that I'm retired I'm so far behind on my watchlist! It's lots bet
review: I have had Netflix for many years & never had a problem or single complaint. Never had any streaming issue on iPad, phone or computer. Have more choices than I even have time for, even now that I'm retired I'm so far behind on my watchlist! It's lots better than Hulu & Amazon.

preview: I originally had higher regards for Netflix. But, nowadays with their cloddish cancellations of Marvel oriented series etcetera, my overall faith in and viewpoints pertaining to Netflix has soured exceedingly.
review: I originally had higher regards for Netflix. But, nowadays with their cloddish cancellations of Marvel oriented series etcetera, my overall faith in and viewpoints pertaining to Netflix has soured exceedingly.

preview: We've only watched one show: Downton Abbey. We are enthralled with the details, the scenery, the story & the characters! We watch about 4 episodes a night. An amazing job was done on this story & I applaud your specific details in every room, every scene
review: We've only watched one show: Downton Abbey. We are enthralled with the details, the scenery, the story & the characters! We watch about 4 episodes a night. An amazing job was done on this story & I applaud your specific details in every room, every scene, & every second of this movie. I thank you!

preview: Garbage, especially Netflix. What happened to good comedy like Red Skelton, Abbott and Costello. No vulgarity, Dick Van Dyke, Bob Newhart. The garbage today brings out the worst in people thinking that is the norm. Villains corruption, morality is going
review: Garbage, especially Netflix. What happened to good comedy like Red Skelton, Abbott and Costello. No vulgarity, Dick Van Dyke, Bob Newhart. The garbage today brings out the worst in people thinking that is the norm. Villains corruption, morality is going down the tube. Thanks to the viewing on tv today.

preview: Hulu has very bad performance and no direct customer service availability, also unable to down load to tv always receive an error message with no solution. Therefore I no longer watch Hulu. Netflix price increased, customer service abilities, easy to nav
review: Hulu has very bad performance and no direct customer service availability, also unable to down load to tv always receive an error message with no solution. Therefore I no longer watch Hulu. Netflix price increased, customer service abilities, easy to navigate.

preview: Wish they had more current programming for tv shows and movies. Popular programs that are no longer airing is nice if you liked those programs offered. I would also like to see a category of animated movies instead of just anime.
review: Wish they had more current programming for tv shows and movies. Popular programs that are no longer airing is nice if you liked those programs offered. I would also like to see a category of animated movies instead of just anime.

preview: It’d be nice to see a greater variety of available movies on Netflix. Netflix’s proprietary programming is great, but more movies would improve the service. Older movies, in particular. For the price, however, it’s a decent service.
review: It’d be nice to see a greater variety of available movies on Netflix. Netflix’s proprietary programming is great, but more movies would improve the service. Older movies, in particular. For the price, however, it’s a decent service.

preview: I enjoy a lot of what they offer but hate the fact they remove so many titles from being viewed. The list of my favorite shows seems to dwindle every few months, at the rate they are removing shows eventually it may no longer be worth my family having.
review: I enjoy a lot of what they offer but hate the fact they remove so many titles from being viewed. The list of my favorite shows seems to dwindle every few months, at the rate they are removing shows eventually it may no longer be worth my family having.

preview: I have 100mbps fiber network at home. Absolutely everything - Amazon Prime, Showmax, Tidal streaming, Apple Music etc etc all work perfectly. But Netflix requires a reset of all my devices EVERY day. The Netflix App on my Apple TV 4K and LG OLED Smart TV
review: I have 100mbps fiber network at home. Absolutely everything - Amazon Prime, Showmax, Tidal streaming, Apple Music etc etc all work perfectly. But Netflix requires a reset of all my devices EVERY day. The Netflix App on my Apple TV 4K and LG OLED Smart TV both do exactly the same thing. I have repeatedly followed the same instructions that Netflix Support send to me every time I try to report the issue. They insist there is a problem with my network but I’m convinced the problem is with Netflix as if my network was faulty how could everything else work perfectly? It’s about time Netflix fixed this error and stop sending me the same instructions over and over again. I have followed the instructions exactly many times and nothing works.

preview: Netflix is my favorite streaming device to watch movies, tv series, etc of all devices and websites. Netflix is the best for me actually. My family loves Netflix too because the price is good and everybody watches together in my home.
review: Netflix is my favorite streaming device to watch movies, tv series, etc of all devices and websites. Netflix is the best for me actually. My family loves Netflix too because the price is good and everybody watches together in my home.

preview: I like Netflix. I wished it had more old movies and Disney movies. I have not tried any of the other streaming options. I do have Amazon Prime but have not "played" with it. It's too bad I couldn't search for anything I wanted to watch and Netflix could
review: I like Netflix. I wished it had more old movies and Disney movies. I have not tried any of the other streaming options. I do have Amazon Prime but have not "played" with it. It's too bad I couldn't search for anything I wanted to watch and Netflix could find it and allow me to watch.

preview: Like most of the options on the service. But disappointed when favorite series such as Lost in Space and The Good Cop show for one season only and then are dropped. Options are more limited than at first.
review: Like most of the options on the service. But disappointed when favorite series such as Lost in Space and The Good Cop show for one season only and then are dropped. Options are more limited than at first.

preview: There should be a lesser charge for this services than what they're charging... Hopefully there will be better services that will help the consumer with this. More movies on these streaming quality is great but more services.
review: There should be a lesser charge for this services than what they're charging... Hopefully there will be better services that will help the consumer with this. More movies on these streaming quality is great but more services.

preview: Recently cancelled service due to lack of content and rate increase. Streaming service and online customer interface good but new content not very good. Definitely not worth the monthly charges after the rate increase.
review: Recently cancelled service due to lack of content and rate increase. Streaming service and online customer interface good but new content not very good. Definitely not worth the monthly charges after the rate increase.

preview: Good series shows; movies not so hot. With Netflix losing Disney and having Hulu & Amazon as their direct competitors, Netflix has to step it up producing better movies.
review: Good series shows; movies not so hot. With Netflix losing Disney and having Hulu & Amazon as their direct competitors, Netflix has to step it up producing better movies.

preview: Netflix has been the gold standard in streaming. No down time. No problems. Let's see how they do as they transform into something more HBO-like with unique programming. So far it's been great but I am a little concerned about the exit of Marvel shows. F
review: Netflix has been the gold standard in streaming. No down time. No problems. Let's see how they do as they transform into something more HBO-like with unique programming. So far it's been great but I am a little concerned about the exit of Marvel shows. For now, certainly sticking with them.

preview: The quality of the video varies, but it seems to be at 720. The variety of shows are hard to gauge because they make too many suggestions. I like such a variety of shows and films, basing any algorithms on my last ten viewings will not satisfy my true vi
review: The quality of the video varies, but it seems to be at 720. The variety of shows are hard to gauge because they make too many suggestions. I like such a variety of shows and films, basing any algorithms on my last ten viewings will not satisfy my true viewing habits.

preview: I stream Netflix and watch thru a TiVo device on my tv. It is hard for me to find content that I like as the description and fact that actors are not readily available. Otherwise I am very happy with Netflix.
review: I stream Netflix and watch thru a TiVo device on my tv. It is hard for me to find content that I like as the description and fact that actors are not readily available. Otherwise I am very happy with Netflix.

preview: This service is on par with most others and it is worth the money. I have been involved for a couple of years now. The programming is about middle of the road and so is the cost.
review: This service is on par with most others and it is worth the money. I have been involved for a couple of years now. The programming is about middle of the road and so is the cost.

preview: I access this service through Android boxes and find the apps are far from ideal, unresponsive, hard to navigate as they are usually aimed at touch screen devices... I really don't care if Netflix DO NOT right and fix these apps. Just know I must use the
review: I access this service through Android boxes and find the apps are far from ideal, unresponsive, hard to navigate as they are usually aimed at touch screen devices... I really don't care if Netflix DO NOT right and fix these apps. Just know I must use these apps if I want to access Netflix services. The money they are making a small portion SHOULD be used to polish and even replace with their own apps especially as there is other service available and more coming.

preview: I really like Netflix. There is a variety of different shows, movies and television shows one can watch. I like that I can stream it on my phones and computers and it lets me resume whatever I was watching from one device to the next.
review: I really like Netflix. There is a variety of different shows, movies and television shows one can watch. I like that I can stream it on my phones and computers and it lets me resume whatever I was watching from one device to the next.

preview: Fairly pathetic selection, costs keep rising. Good shows keep being removed, some shows only have a few seasons available. I feel like there's less selection than there was four years ago. I don't need a section for Korean and Japanese shows, I'd prefer
review: Fairly pathetic selection, costs keep rising. Good shows keep being removed, some shows only have a few seasons available. I feel like there's less selection than there was four years ago. I don't need a section for Korean and Japanese shows, I'd prefer an option between that or stuff I'd actually watch.

preview: When I started I had a good rate and then they dropped me and when I wanted to check what was wrong they charged me a higher rate. I like service but not the bait and switch as far as the monthly fee goes.
review: When I started I had a good rate and then they dropped me and when I wanted to check what was wrong they charged me a higher rate. I like service but not the bait and switch as far as the monthly fee goes.

preview: Netflix has too many stops. While you watch a movie a circle with percentages keeps spinning around. Too many movies in other languages. If they would put them in English it would be a lot better. Otherwise the streaming service would be great.
review: Netflix has too many stops. While you watch a movie a circle with percentages keeps spinning around. Too many movies in other languages. If they would put them in English it would be a lot better. Otherwise the streaming service would be great.

preview: I have had Netflix for years and feel that it has declined in movie selection and now runs second to Amazon Prime. I'm retired and I watch a lot of movies and find better choices on Prime. I may drop Netflix.
review: I have had Netflix for years and feel that it has declined in movie selection and now runs second to Amazon Prime. I'm retired and I watch a lot of movies and find better choices on Prime. I may drop Netflix.

preview: It was a good value when I started with them (over 10 years ago) but, now their selections are worse, their categories not to my selection and their price hikes make it very likely that as soon as my daughter stops watching their children shows, I will l
review: It was a good value when I started with them (over 10 years ago) but, now their selections are worse, their categories not to my selection and their price hikes make it very likely that as soon as my daughter stops watching their children shows, I will leave them. I get better value with other channels I purchase.

preview: I am happy with the Netflix service, although it would be nice if the designers would make the website easier to navigate. I would also appreciate if the servers were improved so I would not be knocked out of a program and unable to see yet for an hour.
review: I am happy with the Netflix service, although it would be nice if the designers would make the website easier to navigate. I would also appreciate if the servers were improved so I would not be knocked out of a program and unable to see yet for an hour.

preview: Well we have Netflix and I rarely use it but my teenage daughter is always watching Netflix on her laptop so in my book Netflix is two thumbs up. I only wish it offered a few more plans but when I use it I usually have no problems.
review: Well we have Netflix and I rarely use it but my teenage daughter is always watching Netflix on her laptop so in my book Netflix is two thumbs up. I only wish it offered a few more plans but when I use it I usually have no problems.

preview: The Netflix app has been a wonderful streaming service for some time now, flawless. The original series have been really good and the non-4K quality is so good we didn’t notice a difference between the two.
review: The Netflix app has been a wonderful streaming service for some time now, flawless. The original series have been really good and the non-4K quality is so good we didn’t notice a difference between the two.

preview: The issue and challenge for streaming services like Netflix or any other streaming vendor is to keep the consumer happy. Ease of use, access and speedy resolution of any issues as well as a good price structure for all income levels is essential. Netflix
review: The issue and challenge for streaming services like Netflix or any other streaming vendor is to keep the consumer happy. Ease of use, access and speedy resolution of any issues as well as a good price structure for all income levels is essential. Netflix, in my opinion has done all of the above but it remains to be seen if they improve even more.

preview: My experience is that it is extremely difficult to find quality movies and shows on Netflix. They can be found, but you have to do a lot of digging and scrolling through stuff that you couldn't pay me to watch.
review: My experience is that it is extremely difficult to find quality movies and shows on Netflix. They can be found, but you have to do a lot of digging and scrolling through stuff that you couldn't pay me to watch.

preview: Love the variety on Netflix. So many choices make me not going back to cable anytime soon. Quality shows that are first rate. Really like they are showing movies in theaters and Netflix at same time.
review: Love the variety on Netflix. So many choices make me not going back to cable anytime soon. Quality shows that are first rate. Really like they are showing movies in theaters and Netflix at same time.

preview: I've had Netflix for 7 years and it's adequate. But I feel there are some older movies and newer releases that could be made available. Also over the time I've been watching Netflix, it has dropped movies like The Longest Day and other older movies I'd l
review: I've had Netflix for 7 years and it's adequate. But I feel there are some older movies and newer releases that could be made available. Also over the time I've been watching Netflix, it has dropped movies like The Longest Day and other older movies I'd like to watch over. I do like watching the TV series and Netflix series without commercial interruptions.

preview: Netflix does not put enough new movies, a lot of movie 80 percent are just junk with no head no tail. You almost had to wait 3 to 4 months for new movies and stories. They need to focus on better films and series.
review: Netflix does not put enough new movies, a lot of movie 80 percent are just junk with no head no tail. You almost had to wait 3 to 4 months for new movies and stories. They need to focus on better films and series.

preview: So many times the movie stops and freezes up and I can't continue watching the movie. It's so frustrating. Happens too often. I'll be watching a movie and into it about 2/3 of the way and the movie locks up, but then you can't get it to reopen again to f
review: So many times the movie stops and freezes up and I can't continue watching the movie. It's so frustrating. Happens too often. I'll be watching a movie and into it about 2/3 of the way and the movie locks up, but then you can't get it to reopen again to finish the movie. Hate to pay for a movie that I can't watch.

preview: Netflix is so easy to use. If you watch a lot of Netflix Original series it will remember which show you left off with. It will go to the most recent one. If you need to search for a show, it is very user-friendly. I would recommend Netflix to anyone loo
review: Netflix is so easy to use. If you watch a lot of Netflix Original series it will remember which show you left off with. It will go to the most recent one. If you need to search for a show, it is very user-friendly. I would recommend Netflix to anyone looking for a great streaming network.

preview: Overall, NF does ok. The streaming quality could be better even when viewed at highest settings. I like the interface as a general note, but the way they organize movies can be confusing. I would prefer a more straight-forward directory structure. The bi
review: Overall, NF does ok. The streaming quality could be better even when viewed at highest settings. I like the interface as a general note, but the way they organize movies can be confusing. I would prefer a more straight-forward directory structure. The biggest complaint is the content. While they get a lot of the bigger movies, at the same time I feel there is a lot left off. At the same time, the NF original content has been pretty good and if they continue, NF could be a real player in the cord-cutting, play-on-demand world.

preview: Lots of things to watch that NETFLIX produced but content is eerily similar on most of their productions. More movies from the 80's, 90's and current would make this better. And you lost me with your political documentaries which are obviously left leani
review: Lots of things to watch that NETFLIX produced but content is eerily similar on most of their productions. More movies from the 80's, 90's and current would make this better. And you lost me with your political documentaries which are obviously left leaning. YOU have viewers who are conservative, at least act like you give a crap.

preview: Netflix is great! I appreciate that they cover both TV and movies. I would love to see them have more variety. I do not like the old movies, and prefer the newest ones available. I love the fact that we can tailor the collections to a viewer. That really
review: Netflix is great! I appreciate that they cover both TV and movies. I would love to see them have more variety. I do not like the old movies, and prefer the newest ones available. I love the fact that we can tailor the collections to a viewer. That really helps to personalize things. Plus it keeps the kids from seeing "scary" things they don't want to see.

preview: Netflix gives the most bang for the buck! Their original programming is outstanding! I would like to them more in-line with Hulu in providing new Network content a few days after it airs; however not understanding the complexities of licensing and contra
review: Netflix gives the most bang for the buck! Their original programming is outstanding! I would like to them more in-line with Hulu in providing new Network content a few days after it airs; however not understanding the complexities of licensing and contract structure, that may not be a viable/profitable road for them. They are the best and handling bandwidth during peak hours as I never see a streaming issue with Netflix as I do with some of the other major streaming services. There is definitely room to branch out on TV content and perhaps some local options in the future. All in all, Netflix is our go to service.

preview: So the Netflix streaming selection has some very interesting selections that are relatively new. The product should keep the classic movies as well as academy award movies from 1958 to present. Would create more interested audience.
review: So the Netflix streaming selection has some very interesting selections that are relatively new. The product should keep the classic movies as well as academy award movies from 1958 to present. Would create more interested audience.

preview: Netflix is impressive. The diversity of content is excellent. I have quality issues with the streaming, but it isn't oppressive. The cost versus selection is good. There are many shows and movies that are weak, but the aggressive approach Netflix is taki
review: Netflix is impressive. The diversity of content is excellent. I have quality issues with the streaming, but it isn't oppressive. The cost versus selection is good. There are many shows and movies that are weak, but the aggressive approach Netflix is taking is amazing.

preview: Netflix is a great service, and I especially like their original programming which is some of the best on TV. I also enjoy some of the international programming as well, which you can’t find on most services. They even have some original programming from
review: Netflix is a great service, and I especially like their original programming which is some of the best on TV. I also enjoy some of the international programming as well, which you can’t find on most services. They even have some original programming from other countries, which is very cool.

preview: The service is fine but as the holidays are here especially Christmas the show options made me feel as if the holiday was just for & celebrated by only **. Diversity is limited and the option for English isn't available for some of their programs.
review: The service is fine but as the holidays are here especially Christmas the show options made me feel as if the holiday was just for & celebrated by only **. Diversity is limited and the option for English isn't available for some of their programs.

preview: For the most part the service is great but there are a lot of assumptions made about what someone watches - ex. check out one documentary and you drown in them and are forever being offered what they think you want, can’t we pick for ourselves?
review: For the most part the service is great but there are a lot of assumptions made about what someone watches - ex. check out one documentary and you drown in them and are forever being offered what they think you want, can’t we pick for ourselves?

preview: They swap out programs and get rid of good ones too often. I need to stop making so many Netflix originals And stick to what people want to see. Change is good what service should be done or what people are watching other than just taking away good progr
review: They swap out programs and get rid of good ones too often. I need to stop making so many Netflix originals And stick to what people want to see. Change is good what service should be done or what people are watching other than just taking away good programs.

preview: It is nice having access to over a million movies, cartoons, and television shows, all in the power of the box, and constantly changing, and always updated, and on point. It is also nice to look back a few years, in the media, and to have the switch betw
review: It is nice having access to over a million movies, cartoons, and television shows, all in the power of the box, and constantly changing, and always updated, and on point. It is also nice to look back a few years, in the media, and to have the switch between real tv and fake tv.

preview: Excellent, great service at low cost. Great movies, fun shows and awesome original content. Easy to use, friendly app and can use it almost everywhere. High definition content, original series.
review: Excellent, great service at low cost. Great movies, fun shows and awesome original content. Easy to use, friendly app and can use it almost everywhere. High definition content, original series.

preview: Netflix banned me claiming they heard I did something - but will not tell me what I supposedly did. I did nothing and am fighting it. I have been banned for life and it impacts my ability to earn a living. 8 months now. What did I do so bad to be banned
review: Netflix banned me claiming they heard I did something - but will not tell me what I supposedly did. I did nothing and am fighting it. I have been banned for life and it impacts my ability to earn a living. 8 months now. What did I do so bad to be banned forever and if I really did such a thing why won't they tell me what I did? I think an employee who stuck his ** in my back is getting back at me - I did not name names but told Netflix this could lead to more sexual harr. complaints and they should be careful and then I am BANNED!!! Me thinks there is something very rotten in Netflix.

preview: I turned off my cable and all I have is Netflix. I never have any problems with it and I don't think that you can beat the price and choice of movies. I love the wide variety of choices of movies and regular TV shows.
review: I turned off my cable and all I have is Netflix. I never have any problems with it and I don't think that you can beat the price and choice of movies. I love the wide variety of choices of movies and regular TV shows.

preview: Too many times it says too many viewing and try again later. We also get rebuffering which we should not have since we have Verizon FiOS and 75 Mbps streaming ability. This tells me the issue lies with Netflix and overuse of Verizon's processing the stre
review: Too many times it says too many viewing and try again later. We also get rebuffering which we should not have since we have Verizon FiOS and 75 Mbps streaming ability. This tells me the issue lies with Netflix and overuse of Verizon's processing the streaming. Until they get it together they cannot expect satisfied consumers.

preview: Netflix offers a wide variety of programs for an affordable price. I rarely miss having network TV. CBS All-Access has a habit of freezing up the screen, Netflix almost never does that. I’ve tried Starz and Amazon Prime also, but Netflix is my go-to stre
review: Netflix offers a wide variety of programs for an affordable price. I rarely miss having network TV. CBS All-Access has a habit of freezing up the screen, Netflix almost never does that. I’ve tried Starz and Amazon Prime also, but Netflix is my go-to streaming service.

preview: I believe the streaming quality is very good most of the time. I also like the ability to stop and start a program with one push of a button. But the language is very rough in most of the Netflix produced series. It would be so much better without the **
review: I believe the streaming quality is very good most of the time. I also like the ability to stop and start a program with one push of a button. But the language is very rough in most of the Netflix produced series. It would be so much better without the ** word every sentence.

preview: I really like Netflix and watch all the time. Just wish it could have live tv and sports. The cost for what I’m watching is extremely reasonable but cable and others offers are way expensive. Netflix is heading in the right direction with their own shows
review: I really like Netflix and watch all the time. Just wish it could have live tv and sports. The cost for what I’m watching is extremely reasonable but cable and others offers are way expensive. Netflix is heading in the right direction with their own shows.

preview: Best streaming service for our family out there. I love that not only can I watch on my Roku but now we can watch more easily and quickly on out Xfinity Comcast cable box. Since Comcast allows us to search along with their options we barely have need for
review: Best streaming service for our family out there. I love that not only can I watch on my Roku but now we can watch more easily and quickly on out Xfinity Comcast cable box. Since Comcast allows us to search along with their options we barely have need for the Roku streaming device. If it wasn’t for the occasional Hulu show or rare Amazon show we would not have need for the Roku device.

preview: I hate it when you're watching a show and Netflix discontinues it. They don't have the good shows or movies you want to see. I get it with my Comcast that's why I have it. I do like their movies. Netflix makes some good movies and tv shows.
review: I hate it when you're watching a show and Netflix discontinues it. They don't have the good shows or movies you want to see. I get it with my Comcast that's why I have it. I do like their movies. Netflix makes some good movies and tv shows.

preview: Great movies at a reasonable price. Great selection of action movies and horror movies. It would be great to see newer releases. The prices for this services compared to others is budget friendly. Netflix has the largest library of movies to my knowledge
review: Great movies at a reasonable price. Great selection of action movies and horror movies. It would be great to see newer releases. The prices for this services compared to others is budget friendly. Netflix has the largest library of movies to my knowledge.

preview: I love Netflix. I can watch all kinds of shows, whenever and wherever I want, and the cost is minimal. So MUCH better than cable or satellite TV. And there are no hidden fees or extra costs like with cable, or even Amazon.
review: I love Netflix. I can watch all kinds of shows, whenever and wherever I want, and the cost is minimal. So MUCH better than cable or satellite TV. And there are no hidden fees or extra costs like with cable, or even Amazon.

preview: Lots of different shows on Netflix -- I'm a little disappointed that they don't have all of the movies available to stream that they have on their DVD plan, but I don't want the extra expense of having both plans/services.
review: Lots of different shows on Netflix -- I'm a little disappointed that they don't have all of the movies available to stream that they have on their DVD plan, but I don't want the extra expense of having both plans/services.

preview: Did a free trial in June or July 2018 and canceled within the month. Got emails from Netflix saying come back to Netflix with free trial. I signed up expecting what the email stated, a free trial. Apparently that wasn't the case because only 1 free trial
review: Did a free trial in June or July 2018 and canceled within the month. Got emails from Netflix saying come back to Netflix with free trial. I signed up expecting what the email stated, a free trial. Apparently that wasn't the case because only 1 free trial is offered per year, but that wasn't made clear at the time of sign up. Beware. Come back for a free trial isn't free and what I would consider to be deceptive advertising.

preview: My service is suppose to be billed on the 10th! Well in Nov. I guess I didn't have it on my card. And instead of the message or email popping up Houston we have a problem...they wait until the 21st and charge again. And I never noticed. Then this month I
review: My service is suppose to be billed on the 10th! Well in Nov. I guess I didn't have it on my card. And instead of the message or email popping up Houston we have a problem...they wait until the 21st and charge again. And I never noticed. Then this month I am thinking that it has been paid already on the 10th so I do not have to worry about it anymore...wrong! They charged me on the 21st not on the 10th like they were suppose to. Then when I call customer service like, "Hey y'all inconvenienced me and charged whenever you felt like it and I got stranded at work 'cause you took my Lyft ride money off my card." So I said makes me feel like I can't Netflix anymore and I should cancel and go to a different movie site. She treated me like a child and refused to listen to me. Threatened to hang up on me! Cancelled my subscription without confirming that's what I wanted to do...and then hung up on me!!!

preview: I got a Netflix gift card for Christmas. Some of the PIN number came off and could not be used. I called customer service and they confirmed I was calling from the US and the card was purchased in the US. They emailed me a new code which was great. Tried
review: I got a Netflix gift card for Christmas. Some of the PIN number came off and could not be used. I called customer service and they confirmed I was calling from the US and the card was purchased in the US. They emailed me a new code which was great. Tried to redeem the code to open a new account and the country did not match. Called back and they said the original card was purchased in Brazil so they gave me a code for that country. So after being in the phone for over an hour while "they checked on it" I was told there was nothing they could do, even though they gave me the wrong code. So they suggested I just purchase another card. Will not be opening an account.

preview: Netflix has something for everyone at an affordable cost. A huge inventory of films and TV shows both old and new. Streaming is good and connects to your choice in an instant. None of the others come close for cost, variety and service.
review: Netflix has something for everyone at an affordable cost. A huge inventory of films and TV shows both old and new. Streaming is good and connects to your choice in an instant. None of the others come close for cost, variety and service.

preview: They offer a lot of shows that I enjoy and never a lag. I like Netflix, but they need to stop with the rate increases, need at least a 5 year freeze. Great streaming but they also need some stiff competition.
review: They offer a lot of shows that I enjoy and never a lag. I like Netflix, but they need to stop with the rate increases, need at least a 5 year freeze. Great streaming but they also need some stiff competition.

preview: I love the variety and the ability to watch what I want when I want for a low monthly cost. And each person having their own log in helps filter what we each like to watch. Updated new movies are great.
review: I love the variety and the ability to watch what I want when I want for a low monthly cost. And each person having their own log in helps filter what we each like to watch. Updated new movies are great.

preview: Poor video quality on full screen. Shipping on DVDs gets s l o w e r and slower. Their idea of 'cerebral' isn't mine. Not enough UK material. That's all I have to say.
review: Poor video quality on full screen. Shipping on DVDs gets s l o w e r and slower. Their idea of 'cerebral' isn't mine. Not enough UK material. That's all I have to say.

preview: I like Netflix for there are different movie to watch. What I don't like when I put in an actresses' or actors' name I can find a movie they made. I can't even go far back as 1970 or 1980. That would be helpful to be able to do that.
review: I like Netflix for there are different movie to watch. What I don't like when I put in an actresses' or actors' name I can find a movie they made. I can't even go far back as 1970 or 1980. That would be helpful to be able to do that.

review: Netflix has decent variety, is more reliable and easy to work than Amazon. Amazon is difficult to fast forward and requires more bandwidth. Hulu doesn't have enough good programming. Amazon's programming is great.

review: Netflix is good. The streaming itself is good, and the options are good. But it's hard to find movies to watch quickly and have to search too many if you don't have a name to look up.

preview: Some of the movies are pretty old and the site repeats itself in the categories rather than just showing what’s available. I like movies so that’s basically why I stream when tv has nothing to watch.
review: Some of the movies are pretty old and the site repeats itself in the categories rather than just showing what’s available. I like movies so that’s basically why I stream when tv has nothing to watch.

preview: My brother got this free for one year from his cellphone provider. We sign on at my home too. Some good shows, especially at this time of the year when everything is. Repeat! This is a great time for Netflix.
review: My brother got this free for one year from his cellphone provider. We sign on at my home too. Some good shows, especially at this time of the year when everything is. Repeat! This is a great time for Netflix.

preview: Overwhelming amount of content - some excellent, some a waste of time. To help choose I rely on the streaming portion of TV Guide and Entertainment Weekly. I find most of the Netflix productions to be very good. My wife and I have "cut the cable" and rel
review: Overwhelming amount of content - some excellent, some a waste of time. To help choose I rely on the streaming portion of TV Guide and Entertainment Weekly. I find most of the Netflix productions to be very good. My wife and I have "cut the cable" and rely on Netflix, Amazon Prime, CBSN and our antenna to provide our TV entertainment.

preview: Some of the new Netflix originals are quite good. I especially liked Bird Box. But the lack of a wide variety of shows, especially documentaries is disappointing. The user interface is clumsy and makes it difficult to find shows (TiVo). After a couple of
review: Some of the new Netflix originals are quite good. I especially liked Bird Box. But the lack of a wide variety of shows, especially documentaries is disappointing. The user interface is clumsy and makes it difficult to find shows (TiVo). After a couple of mistakes I usually give up looking. I'm really not interested in the grouping of shows I can scroll through as much as I am being able to easily find a show by title or genre (without scrolling).

preview: I am really happy with it, after the hundreds of lame channels on satellite TV. It is really a refreshing change, I think it's a great service, completely satisfied. Navigation of the programming is simple enough for an older person to navigate easily, e
review: I am really happy with it, after the hundreds of lame channels on satellite TV. It is really a refreshing change, I think it's a great service, completely satisfied. Navigation of the programming is simple enough for an older person to navigate easily, even for a 69 year old.

preview: One of the least expensive basic streaming services - but the variety of international films and video clips on Youtube is better and free. Both now have commercials but you can fast forward over them.
review: One of the least expensive basic streaming services - but the variety of international films and video clips on Youtube is better and free. Both now have commercials but you can fast forward over them.

preview: I find many Netflix financed movies to be of questionable quality and have been disappointed when shows we were following were dropped before they ended. Like Longmire and Glades but never saw the end of Glades. Enjoyed Ozarks.
review: I find many Netflix financed movies to be of questionable quality and have been disappointed when shows we were following were dropped before they ended. Like Longmire and Glades but never saw the end of Glades. Enjoyed Ozarks.

preview: Netflix is no longer the go to service. I just got off with Sean, a customer service rep who not only did nothing to help with my issue, but did not even ask my name or account information. My original issue is with Netflix's windows 10 app. Very buggy.
review:
Netflix is no longer the go to service. I just got off with Sean, a customer service rep who not only did nothing to help with my issue, but did not even ask my name or account information. My original issue is with Netflix's windows 10 app. Very buggy. I use it to download movies/TV Series that are available for download. Issue here is I get lots of error messages. NOTE: I did not get these errors with my phone, but my phone does not have lots of storage space. So, I switched to my laptop which does. Error codes I get are "you have downloaded too many videos, delete and try again". This is not a correct error, verified by Netflix. I would try it again 2 to 3 times, and it would then download. Another error is "you have reached your yearly download limit "
Read full review

preview: This was great when we first got it but the cost is causing concern and we may get rid of it soon. The cost is too much and it's going up again. This will be twice since I got it. We have four people in our house that uses Netflix and have to pay extra f
review: This was great when we first got it but the cost is causing concern and we may get rid of it soon. The cost is too much and it's going up again. This will be twice since I got it. We have four people in our house that uses Netflix and have to pay extra for all four to watch at the same time.

review: I enjoy Netflix in particular the wide variety of movies and because Netflix has old movies as well. I also enjoy viewing on Netflix the British movies and foreign movies and programs. Netflix is definitely for me.

review: I’m very happy with the service. The ease of access and low cost are definitely a perk. I’d recommend Netflix to anyone looking to start a streaming service.

review: The HD 4K version is a great format, you need an old Classics section. Also a search section. The sound and lighting needs a better balance. The Ranch has terrible lighting and sound is way too low. You also need to check info without going out of the show.

preview: The cost is becoming an issue now. Jacking it up so much recently has made me consider cancelling it as so many others are thinking the same too. It's not like we don't have options. I will probably be cancelling it in January 2019 unless the increase is
review: The cost is becoming an issue now. Jacking it up so much recently has made me consider cancelling it as so many others are thinking the same too. It's not like we don't have options. I will probably be cancelling it in January 2019 unless the increase is reversed. It's not necessary and does not get as much use anymore. When it was under 10 it was not in view. Really bad decision to jack it up like that as piss off the customers royally. Bye, Bye Netflix!

preview: I love the choices but I noticed it’s gearing their shows more for younger audience and I fear my older crowd will be forgotten. I love the sci-fi shows and spooky ones too. Just the teenage shows played by 26 year old actors suck.
review: I love the choices but I noticed it’s gearing their shows more for younger audience and I fear my older crowd will be forgotten. I love the sci-fi shows and spooky ones too. Just the teenage shows played by 26 year old actors suck.

preview: Why are you raising prices when you don't have a lot of shows available. Also they are taking away favorites all the time. Oh and the password sharing, it should be our personal decision to share our password. For one I like Hulu a lot better and Amazon
review: Why are you raising prices when you don't have a lot of shows available. Also they are taking away favorites all the time. Oh and the password sharing, it should be our personal decision to share our password. For one I like Hulu a lot better and Amazon prime.

preview: Netflix does not have any titles you search. Not one. What am I paying for if the movies I want to see are never available? I'm done with Netflix. Hulu it is. It's ridiculous - you claim you have the greatest movies and shows but can't produce the eviden
review: Netflix does not have any titles you search. Not one. What am I paying for if the movies I want to see are never available? I'm done with Netflix. Hulu it is. It's ridiculous - you claim you have the greatest movies and shows but can't produce the evidence.

preview: Received an email stating: "So much has changed since you left. Netflix keeps getting better. Don’t worry, there are still no commitments or commercials. What's new? We've added many more TV shows and movies for you to enjoy. ENJOY ANOTHER FREE TRIAL." S
review: Received an email stating: "So much has changed since you left. Netflix keeps getting better. Don’t worry, there are still no commitments or commercials. What's new? We've added many more TV shows and movies for you to enjoy. ENJOY ANOTHER FREE TRIAL." So, I sign up and enter my credit card info and a message pops up saying I'm not eligible. I was like what the heck? I just received the email 2 days ago. So I contact them and because I used the same credit card as before I'm not eligible??? I only own one credit card. This is nothing but a scam.

preview: Yes Netflix does some good original content but it's far and few between. No more customer reviews really made me upset and no matter what I dislike those shows, and movies, are the first to show up. Their algorithm needs to be updated and it seems like
review: Yes Netflix does some good original content but it's far and few between. No more customer reviews really made me upset and no matter what I dislike those shows, and movies, are the first to show up. Their algorithm needs to be updated and it seems like they don't care. Original shows like 'Big Mouth' and 'Hilda' are spectacular but I don't think I'll keep renewing based off a few hits for the plethora of misses.

preview: I got Netflix for my children. We used to love it because they had all their favorite shows but now they don't have half of their shows or movies. I lose signal and it says error 427, and now they are going to charge more for a service that is not that g
review: I got Netflix for my children. We used to love it because they had all their favorite shows but now they don't have half of their shows or movies. I lose signal and it says error 427, and now they are going to charge more for a service that is not that good. I also have Hulu. I will stay with Hulu. It's not worth.

preview: Be aware Netflix will allow you to sign up for a Free Trial, and then charge you for the Free Trial if you have not been unsubscribed from their service for a year. The sign up went smoothly, and was only a few steps. The Supervisor actually stated that
review: Be aware Netflix will allow you to sign up for a Free Trial, and then charge you for the Free Trial if you have not been unsubscribed from their service for a year. The sign up went smoothly, and was only a few steps. The Supervisor actually stated that the system would have reflected being ineligible for the trial. It never reflected the information he stated it did. They also stated their system did not show the trial request being completed, although it was. Netflix also stated that everyone signs up the same way whether it is a Free Trial or not. Tried to set up again, to check for any information about being ineligible, and nothing states you are not eligible. Also was told that I had to call in seven days for a refund of the money I did not know I was being charged. Because I did not call in seven days the charge cannot be refunded according to their policy. Netflix is very interested in keeping their fee, and very uninterested in retaining a customer.

preview: Just signed onto Netflix on January 10, 2019. So far so good. For $7.99 per month, this is a really good deal! I love the movie selections and they have a lot of the 70's sitcoms I grew up with and like to watch! (Cheers, That 70's Show, Andy Griffith...
review: Just signed onto Netflix on January 10, 2019. So far so good. For $7.99 per month, this is a really good deal! I love the movie selections and they have a lot of the 70's sitcoms I grew up with and like to watch! (Cheers, That 70's Show, Andy Griffith....). I do not understand why all the low ratings but I guess I will see how it goes as time goes on. I am only sorry I didn't sign up sooner. I canceled my cable TV. Bought an antenna and getting all my major channels free and now paying far less than cable with Netflix!

preview: We live in the mountains and have no cable or gigabytes so signed up for Netflix. We went from 2 movies at a time to 3 movies at a time. The trouble is they get movies back from us but don't mail any DVDs back to us especially on Mondays and Fridays. We'
review: We live in the mountains and have no cable or gigabytes so signed up for Netflix. We went from 2 movies at a time to 3 movies at a time. The trouble is they get movies back from us but don't mail any DVDs back to us especially on Mondays and Fridays. We've also had many movies never show up or received broken DVDs. Their customer service people could care less. They always say they received the mail late so didn't have a chance to send any more out. This is literally happening every Monday and Friday. But what can we do? We need some sort of entertainment up here by Lake Tahoe.

preview: Ok why does NETFLIX change their pictures on the movies You search through? And can't find a decent movie but good old NETFLIX decide to change the film covers on their films. So you end up looking at them only to find out you have already have seen them
review: Ok why does NETFLIX change their pictures on the movies You search through? And can't find a decent movie but good old NETFLIX decide to change the film covers on their films. So you end up looking at them only to find out you have already have seen them. Please Netflix you will lose more customers by trying to trick them (YOU ARE) So please stop!!! Just add more up to date movies Or just keep what you have and do not try it On!!! Let us decide if we want to carry on with your subscription.

preview: I was attempting to make a payment yesterday via my laptop with my banking information. The next morning I was notified by my bank of a fraud charge over $500 on my charge card. This happened as a result of my information being hacked while entering data
review: I was attempting to make a payment yesterday via my laptop with my banking information. The next morning I was notified by my bank of a fraud charge over $500 on my charge card. This happened as a result of my information being hacked while entering data through NETFLIX payment options. I was fortunate to have a fraud protection in place and was notified by my bank prior to making the payment. I immediately called and cancelled my NETFLIX account and closed my account to prevent further fraud charges being processed. There is hacking going on with this business. I have never had problems with hacking until last night. I am grateful for my bank taking the timely action to stop this fraud.

preview: I'm a 3 DVD customer and around late November 2018 the DVDs now come from Trenton, NJ instead of Greensboro, NC from where they use to mail to/from approximately from 2008 until November 2018. It can now take 5 or more days for them to show my return rec
review: I'm a 3 DVD customer and around late November 2018 the DVDs now come from Trenton, NJ instead of Greensboro, NC from where they use to mail to/from approximately from 2008 until November 2018. It can now take 5 or more days for them to show my return received and another day or three to send out another one back to me which can take 5 or more days. So now I can go up to two weekends without a movie. If this is the way they are going to do business I will be leaving this service. They have destroyed a once great service company.

preview: Very upset with hiking monthly Netflix fee. Some of Netflix film productions are good, some are terrible. Honestly, don't understand why increasing monthly fee since Canadian selection is inferior to US or other countries. I'd suggest make less but bette
review: Very upset with hiking monthly Netflix fee. Some of Netflix film productions are good, some are terrible. Honestly, don't understand why increasing monthly fee since Canadian selection is inferior to US or other countries. I'd suggest make less but better movies and keep price reasonable for everybody to afford subscription - not only rich. Don't spoil it for majority and less subscription for Netflix.

preview: Netflix has chosen to allow Saudi Arabia to censor US programs. I will cancel my Netflix if the program by comedian Hasan Minhaj continues to be censored by Netflix. Saudi Arabia Prince Mohammed bin Salam is responsible for the violent, disgusting murder
review: Netflix has chosen to allow Saudi Arabia to censor US programs. I will cancel my Netflix if the program by comedian Hasan Minhaj continues to be censored by Netflix. Saudi Arabia Prince Mohammed bin Salam is responsible for the violent, disgusting murder of a journalist working in the US. He deserves imprisonment not just comedic mockery.

preview: For two months I noticed that they withdrew money from my visa card two times. I cancelled my card and I called them and they gave me one month credit. This month they put my account on hold. I called them. They totally denied that I called and they said
review: For two months I noticed that they withdrew money from my visa card two times. I cancelled my card and I called them and they gave me one month credit. This month they put my account on hold. I called them. They totally denied that I called and they said they had only one payment and I had to call the bank to know where my other money went. I told them that it shows in my statement. The girl who was talking to me kept putting me on hold and then checked again if I was still on the line.

preview: They load the programming with foreign language movies/shows; some of which don't even have subtitles. The increased fees in order to provide viewing most Canadians can't watch is ludicrous. There isn't even an option to block these programs from your "s
review: They load the programming with foreign language movies/shows; some of which don't even have subtitles. The increased fees in order to provide viewing most Canadians can't watch is ludicrous. There isn't even an option to block these programs from your "suggested viewing."

preview: I have a "Two discs at a time" contract with NETFLIX DVD.com. Most of the time, I have no discs in my possession. When the company manages to notify me that it has shipped a disc or discs and projects an arrival time, the delivery is almost never on time
review:
I have a "Two discs at a time" contract with NETFLIX DVD.com. Most of the time, I have no discs in my possession. When the company manages to notify me that it has shipped a disc or discs and projects an arrival time, the delivery is almost never on time. I used to be able to put a returned disc in my mailbox and see it recorded on my Queue as returned within a day. Now the company doesn't report the return for two or three days, sometimes, the delay stretches to four days. Is it because, my distribution center in Northern Virginia was closed and my discs have to travel an extra 200 miles to Trenton, NJ? Who knows?
Read full review

preview: I've been a Netflix subscriber for 10 years now. Stuck with them even after increases in price. Well recently I guess they are on a cancellation spree canceling all Marvel shows. Don't know why extremely popular now. I think it's time to decrease price.
review: I've been a Netflix subscriber for 10 years now. Stuck with them even after increases in price. Well recently I guess they are on a cancellation spree canceling all Marvel shows. Don't know why extremely popular now. I think it's time to decrease price. They are doing a poor job now. Very disappointing. Hulu is starting to look better than Netflix.

preview: Basically the selection they have not updated regularly, and the quality of the movies are usually very bad, and there is no problem with my internet connection nor my device. I’ve reported that but there was no feedback at all. Not to mention there was
review: Basically the selection they have not updated regularly, and the quality of the movies are usually very bad, and there is no problem with my internet connection nor my device. I’ve reported that but there was no feedback at all. Not to mention there was an option to watch them on two screens so I’ve upgraded for a free trial and they charged me less than a week for it. When I called customer service it was incredibly disgusting manner they accepted my call, and they were saying their monologue the entire time. When I reached the point to feel this person I’m talking to is incompetent, I’ve ask for someone who I can take my issue further with, and they said there is no one, that’s the situation whether you like it or not. My opinion is DO NOT USE! The overall ratings across the internet about them speak for itself as well I suppose!

preview: Do not believe or use this service. They will charge you before you receive a 30 day trial. My friend was charged and they overdrawn his account saying that he had a device that had been used associated with his account which were lies to charge him. Sta
review: Do not believe or use this service. They will charge you before you receive a 30 day trial. My friend was charged and they overdrawn his account saying that he had a device that had been used associated with his account which were lies to charge him. Stay away from these lying services. Think twice about it!!

review: My debit order bounced, as my money was paid in later. I find it impossible to make a payment, reactivate my service. Trying to log in the system does not recognize my e-mail address... I am disgusted in this frustrating part of the Netflix service... I will not be back!!!

preview: I signed up for the free 30 day trial, only to be cut off after 14 days! This is not a good way to get customers... You are LIARS and should not be advertising FREE 30 DAYS when in fact, you ONLY GET A 14 DAY TRIAL THEN IT JUST STOPS WORKING... NEVER AGA
