preview: These thieves have been double billing me under my name for over 3 years. They had 2 of my credit card numbers one from Chase and one from Barclays bank and instead of canceling one which I did years ago they continued charging me on 2 different credit c
review: These thieves have been double billing me under my name for over 3 years. They had 2 of my credit card numbers one from Chase and one from Barclays bank and instead of canceling one which I did years ago they continued charging me on 2 different credit cards under my name for the same home and same 2 TVs. Their excuse is that they had 2 different email addresses----which seems to be true but both have my names in the email address and they are registered to my address at one home. THEY HAVE BEEN RIPPING ME OFF NOW SINCE 2014 AND THEY SEEM TO TAKE NO RESPONSIBILITY FOR THEIR MISTAKES...

preview: They hold your financial account information hostage. They give you no clear options to delete your account entirely as most reputable sites do. Not even the bare minimum to delete your credit card information. They make it so anyone can reactivate your
review:
They hold your financial account information hostage. They give you no clear options to delete your account entirely as most reputable sites do. Not even the bare minimum to delete your credit card information. They make it so anyone can reactivate your account without the need for a password and then claim to be vigilant about fraud as they siphon money from your account in amounts almost no one would notice. That is until you add up a year of paying for a service you thought you canceled. They make it so easy your two-year-old can hack into your account which is not really the proper word because hacking requires skill not the push of a button. This is laughable, to restart a canceled account, should at the very minimum require the password and that is basic security. Don't hijack my credit card information then leave it hanging out there for any person that can push a button to misuse.
Read full review

preview: I have been a customer since 2015. I just cancelled my account tonight after I logged into Netflix and discovered it was going up from 11.99 to 13.99. A 2 dollar increase. It also went up last year as well so since I have been a subscriber it has gone up
review:
I have been a customer since 2015. I just cancelled my account tonight after I logged into Netflix and discovered it was going up from 11.99 to 13.99. A 2 dollar increase. It also went up last year as well so since I have been a subscriber it has gone up twice. My mother husband and I shared the same account for 4 screens. It goes up and I am seeing less and less on there to watch. Not to mention low budget films that nobody including my husband mother and I will watch. Oh and I can't help but notice that the article came out yesterday on the 25th so those of you that pay on the 24th and 25th of December get to see a nice price increase. So much for waiting until January. Merry Christmas. Here is a price increase.
Read full review

preview: I have had Netflix since 2012 and have always been a promoter of them. I've not complained about price increases or account breaches. Today I realized that since the first month I signed up (June 2012) I have been getting charged twice a month by Netflix
review:
I have had Netflix since 2012 and have always been a promoter of them. I've not complained about price increases or account breaches. Today I realized that since the first month I signed up (June 2012) I have been getting charged twice a month by Netflix - every month until now!!! I called and was very polite and calm but was told, "We are only allowed to offer a few months free and a three-month refund." They could PHYSICALLY see where I was charged every month twice for 4 years!!! The customer care officer even said, "Wow that's over 700.00 that has been withdrawn since 2012." At first I was told to contact my bank and also PayPal... both of which laughed and said, "They received a payment twice a month for 4 years, not us. So who do you think you should be contacting!?"
Read full review

review: Netflix is trash. They sold out to Comcast. Now they have all the real movies and Netflix has all the low budget homemade movies. They never add new movies and had the audacity to raise the price and not a little. It is ridiculous. I think I will cancel my Netflix. It's not worth $1.

preview: I've been a customer with Netflix for a few years and like them, but in my second year I started seeing other names in my account that had been viewing movies. So I called Netflix and told them about it and all they told me was to log out and log back in
review:
I've been a customer with Netflix for a few years and like them, but in my second year I started seeing other names in my account that had been viewing movies. So I called Netflix and told them about it and all they told me was to log out and log back in and that should delete that person out. So it worked for a while and then it happen again so I did the step again. Since then I haven't had that problem again. Meanwhile I haven't been watching Netflix for awhile so I decided to go watch a movies to find out they close out my account because I haven't watched movies in a while. They told me that's why they close my account so they told me if I reopen it I have to change my password and my email so I did.
Read full review

preview: Netflix just sent notification for another price increase. I have already been dissatisfied with selection and the high volume of subtitle movies I have no interest in watching. It takes too long for new things to be added and way too many low budget mov
review: Netflix just sent notification for another price increase. I have already been dissatisfied with selection and the high volume of subtitle movies I have no interest in watching. It takes too long for new things to be added and way too many low budget movies. It takes at least a year and usually longer for popular shows to be added. Sorry Netflix, but I'm going with Hulu which is far better. You want to keep making price increases when I'm sure I was locked in but have had price increase a few times. What you offer is not worth it.

preview: Anyone who knows me knows I used to be a huge advocate of Netflix and that is for one reason... How I Met Your Mother! Netflix took it off and I have lost my bedtime show. So goodbye Netflix. Hello Hulu. I have used Netflix for years but I will suffer th
review: Anyone who knows me knows I used to be a huge advocate of Netflix and that is for one reason... How I Met Your Mother! Netflix took it off and I have lost my bedtime show. So goodbye Netflix. Hello Hulu. I have used Netflix for years but I will suffer through Hulu’s commercials if I have to until Netflix gets their ** together... That is all! Bring back HIMYM!!

preview: When I started with Netflix years ago we loved it!! Over the years it has gone down. We have watched everything and it was something the whole family enjoyed doing. They have taken so many of our favorite shows off and added all the bs... I cancelled my
review: When I started with Netflix years ago we loved it!! Over the years it has gone down. We have watched everything and it was something the whole family enjoyed doing. They have taken so many of our favorite shows off and added all the bs... I cancelled my subscription after 4 years and just decided last night to activate it again (it's been about 3 months wanted to see if they had anything new). After subscribing I get an e-mail saying the price is going up in December. Now here's my real question!!?? I understand Netflix is in debt but is it really fair to say you're bumping the price up so you can add more movies?? Why can't you say "we messed up by adding all these high rated movies and can't afford to pay out therefore we need you (the customers) to pull us out of debt"?? Be honest with your customers!!! So once again I'm cancelling my subscription and going somewhere else!! Thanks Netflix!!!

preview: Netflix customer service has been amazing every time I've called. I've never been on hold for longer than 1 minute, never been given wrong info. Comcast and DIRECTV have some major learning to do. Thank you Netflix for never having done me wrong like the
review: Netflix customer service has been amazing every time I've called. I've never been on hold for longer than 1 minute, never been given wrong info. Comcast and DIRECTV have some major learning to do. Thank you Netflix for never having done me wrong like the other companies have. You have never overcharged me like the other companies have either.

review: My account was hacked. Us being forced to close our account because we did not have our credit card at the moment to confirm our identity. When we called back within 1 hour to confirm they would not grant us our seniority since before 2012 at the price we had. They wanted to charge us more. Asked to speak with supervisor and no one came on. They either hide or the employees refused to put them on. We spoke to 4 representatives.

preview: I love Netflix, don’t get me wrong, but hearing about all of the fantastic and entertaining content they are removing from the website makes me VERY upset. For example, some classics like The Break-Up and Sky High are just a small amount that I LOVE to w
review: I love Netflix, don’t get me wrong, but hearing about all of the fantastic and entertaining content they are removing from the website makes me VERY upset. For example, some classics like The Break-Up and Sky High are just a small amount that I LOVE to watch whenever I feel like it. Netflix also took off The Titanic, which made me consider deleting my account altogether. So ATTENTION NETFLIX, you will be losing an extreme amount of publicity and popularity if you keep up with all of these removals. I might just end up having to switch to another company like Hulu or Vudu.

preview: Used to be a great service. They took away the rating system - which was a great system that let customers actually review the content - and replaced it with a system that does not work, doesn't allow feedback, and doesn't actually help you find anything
review: Used to be a great service. They took away the rating system - which was a great system that let customers actually review the content - and replaced it with a system that does not work, doesn't allow feedback, and doesn't actually help you find anything. (Pretty sure this was all because they were getting such horrible reviews on their failed Amy Schumer bit). They've now taken down a SEVERE number of series that they used to have available and replaced them with much more mediocre series that are produced by them. I only keep my subscription for a few movies and shows - they get rid of those too, and I'm gone.

preview: What chaps my cheeks about Netflix the most... is how when I click on a movie or show to add to my list, it automatically starts playing... and adds an additional 20 seconds to add the feature to my playlist... or to remove it... or to select an episode.
review: What chaps my cheeks about Netflix the most... is how when I click on a movie or show to add to my list, it automatically starts playing... and adds an additional 20 seconds to add the feature to my playlist... or to remove it... or to select an episode... or to just read about the feature... What doesn't chap my cheeks, but does hinder my heart, is how there are only 8 episodes of The Defenders... I work out at home, and only watch superhero stories when I want to workout, to get me motivated... I've stretched out the defenders as long as I could, but it's about to be completed. On a related matter... Sense8! Roar!

preview: Netflix is having technical difficulties which are interfering with my ability to use my account. I have spent hours on the phone with Netflix customer service agents & floor supervisors & everyone is telling me something different. One supervisor admitt
review: Netflix is having technical difficulties which are interfering with my ability to use my account. I have spent hours on the phone with Netflix customer service agents & floor supervisors & everyone is telling me something different. One supervisor admitted there is a "known issue affecting many customers" but the agents and some other supervisors don't seem to know anything about it... or just won't admit it. I'm frustrated with all the hours on the phone trying to get this straightened out. Some calls are routed overseas. Some agents are rude & incompetent. They finally said only way to fix is cancel service and open new account. And now ANOTHER PRICE INCREASE! When I first signed up for Netflix years ago there weren't a lot of other options... now there are. Shopping around for better service!!! I see HULU is about the same price & has Seinfeld & tons of other good stuff!

preview: Really appreciate having Netflix. We have only had Netflix for 1.5 years but plan on continuing. There is much to chose from and we are still getting used to finding things we like - we are seniors and find that a lot of shows are a bit more than we like
review: Really appreciate having Netflix. We have only had Netflix for 1.5 years but plan on continuing. However, if it is something we don't like, it is very easy to stop watching and find something new and better. This programming certainly beats watching all the advertising of normal television. I know there has to be advertising but 8 to 9 spots in a normal half hour show is too much. Thank you.

review: You watch a movie to see how it ends. Too often Netflix just ends it before it is over. They are adding too many foreign speaking movies. preview: Netflix used to be the end all be all. I'm not sure what happened, but the content pool continually gets smaller. Decent movies cycle in and out and low quality movies stay forever. There isn't a way to filter out what you've already watched, so you see
review: Netflix used to be the end all be all. I'm not sure what happened, but the content pool continually gets smaller. Decent movies cycle in and out and low quality movies stay forever. There isn't a way to filter out what you've already watched, so you see the same movies over and over, even if you've rated them poorly, to give the illusion that there are more choices than there actually are. Cancelled my subscription. Will re-up for a few months when Stranger Things comes back on, but will cancel afterward.

preview: I like the convenience of watching good shows on Netflix and I can stream on all my devices. I have really enjoyed using it but I would like to see more recent movies streamed.
review: I like the convenience of watching good shows on Netflix and I can stream on all my devices. I have really enjoyed using it but I would like to see more recent movies streamed.

preview: I gave myself Netflix as a Christmas present two years ago. It is a gift that keeps on giving. My friend who has cable never has anything he wants to watch but I can watch anything at any time with Netflix. Their Netflix own produced shows are really gre
review: I gave myself Netflix as a Christmas present two years ago. It is a gift that keeps on giving. My friend who has cable never has anything he wants to watch but I can watch anything at any time with Netflix. Their Netflix own produced shows are really great like Frankie and Grace and Orange is the New Black. The only thing lacking is they don't have a lot of movies if you have the internet version. You have to subscribe to the disc version to be sent to your house. The two subscriptions would make it too expensive for me so I just stick to Netflix on the laptop and go to Redbox where I can get instant gratification cheaper for movies. Overall for the selections available Netflix is a great buy and I would not give it up.

preview: Netflix has too many useless B movies and too many outdated movies way past their time. It takes forever to find a movie you’ll like only to discover it's another B movie.
review: Netflix has too many useless B movies and too many outdated movies way past their time. It takes forever to find a movie you’ll like only to discover it's another B movie.

preview: I cancelled Netflix due to old movies and the more recent movies are not available as streaming. Their selection is the same as Hulu which I also subscribe to so I cancelled Netflix and have not had any desire to renew in over a year.
review: I cancelled Netflix due to old movies and the more recent movies are not available as streaming. Their selection is the same as Hulu which I also subscribe to so I cancelled Netflix and have not had any desire to renew in over a year.

preview: Netflix has excellent streaming quality and monthly fee is also very reasonable, especially for the selection offered. Would like to see more classic movies if at all possible though.
review: Netflix has excellent streaming quality and monthly fee is also very reasonable, especially for the selection offered. Would like to see more classic movies if at all possible though.

preview: They dont let you know if the show has subtitles. They got rid of the ratings because 90% of the content is crap. It seems anybody with a GoPro can make a movie and Netflix shows it. Some of their series are good and that's the only reason I subscribe.

review: Netflix is pretty good streaming shows and also have better movies than Hulu Plus, however I don't like the fact that can't stream from the night before.

review: I love the variety. Found several British shows I could not find anywhere else. But have yet to discover Netflix only shows.

review: Netflix is a great online streaming media. Movies load great and play from beginning to end with no problem. I am disappointed in their selections. Big name star movies are few and far between. Even older movies with big stars are few. I would like to see a better selection of movies available.

preview: I am disturbed by the number of videos on Netflix these days that I am interested in only to pull them only and without warning they are in some language I do not understand.
review: I am disturbed by the number of videos on Netflix these days that I am interested in only to pull them only and without warning they are in some language I do not understand.

review: I really like Netflix especially now as it is attached to my smart TV. All I have to do is press a button to access it and I can watch all sorts of movies. The price is nice, but I wouldn't pay more to be able to have more than one TV at a time have access to it.

preview: The movies in Netflix are not current and it takes me a while to find one. If a movie has sequel to it, it should have all of them, not just 1. Some of the selections are not good.
review: The movies in Netflix are not current and it takes me a while to find one. If a movie has sequel to it, it should have all of them, not just 1. Some of the selections are not good.

review: Netflix is a good site and my kids enjoy the shows. The Netflix original shows are pretty good and the new release movies are also a hit. More current movies or episodes would be appreciated.

review: The service is good, only drawback is that content is limited for someone who isn't familiar with their service. However, for the price of the service, the content is worth it.

preview: This premium channel is one of only two that I watch regularly. I enjoy the variety of shows available but what has made me grow even fonder of Netflix is its own productions. Each time I am more impressed by the quality of the productions. To date I am
review: This premium channel is one of only two that I watch regularly. I enjoy the variety of shows available but what has made me grow even fonder of Netflix is its own productions. Each time I am more impressed by the quality of the productions. To date I am hooked on House of Cards, and endless documentaries. I will continue to view as well as recommend Netflix.

preview: I really like Netflix but as with everything there is always room for improvement. I would like to see more popular, mainstream movies in the new releases and recently added categories in contrast to the numerous oddities that keep popping up. Also, stop
review: I really like Netflix but as with everything there is always room for improvement. I would like to see more popular, mainstream movies in the new releases and recently added categories in contrast to the numerous oddities that keep popping up. Also, stop sending me messages saying there are new episodes of a series I had been watching, only to find out that I have already viewed these episodes.

preview: Netflix is a great source for international films and documentaries not available in the premium channels or missed because of scheduling conflicts. Their own productions are of highest quality as they address present issues and concerns. There are a wid
review: Netflix is a great source for international films and documentaries not available in the premium channels or missed because of scheduling conflicts. Their own productions are of highest quality as they address present issues and concerns. There are a wide variety of shows to choose from and I can watch them whenever I want. They can improve if they can offer a personalized page for feedback from their customers. Their method of feedback is limited and I'm afraid future forecasts will be not reflective of customer choices. Overall this is a good network that others are trying to follow.

preview: I like quite a variety of movies, television shows & even self help programs and I have found all of it on Netflix! I think the variety of programming is excellent & the price is an excellent value!
review: I like quite a variety of movies, television shows & even self help programs and I have found all of it on Netflix! I think the variety of programming is excellent & the price is an excellent value!

preview: I really felt very interested when my brother subscribed to Netflix last year when he bought a plasma TV and installed it on our kitchen wall. I had my cable TV in my room disconnected and PlayStation 3 was hooked up and I discovered Netflix. The screen
review: I really felt very interested when my brother subscribed to Netflix last year when he bought a plasma TV and installed it on our kitchen wall. I had my cable TV in my room disconnected and PlayStation 3 was hooked up and I discovered Netflix. The screen had hundreds of movies, TV shows or any show in different genre you can think of and the first one that I was really excited about watching was anime and I was hooked on that show The Gilmore Girls. They had it all. I was caught up watching the Walking Dead because I'm watching it on my laptop and NETFLIX has the new Gilmore Girls. Nowhere else could I ever had watched it anywhere but on Netflix.

preview: Overall, we are happy with Netflix, regarding price and genres, but we would really like to see more turnover. Some of the movies have been on Netflix for years. The quality is usually fairly decent, but some of the horror options are done in the theme o
review: Overall, we are happy with Netflix, regarding price and genres, but we would really like to see more turnover. Some of the movies have been on Netflix for years. The quality is usually fairly decent, but some of the horror options are done in the theme of students filming experiences and those are almost always very poorly made and redundant, and that the plot is repetitive.

preview: Love, love, love Netflix. They have great movies, documentaries and tv shows and especially original Netflix productions. I wish they carried more current tv shows like Hulu does but I love that Netflix is commercial free so will stick with it.
review: Love, love, love Netflix. They have great movies, documentaries and tv shows and especially original Netflix productions. I wish they carried more current tv shows like Hulu does but I love that Netflix is commercial free so will stick with it.

preview: I would like to see movies offered on a more timely basis. I have also experienced the service crashing on multiple occasions while viewing a program. On the positive side, Netflix offers a wide selection of children's programs.
review: I would like to see movies offered on a more timely basis. I have also experienced the service crashing on multiple occasions while viewing a program. On the positive side, Netflix offers a wide selection of children's programs.

preview: Netflix has been a wonderful addition to our house. I love watching new series and some that have been around a while have turned out to be our new favorites! Binge watching may be considered a downside by some, but I love it - the only downside is when
review: Netflix has been a wonderful addition to our house. I love watching new series and some that have been around a while have turned out to be our new favorites! Binge watching may be considered a downside by some, but I love it - the only downside is when I get to the end of the series and then have to wait for the new season to be posted! I also love that I've been introduced to a variety of shows from across the pond - we have several favorites from England and even one from Russia (which was a huge surprise to us as it uses subtitles - but after the first few we were hooked!).

preview: Netflix is AWESOME!! The price is affordable, and the selection of movies are so diverse. It works for my son and I. Thanks again, from a mom on a BUDGET.
review: Netflix is AWESOME!! The price is affordable, and the selection of movies are so diverse. It works for my son and I. Thanks again, from a mom on a BUDGET.

preview: I experience poor reception many times and the movie will stop in the middle and do the spinning wheel. Sometimes I have to just turn it off and wait until later or the next day to finish. I feel I pay a lot for poor reception.
review: I experience poor reception many times and the movie will stop in the middle and do the spinning wheel. Sometimes I have to just turn it off and wait until later or the next day to finish. I feel I pay a lot for poor reception.

review: Netflix needs more of a balance, most everything on it is targeted for the younger audience. Even if you write or call to request programs, it does not do any good. Not all of us want to see trashy, pervert shows that claim a "family friendly" rating! If a better streaming site comes along, it's goodbye Netflix!

review: Netflix allows me the convenience of watching different shows when I want, plus watch my old favorites. It has worked out well for me and the price is reasonable.

review: Netflix is what I watch the most. Of course I would like more movies and shows, but I find the most diverse shows for the whole family. It's the easiest to maneuver. I especially like the ability to go right back to where I stopped on a show. I highly recommend Netflix.

review: Netflix needs more of a selection and need to show newer movies. They don't change their movie list often enough. Netflix is redundant on showing what movies they are showing. When you scroll down through their list of movies, you see the same movie in different locations.

preview: Would like to see more old television shows that you can't get elsewhere such as shows from the 60's, 70's and 80's. There were some available before - such as the original Battlestar Galactica- but they have been taken off. I know a lot of people would
review: Would like to see more old television shows that you can't get elsewhere such as shows from the 60's, 70's and 80's. There were some available before - such as the original Battlestar Galactica- but they have been taken off. I know a lot of people would be interested in getting Netflix if these "oldies" were available.

review: I like the easy navigation of the application. It's great how the children menu is separated. I love the variety of comedians and their most recent stand ups. Also the tv shows, I appreciate how you can watch all of the old and new episodes and the selection is awesome. I can't forget the availability of new released movie. The timing is wonderful. And finally the Netflix original movies are great, I love seeing actors that hasn't had any recent movies that are in the theater. Thanks Netflix. Who needs cable when we have Netflix.

preview: I joined Netflix 13 years ago, and during that time, they treated me with courtesy, and made me feel important; although, there was not a two way communication.There wasn't an option to really say anything- to ask questions, or complain directly. There w
review: I joined Netflix 13 years ago, and during that time, they treated me with courtesy, and made me feel important; although, there was not a two way communication.There wasn't an option to really say anything- to ask questions, or complain directly. There were ways to report damages & such, but only in their words, not my own. And the rating-system was really dumb.

preview: I love Netflix but I wish they offered more home channels like CBS, NBC and ABC free, then I could cut the cable. And I would pay more for Netflix to be able to cut cable.
review: I love Netflix but I wish they offered more home channels like CBS, NBC and ABC free, then I could cut the cable. And I would pay more for Netflix to be able to cut cable.

preview: I like the variety of Netflix and that I can "downgrade" the cost to something more appropriate for a single user, 1 lowD TV (720) and no cell phone. I loved the full 1 month free trial even though I'd signed up once before and never used it. But Hulu wo
review: I like the variety of Netflix and that I can "downgrade" the cost to something more appropriate for a single user, 1 lowD TV (720) and no cell phone. I loved the full 1 month free trial even though I'd signed up once before and never used it. But Hulu would not allow me to try a full 30 days because I'd once signed up for a 2 wk. trial 2 years prior and they knew I'd never used it. Only one complaint - Netflix asks me to sign in whenever Verizon's modems need replacing because I cannot get FIOS and am stuck with a copper landline (no Dish nor Cable TV).

preview: I find the children programming is the best. You have a large variety of things that the kids can watch. There are many programs especially about dinosaurs. That is something that the kids seemed really anxious to learn about and for my almost three-year
review: I find the children programming is the best. You have a large variety of things that the kids can watch. There are many programs especially about dinosaurs. That is something that the kids seemed really anxious to learn about and for my almost three-year-old grandson he's able to say things like T-rex and the different types of dinosaurs and he recognizes them from watching the shows on Netflix about dinosaurs.

preview: Netflix keeps introducing new things and don't give you the ability to opt out if you don't like it. Several months ago, every time I was looking through the different shows to find something to watch, every one I looked at would automatically start play
review: Netflix keeps introducing new things and don't give you the ability to opt out if you don't like it. Several months ago, every time I was looking through the different shows to find something to watch, every one I looked at would automatically start playing and the volume was really loud. It made it impossible for me to browse to find what I wanted to watch next because it was so distracting and loud and every time I switched to a different show it started all over again. I called Netflix several times to get it to stop and they said there was nothing they could (or would) do to stop every show from automatically starting. It was so frustrating I cancelled my subscription. It seems like now that Netflix is so big they don't care about customer satisfaction anymore. I don't understand why they wouldn't offer an option to opt out of new things they are trying.

preview: My experience with Netflix is awesome. My grandchildren love the kids tv. I especially enjoy the various Netflix original series. I also enjoys the older episodes of my favorite shows.
review: My experience with Netflix is awesome. My grandchildren love the kids tv. I especially enjoy the various Netflix original series. I also enjoys the older episodes of my favorite shows.

review: I love Netflix. It's had all of the movies and shows I would love to read and watch a lot of as well as new series to love Netflix. There is a lot of genre to choose from like what kinda movies to watch. I'm an sci-fi and fantasy!

review: I can watch Netflix from all my devices anywhere I go and I would personally not be able to watch Grey's Anatomy without it. The shows on Netflix are high quality and I look forward to new seasons of all my favorites especially Orange is the New Black and Sense8. It is a good addiction! I exercise and do housework while shows are playing! I expect Netflix to grow so I invested my money in their stock.

review: We really enjoy Netflix. They have great movies and some of the best series we have ever seen. Regular tv is pretty bad, just a few good shows. We TiVo and watch them minus the awful commercials. We’ve been with Netflix a long, long time and it is worth every penny.

review: Netflix take programs off my instant queue without my permission! If I wanted them removed, I would have done it. Put my "Monarch of the Glen" and "Rosemary and Thyme" back on it! Now, please! For this reason, I WON'T recommend Netflix in the future until this issue is resolved.

preview: I am disabled so I watch a lot of television. The TV I have in the living room is a Smart TV. I love Netflix movies and new series. Also the customer service that represents Netflix is outstanding. Someday I believe that Netflix will replace Comcast, Dir
review: I am disabled so I watch a lot of television. The TV I have in the living room is a Smart TV. I love Netflix movies and new series. Also the customer service that represents Netflix is outstanding. Someday I believe that Netflix will replace Comcast, DirecTV, and AT&T. If I may be so bold as to look further into the future, if Netflix had a subfolder to connect to the local stations. I would exclusively only watch all my entertainment needs through Netflix. Thank you.

review: Netflix is a great "go to" for tv if you are not a fan of reality shows and unique programming not found on cable tv. I love the documentaries and I also like the ability to start or catch up on network episodes.

review: When I log on, sometimes I am lucky enough to get back to the same story. But a lot of times I try to save the spot and I may as well not bother, because I don't ever find it. I can't say ever, but by the time I do. I have forgotten what it's about so I have to start all over.

review: When you are in the middle of a series and a new month comes they replace it with something different and take it off of Netflix. I was watching Gilmore Girls and when October 1 came they took it off of Netflix and replaced it with Barbie Dolphin Magic.

preview: Although there are hundreds of films available on Netflix streaming, it seems I often have a difficult time locating something that I want to watch. I've not done a deep, full analysis, but it just "feels" like many classics are missing. Also, their new
review: Although there are hundreds of films available on Netflix streaming, it seems I often have a difficult time locating something that I want to watch. I've not done a deep, full analysis, but it just "feels" like many classics are missing. Also, their new "thumbs-up"... "thumbs-down" rating system just sucks. All that work I put into the five-star rating system has vanished. I'll stick with Netflix, but it is highly over-rated.

review: Netflix is very easy to use like the options of getting movies through the mail and the choices and categories they have. They’re also keeping your video choices from others in your household.

review: I love Netflix! The various movies and tv shows at your fingertips are absolutely amazing. The original shows are great too! The price went up to $10 from $8 but it was better and still very enjoyable and can be watched on a number of devices.

preview: I like Netflix and the device that it is streaming on. But one item of concern is that Netflix offers movies more on a "B Rating" or a second run production. It seems that the categories that Netflix offers is too jammed with odd genre with no systematic
review: I like Netflix and the device that it is streaming on. But one item of concern is that Netflix offers movies more on a "B Rating" or a second run production. It seems that the categories that Netflix offers is too jammed with odd genre with no systematic order. I know it will show partiality to the order of "newness" but if Netflix offered a category of "just out from the theaters," it might make the view more pilot-able.

review: Too many outdated movies and unknown movies. You have to pay a few extra dollars to be able to watch a DVD. It used to be included when I had subscribed several years ago.

preview: I have been with Netflix many years and enjoy the service. My grandson loves his shows too. There are no issues with streaming and they always add new content. It's a great price and all in the comfort of my home with the flick of the remote. Thanks.
review: I have been with Netflix many years and enjoy the service. My grandson loves his shows too. There are no issues with streaming and they always add new content. It's a great price and all in the comfort of my home with the flick of the remote. Thanks.

preview: I used to decide on what films to watch based on the Netflix star rating. Now that Netflix is discontinuing it, Netflix is not worth the subscription price! I had always used the Netflix star rating system to rate every movie I watched. As a result, thei
review: I used to decide on what films to watch based on the Netflix star rating. Now that Netflix is discontinuing it, Netflix is not worth the subscription price! I had always used the Netflix star rating system to rate every movie I watched. As a result, their projected ratings for me were extremely accurate allowing me to know which films I would enjoy. Although Netflix is still showing star ratings on the DVD site, they haven't updated these ratings for a month or so. This is especially a problem with deciding which newly released movies to watch!

preview: It's very easy to navigate the website. However, I'm unhappy that I can't watch some of the older movies Netflix use to have such as: Saved by the Light with Eric Roberts. I also wish they had more Christian movies to select from. I find the trash Hollyw
review: It's very easy to navigate the website. However, I'm unhappy that I can't watch some of the older movies Netflix use to have such as: Saved by the Light with Eric Roberts. I also wish they had more Christian movies to select from. I find the trash Hollywood is putting out these days obnoxious.

review: Videos take a long time to load, compared to Hulu and others. I like the variety of videos, especially the documentaries. Enjoy watching the videos I've seen before, new experience every time!

review: Netflix is budget-friendly and great for cord cutters and for someone like me who has never paid for cable service. It reflects my motto of only trying it if it's less than $20 a month. Great content and streaming is great Roku 4.

review: The reasons why I picked Netflix was to lower my cable bill and I thought I would have had more choices when it comes to watching shows. There is not a lot of different shows, ** shows are far and between, both current and past shows. I will be canceling their services.

preview: The price is great, however the choice is sometimes very limited and the latest releases are sometimes quite old. I would prefer if they had more up to date titles and the TV series were closer to the release date. Overall some improvement is needed.
review: The price is great, however the choice is sometimes very limited and the latest releases are sometimes quite old. I would prefer if they had more up to date titles and the TV series were closer to the release date. Overall some improvement is needed.

preview: My only difficulty with Netflix was the apparent predominance of foreign films. My eyesight has been failing and reading subtitles is not on my current to do list. Fortunately, I learned that you can actually use the remote to go to the site that separat
review: My only difficulty with Netflix was the apparent predominance of foreign films. My eyesight has been failing and reading subtitles is not on my current to do list. Fortunately, I learned that you can actually use the remote to go to the site that separates out each type of viewing options so that the foreign films are listed separately. Otherwise, the variety is quite up to par with truly top grade detective miniseries and documentaries. Netflix remains my go to programming.

preview: Overall I like it better than most apps. However the movies are old and not refreshed often. There are a lot of B movies. The price is decent but I'd like to see more current movies.
review: Overall I like it better than most apps. However the movies are old and not refreshed often. There are a lot of B movies. The price is decent but I'd like to see more current movies.

review: Netflix is by far my first choice in this method of viewing. It learns about my preferences, therefore making more knowledgeable and informed recommendations. Netflix now has its own original programs, of which I find a great many enjoyable. They also pick up some cancelled programs, which I also enjoy. Streaming quality is good, navigating is fine, the only thing I wish for is that there be a few more new releases.

preview: Signed up for Netflix DVD 4.99 program. Incorrectly was billed for 11.99 program but was unaware due to free month and gift card application. Netflix has no way to view billing months, so wasn't aware of error until 4 months later, when I received the in
review: Signed up for Netflix DVD 4.99 program. Incorrectly was billed for 11.99 program but was unaware due to free month and gift card application. Netflix has no way to view billing months, so wasn't aware of error until 4 months later, when I received the incorrect charge. Netflix will not refund. They stated the 11.99 program is their default, but I know I chose the 4.99 program. I never received any emails regarding charges that were being charged.

preview: I love Netflix because I can watch the start of a show. The first year it came on until the last year it was made. I love no commercials and the price of Netflix. Some shows I had never heard of until I got Netflix I can now check it out to see if it's s
review: I love Netflix because I can watch the start of a show. The first year it came on until the last year it was made. I love no commercials and the price of Netflix. Some shows I had never heard of until I got Netflix I can now check it out to see if it's something I like.

preview: Netflix is a great deal, here's why. 1. Price vs selection. For the price of one month of cable you could pay for a year of Netflix, and have thousands of selections on demand. 2. Flexible pricing. Netflix has three different price points to fit a wide r
review: Netflix is a great deal, here's why. 1. Price vs selection. For the price of one month of cable you could pay for a year of Netflix, and have thousands of selections on demand. 2. Flexible pricing. Netflix has three different price points to fit a wide range of budgets. Overall, a great deal, and one more thing, if you don't want keep up with trying to remember to make your monthly payments, you can buy a Netflix gift card from Amazon.com, and apply it on your account.

preview: I love Netflix. I can always find something to watch. I like drama, history, documentaries, docudramas and crime stories. I like that fact that I can choose what I want to watch at any time. My family members also have their own profile. I like that fact
review: I love Netflix. I can always find something to watch. I like drama, history, documentaries, docudramas and crime stories. I like that fact that I can choose what I want to watch at any time. My family members also have their own profile. I like that fact that Netflix is independent so they can choose what to show or support... BIG PLUS!!!

In addition to having some of my favorite shows and movies, I have come to love their original programming as well. My kids also love their selection of kids shows and movies. Netflix is the best by far!

review: I love Netflix, because they have a variety of movies. The steaming of the movies could be little better on a whole. But like I said, I love Netflix. I hope Netflix will keep their prices low. No more increases for a while.

review: With Netflix it has made a middle class family meet their needs in todays world. Comcast is necessary, but is so expensive. We need more companies like yours.

review: Netflix has a good cross-section of TV shows, documentaries and movies for every age plus excellent Netflix originals. It is the one streaming channel that I always keep due to its great variety of programming.

review: Netflix provides fairly streamlined service to where you don't ever notice a hiccup. Not all parents or adult subscribers may not understand or realize there is technology behind viewing controls and parameters with their subscription.

review: I'm a Netflix binge watcher. Why watch TV when you can Netflix binge? We have been on Netflix for several years and can't recall life without it.

preview: Sometimes I can find so many choices and other times nothing much that is recent. Overall, it's convenient and movies are rated so that helps make the selections easy.
review: Sometimes I can find so many choices and other times nothing much that is recent. Overall, it's convenient and movies are rated so that helps make the selections easy.

preview: Re: DVD rental, I returned DVD in about two days or so for a while, I suddenly did not receive a DVD. They kept on telling me "we shipped!". Ultimately, I did not receive any DVD for 16 days, half a month. Also, I received two physically cracked/broken D
review: Re: DVD rental, I returned DVD in about two days or so for a while, I suddenly did not receive a DVD. They kept on telling me "we shipped!". Ultimately, I did not receive any DVD for 16 days, half a month. Also, I received two physically cracked/broken DVDs. Not crazy about Netflix service, but there's no alternative to beat their variety and monthly fee.

preview: I started out with mail order only, then upgraded to streaming with discs also. Then I went to streaming only. It help take the place of cable. Thanks.
review: I started out with mail order only, then upgraded to streaming with discs also. Then I went to streaming only. It help take the place of cable. Thanks.

preview: My experience is very good and if someone go into my account without my permission. They alert me and let me know what time and date. And they have some pretty good movies and the screening is pretty good. They just have everything and I don't have probl
review: My experience is very good and if someone go into my account without my permission. They alert me and let me know what time and date. And they have some pretty good movies and the screening is pretty good. They just have everything and I don't have problems with it.

preview: Netflix is the best. When you can't find anything on regular cable TV, you can always find something excellent on Netflix. What every mood you are in, you can find something to watch. There are times I watch Netflix for the whole day, instead of cable TV
review: Netflix is the best. When you can't find anything on regular cable TV, you can always find something excellent on Netflix. What every mood you are in, you can find something to watch. There are times I watch Netflix for the whole day, instead of cable TV.

preview: Netflix offers a great selection of new and old movies along with their original shows! You can't beat the price and it's portable, no matter where I am I can watch anything and it even starts up where I left off!
review: Netflix offers a great selection of new and old movies along with their original shows! You can't beat the price and it's portable, no matter where I am I can watch anything and it even starts up where I left off!

preview: I think Netflix is decent for the price. However, most the shows are rather immature. The movies never change either. As long as I have kid controls on it pretty good for my 12 year old.
review: I think Netflix is decent for the price. However, most the shows are rather immature. The movies never change either. As long as I have kid controls on it pretty good for my 12 year old.

preview: Netflix doesn't have any commercials like other companies and it's reasonably priced to the consumer. Their customer support is helpful and friendly and guide you through each step of the troubleshooting you may encounter with the streaming.
review: Netflix doesn't have any commercials like other companies and it's reasonably priced to the consumer. Their customer support is helpful and friendly and guide you through each step of the troubleshooting you may encounter with the streaming.

preview: We enjoy Netflix. We like the layout, the ease of use, the ability to watch older tv series, older movies, especially, House of Cards, Bloodline, and many other original series.
review: We enjoy Netflix. We like the layout, the ease of use, the ability to watch older tv series, older movies, especially, House of Cards, Bloodline, and many other original series.

preview: Wonderful to be able to view quality tv with no commercials on Netflix. Most shows are so well produced that you really get into the story, actors in the character portrayals are very good.
review: Wonderful to be able to view quality tv with no commercials on Netflix. Most shows are so well produced that you really get into the story, actors in the character portrayals are very good.

preview: I like the movies of U.K. And Netflix has some good ones. Never had any trouble receiving Netflix on DSL and now on Fiber optics. I recommend the HD option for a buck more.
review: I like the movies of U.K. And Netflix has some good ones. Never had any trouble receiving Netflix on DSL and now on Fiber optics. I recommend the HD option for a buck more.

preview: Netflix really is a great bargain. As a cord-cutter, the amount of movies, television and original content cannot be matched. Sometimes the stream can become pixelated or the sound & picture fall out of sync, but that's usually temporary.
review: Netflix really is a great bargain. As a cord-cutter, the amount of movies, television and original content cannot be matched. Sometimes the stream can become pixelated or the sound & picture fall out of sync, but that's usually temporary.

preview: I share with my son, and the cost works for us as we are semi retired, and the cost of tv now is so expensive. I recommend Netflix. Shows I missed or had heard of I watch now and series which I always wanted to watch I can now watch. Makes a Great Movie
review: I share with my son, and the cost works for us as we are semi retired, and the cost of tv now is so expensive. I recommend Netflix. Shows I missed or had heard of I watch now and series which I always wanted to watch I can now watch. Makes a Great Movie night.

preview: We've subscribed to Netflix since the days before streaming and the service has continued to improve year over year. I love the new profiles (my kids have taste that totally screws up my curated recommendations! :) ), the streaming is phenomenal and now
review: We've subscribed to Netflix since the days before streaming and the service has continued to improve year over year. I love the new profiles (my kids have taste that totally screws up my curated recommendations! :) ), the streaming is phenomenal and now with a Roku cable is obsolete.

preview: I only watch Netflix for the movies and I'm not that impressed. Most of the movies you have for rent are either in foreign language or not a very good selection.
review: I only watch Netflix for the movies and I'm not that impressed. Most of the movies you have for rent are either in foreign language or not a very good selection.

preview: We have subscribed to Netflix for quite a while now. We watch a variety of movies and series every night. We have Comcast Cable only for the internet. We do not watch network TV since we are able to stream with Netflix. It is a good value. We are so glad
review: We have subscribed to Netflix for quite a while now. We watch a variety of movies and series every night. We have Comcast Cable only for the internet. We do not watch network TV since we are able to stream with Netflix. It is a good value. We are so glad we decided to give it a try. Satisfied customers. Highly recommend it to family and friends.

preview: I have had Netflix for years now. I only use the streaming service. There has been an increase of viewing options over the years. I like to binge watch my shows without commercials and Netflix makes it great.
review: I have had Netflix for years now. I only use the streaming service. There has been an increase of viewing options over the years. I like to binge watch my shows without commercials and Netflix makes it great.

preview: It's great because they keep track of what I like and they suggest others series similar to what I have in my watching list, and I also get notifications when the new seasons are out in my shows, it's amazing! I love it.
review: It's great because they keep track of what I like and they suggest others series similar to what I have in my watching list, and I also get notifications when the new seasons are out in my shows, it's amazing! I love it.

preview: We love that we can watch anything we want at any time on Netflix! I love documentaries and I can get tons of those! Also tons of kids movies and shows that we don't have to pay for!
review: We love that we can watch anything we want at any time on Netflix! I love documentaries and I can get tons of those! Also tons of kids movies and shows that we don't have to pay for!

preview: Love the movies we have seen, but wish there were more choices of foreign films. I used to get the DVDs by mail and seems like there was more choice available.
review: Love the movies we have seen, but wish there were more choices of foreign films. I used to get the DVDs by mail and seems like there was more choice available.

preview: In terms of my own personal tastes, the selection of movies available on Netflix wasn't as vast as I'd hoped for after I'd signed up. As a Canadian viewer, our selection up here in the Great White North isn't as good as a viewer resident in the US gets.
review: In terms of my own personal tastes, the selection of movies available on Netflix wasn't as vast as I'd hoped for after I'd signed up. As a Canadian viewer, our selection up here in the Great White North isn't as good as a viewer resident in the US gets.

preview: My subscription dealings with Netflix have been great. I will say, that in a few situations, I've had to request a manager, because I was not satisfied with the representative handling my particular situation, and each time the manager handled my situati
review: My subscription dealings with Netflix have been great. I will say, that in a few situations, I've had to request a manager, because I was not satisfied with the representative handling my particular situation, and each time the manager handled my situation to my satisfaction, and for those reasons and more, Netflix has my continued business for years to come.

preview: There are alot of programs, movies and series to watch. You can binge, or it keeps track of where you left off watching. They make suggestions based on what you watch and let you know when there are new episodes. We have had our Roku with Netflix for abo
review: There are alot of programs, movies and series to watch. You can binge, or it keeps track of where you left off watching. They make suggestions based on what you watch and let you know when there are new episodes. We have had our Roku with Netflix for about 8 years now and it is the best thing we ever bought. As we have never had cable or dish, it gets us through the times when everything on network tv is reruns. And the price is fairly reasonable.

preview: I sometimes wish it had better search capabilities, so I could find more choices when I don't know the whole real title. And more warning when items are to disappear.
review: I sometimes wish it had better search capabilities, so I could find more choices when I don't know the whole real title. And more warning when items are to disappear.

preview: An excellent option to cable programming. I enjoy the many options for both myself and my grandchildren. The price is reasonable for the number of choices and the type of programming available.
review: An excellent option to cable programming. I enjoy the many options for both myself and my grandchildren. The price is reasonable for the number of choices and the type of programming available.

preview: I rarely look at Netflix because the streaming is horrible. When you want to look at a show during prime time - it freezes up or Netflix constantly send messages to end the show. I have seen that they shorten popular TV shows - combining episodes. I keep
review: I rarely look at Netflix because the streaming is horrible. When you want to look at a show during prime time - it freezes up or Netflix constantly send messages to end the show. I have seen that they shorten popular TV shows - combining episodes. I keep the services, because my children loves it. The price is OK - just cannot look at popular shows at a prime time.

preview: It is good if you want to see movies released in the last few years and don't want to go to the theatres. It gives me the flexibility to choose the movies I like and have to view at my leisure. I also like the streaming. Unfortunately, most are not avail
review: It is good if you want to see movies released in the last few years and don't want to go to the theatres. It gives me the flexibility to choose the movies I like and have to view at my leisure. I also like the streaming. Unfortunately, most are not available for streaming.

preview: Programming is older and therefore viewing options are limited for people who watch a lot of cinema. Newer movies would be helpful. Options are somewhat pricey for HD options.
review: Programming is older and therefore viewing options are limited for people who watch a lot of cinema. Newer movies would be helpful. Options are somewhat pricey for HD options.

preview: Netflix mostly doesn't have great collections and once a title is watched it only shows related titles and very few others. I may have watched a drama movie one night but that doesn't mean I only watch those. If I search any title all it shows are simila
review: Netflix mostly doesn't have great collections and once a title is watched it only shows related titles and very few others. I may have watched a drama movie one night but that doesn't mean I only watch those. If I search any title all it shows are similar movies and mostly I end up not watching anything. Also, the recent rating system introduced is very confusing. The previous star rating system was much better.

preview:
I've subscribed to Netflix since late 2015 on my Apple TV. I can always find a program to watch especially their documentaries which are Outstanding. One complaint: No expiration dates given for shows.
Read full review
review:
I've subscribed to Netflix since late 2015 on my Apple TV. I can always find a program to watch especially their documentaries which are Outstanding. One complaint: No expiration dates given for shows.

review: I love the service to date and have had no problems using it in multiple devices. My only concern is with some of their programming. I would love to see more variety of movies and Tv. I look at Netflix as a place to rent movies and I should see more choices. Otherwise it's a great services.

preview: Netflix is awesome as they picked some shows I really like to watch but network dropped. The new Fuller House is such a great show like Full House. My grandson and I always watch them together and now we do again.
review: Netflix is awesome as they picked some shows I really like to watch but network dropped. The new Fuller House is such a great show like Full House. My grandson and I always watch them together and now we do again.

review: I barely watch live tv anymore as I only watch in evenings and Netflix has much better programming. However we have a little trouble streaming 2 different programs at once in different rooms.

preview: Netflix is my most often used movie source. Downsides are that the categories are too coarse. The number of available movies suggests a much more sophisticated filter to offer a closer fit to what you want. A Pandora like matching your taste to the sugge
review: Netflix is my most often used movie source. Downsides are that the categories are too coarse. The number of available movies suggests a much more sophisticated filter to offer a closer fit to what you want. A Pandora like matching your taste to the suggested movies is appropriate for such a fine service. The new thumbs up vs numeric scoring seems to have deteriorated once excellent matches for viewing taste.

preview: I love Netflix and I have never had any issues at all. I have used Netflix for years and have seen many changes. The only slight negative, is that you only get one screen and have to pay extra for more. I would like to at least have 2 screen options with
review: I love Netflix and I have never had any issues at all. I have used Netflix for years and have seen many changes. The only slight negative, is that you only get one screen and have to pay extra for more. I would like to at least have 2 screen options with my subscription.

preview: Needs more variety. Newer movies and classic movies. There's just not enough to choose from. There are so many movies out there. They can do a better job of bringing them to the customers.
review: Needs more variety. Newer movies and classic movies. There's just not enough to choose from. There are so many movies out there. They can do a better job of bringing them to the customers.

review: The service is fine. DVD selection getting thinner. Lots of "B" or less streaming. Their original content, though fine, is just turning them into another pay TV channel.

review: Netflix is a great, low cost option for viewing shows, including their own original series. Downsides are that there is not a lot of variety and current seasons are not available.

review: I have loved streaming with Netflix, you cant get everything you want from any one service, but I love the shows and movies, esp. The series with grownup actors, like Grace and Frankie, Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt, and House of Cards, plus the foreign movie selection on Netflix is great!

review: I am new to Netflix and have not had any problems except one, that is on certain movies there's a blue line that runs through the movie at certain times. I get notification when they are going to bill my credit card and I have never been overcharged.

preview: Most of the time I am completely happy with Netflix. For 2 weeks I could go to a movie and it would play for 1 minute and then go back to my homepage. Back to working as it's supposed to. Also when is Season 8, 9 & 10 of Murdoch Mysteries going to be on

preview: There could be a better option of high rated movies and TV, there are time where I won't watch anything on Netflix because of the lack of options. It could be a little less too.

review: The more recently released movies are not able to be streamed. The variety available of tv shows and older movies is very good. I still feel it is a good value.

review: I watch it mostly for the movies. I especially like dramas and relevant documentaries. It's easy to navigate and the reception is great. I like their original series, but I wish there were more current box office movies available.

review: I like the variety of movies, the price a month is fair, I use to spend that much in just a few days at Redbox, this way I don't have to go pick them up. The new releases are a little high but if you wait they go down. Overall Netflix is a good deal. Thanks.

preview: Many times I get a message to try back later, slow to get started. But the variety of movies pretty good. One month of movies is cheaper than 1 one movie at theaters. I can watch any hour of the night unless I can't get in.

review: I love it. You can get a lot of old and newer shows. I like the old sitcoms on it. The variety of movies gives you something for all tastes. The cost isn't too much for what you get.

preview: I am able to find a wide variety of very watchable shows. I like the options of both television and movie selections. I like it better than just getting a premium channel because I have the option of watching what and when I want.
review: I am able to find a wide variety of very watchable shows. I like the options of both television and movie selections. I like it better than just getting a premium channel because I have the option of watching what and when I want.

preview: Other than specialty shows which are infrequent, not much in choice. Movies are old and any newer movies are not available. Searching for something is tedious, spend more time scrolling than actually watching.
review: Other than specialty shows which are infrequent, not much in choice. Movies are old and any newer movies are not available. Searching for something is tedious, spend more time scrolling than actually watching.

preview: For the most part, having Netflix is great to watch old missed tv shows, however disappointed that no new movies are released to Netflix in a timely manner. From what I have experienced is that a "new" movie released to Netflix is actually an OLD movie!
review: For the most part, having Netflix is great to watch old missed tv shows, however disappointed that no new movies are released to Netflix in a timely manner. From what I have experienced is that a "new" movie released to Netflix is actually an OLD movie! Not worth the monthly price to pay.

preview: I feel that there is not enough variety to Netflix for the price you pay. I no longer watch it and am in the process of cancelling my subscription. I am also displeased with movies that I previously watched and liked were taken off and no longer availabl
review: I feel that there is not enough variety to Netflix for the price you pay. I no longer watch it and am in the process of cancelling my subscription. I am also displeased with movies that I previously watched and liked were taken off and no longer available. I understand that sometimes there is a price increase but I also feel for those who are already customers; their price should not increase for what it seems to be less and not more.

preview: Good service and available across a wide variety of platforms. Selection is moderate to good. They will likely face stiff completion from other streaming providers who are more agile.
review: Good service and available across a wide variety of platforms. Selection is moderate to good. They will likely face stiff completion from other streaming providers who are more agile.

preview: We are very satisfied with Netflix. We have been subscribed for over two years and love the selection and quick turnaround. The movies and tv shows are terrific and the quality is superb. We plan to keep Netflix for a long time.
review: We are very satisfied with Netflix. We have been subscribed for over two years and love the selection and quick turnaround. The movies and tv shows are terrific and the quality is superb. We plan to keep Netflix for a long time.

review: They have great up to date movies but their tv shows are too old. They only have old series of them. The new ones I couldn't get. I didn't like that much. I loved the movies though.

review: Netflix has taken away the need for cable television. It has taken away the need to go to Cinemas. I now watch very little commercial television. Who would not love entertainment that you can watch at home on a big screen or parked in your car while waiting for your family.

preview: Love Netflix and we use it daily. We have no other tv companies, so Netflix is our main source for tv. The variety works for all of us. We have a teen that has never not found something to watch, she even enjoys the older shows, which I like because they
review: Love Netflix and we use it daily. We have no other tv companies, so Netflix is our main source for tv. The variety works for all of us. preview: You don't change the movies enough. Sometimes you can't even get on it. Also, too many foreign films. Maybe you should have a foreign film section. It sucks when you think you have a good movie to watch and find out it's foreign.
review: You don't change the movies enough. Sometimes you can't even get on it. Also, too many foreign films. Maybe you should have a foreign film section. It sucks when you think you have a good movie to watch and find out it's foreign.

review: I love the many choices and different genres. I am a mystery science and action type of person. I look for more good quality movies and mini series.

review: We use a Roku to stream Netflix. We do not use cable tv. This is adequate for our tv viewing and we always find something we want to watch. Occasionally the Roku or Netflix itself will go out but we just wait for it to come back on.

preview: Netflix has a great variety of Netflix Originals which are produced for Netflix and are by far better than any broadcast TV shows. These shows are more realistic than broadcast TV shows. And the ability to binge watch a show is awesome. You don't have to
review: Netflix has a great variety of Netflix Originals which are produced for Netflix and are by far better than any broadcast TV shows. These shows are more realistic than broadcast TV shows. And the ability to binge watch a show is awesome. You don't have to wait until the next episode to come out the next week. It's already queued for your viewing pleasure. And it's well worth to pay for no commercials.

preview: Love Netflix - many times even with over 100 cable channels, there is nothing to watch. Netflix has filled that gap many times. Value is more than great. Quality is very good.
review: Love Netflix - many times even with over 100 cable channels, there is nothing to watch. Netflix has filled that gap many times. Value is more than great. Quality is very good.

preview: Netflix is an awesome service. I have had no issues and it is quite affordable compared to satellite tv. I do wish there were more reality series but that's just my taste. :)
review: Netflix is an awesome service. I have had no issues and it is quite affordable compared to satellite tv. I do wish there were more reality series but that's just my taste. :)

preview: I have noticed that I rarely go to Netflix anymore because it's difficult to browse. The new rating system is so useless that I naturally go to other providers. If I use Netflix, I have other provider websites open at the same time to get information, an
review: I have noticed that I rarely go to Netflix anymore because it's difficult to browse. The new rating system is so useless that I naturally go to other providers. If I use Netflix, I have other provider websites open at the same time to get information, and it's a frustrating extra step. The "percent match" is not at all helpful. If my kids use my profile that's no longer valid and, more importantly, I don't care what Netflix thinks I'll like. We've been with Netflix for years and always liked it. Not anymore. "Thumbs up" or "thumbs down" is not valuable information. Movies aren't Facebook posts.

preview: I wish that it did not lag so much, it makes watching a cartoon a terrible job. Kids crying because it takes too long. Then it restarts. Almost done with it.
review: I wish that it did not lag so much, it makes watching a cartoon a terrible job. Kids crying because it takes too long. Then it restarts. Almost done with it.

preview: Loved NETFLIX!! Perfect for binge watching!! Always had what I was looking for except older Christian movies or charged for them!! Even the older tv movies like the original Left Behind Trilogy.
review: Loved NETFLIX!! Perfect for binge watching!! Always had what I was looking for except older Christian movies or charged for them!! Even the older tv movies like the original Left Behind Trilogy.

review: It's a little bit hard to find shows that I'm interested in. Also it seems to lack of some cool and unique documentaries. It only seems to be around most popular things. There's very few documentaries about the United States.

preview: I enjoy the programs I see on Netflix. It is a good diversion from regular TV and you can watch without interruption. We like to watch some series more than once, especially my husband. Sometimes I get bored with regular watching and Netflix fills that b
review: I enjoy the programs I see on Netflix. It is a good diversion from regular TV and you can watch without interruption. We like to watch some series more than once, especially my husband. Sometimes I get bored with regular watching and Netflix fills that bill for us both. I was without it for three days and felt the loss of not being able to tune in. My internet and phone were down due to the failure of our access by our provider. Now it is fixed and we are no longer estranged from our Netflix viewing.

preview: Netflix has a wide variety of films, quality is excellent, and the raters have similar taste to mine, so when a movie or tv program is rated 5 stars, I trust it is 5 stars.
review: Netflix has a wide variety of films, quality is excellent, and the raters have similar taste to mine, so when a movie or tv program is rated 5 stars, I trust it is 5 stars.

review: My experience with Netflix is above average. Their focus has been on getting new customers with better deals than their existing client base. They need to focus on retaining customers too. There should be a happy medium.

review: I had to change my plan to switch to Netflix and now I do not have enough internet time. Terrible. Another change would cost me a new 2 year contract... No way. Took two and a half weeks once installed to get working due to a cable error and had to be upset over the phone to get action. Do not switch if you do not have to. Wait till you are mad to due to terrible experience and lack of care from Netflix. My business was not able to operate, I could go on and on...

preview: I have been with Netflix for over 3 years and are overall very satisfied. I do have a couple of issues: 1. The CC (closed caption) speed is way, way too fast making it impossible to enjoy foreign movies. 2. I wish there was a better way to categorize the
review: I have been with Netflix for over 3 years and are overall very satisfied. I do have a couple of issues: 1. The CC (closed caption) speed is way, way too fast making it impossible to enjoy foreign movies. 2. I wish there was a better way to categorize the movies (Crime, Document, Children etc.) upfront. I hate the recently added, trending now, because you watched.

preview: I will be forever grateful to them for providing Animal House at Christmas time. I was alone and having a bad time. That movie made my Christmas alone! Also love the British murder mysteries.
review: I will be forever grateful to them for providing Animal House at Christmas time. I was alone and having a bad time. That movie made my Christmas alone! Also love the British murder mysteries.

preview: Netflix has some quality original programming. On the opposite spectrum, they also have some very old series, like Twilight Zone and Alfred Hitchcock that I like to watch. Unfortunately with those, the number of episodes is very limited. They've left out
review: Netflix has some quality original programming. On the opposite spectrum, they also have some very old series, like Twilight Zone and Alfred Hitchcock that I like to watch. Unfortunately with those, the number of episodes is very limited. They've left out a large portion of the series. They have some great documentaries, as well as interesting nature shows. I have only had a problem streaming once or twice and customer service was very responsive to that, quite quickly actually. I'm not happy about the price increases, but so far I have continued my subscription in spite of those simply because I would miss their programming if I canceled.

preview: Netflix is a good product and easy to use and pay. It shows you the kind of movies you like and it decides this by what you have been watching.
review: Netflix is a good product and easy to use and pay. It shows you the kind of movies you like and it decides this by what you have been watching.

preview: I am rapidly becoming a fan of Netflix as a streaming service because firstly, I do not like watching commercials and second, the content, original programming and choice of movies, TV shows, documentaries etc., is so diverse. The ability of a smart TV t
review: I am rapidly becoming a fan of Netflix as a streaming service because firstly, I do not like watching commercials and second, the content, original programming and choice of movies, TV shows, documentaries etc., is so diverse. The ability of a smart TV to work in conjunction with the internet is the greatest thing to ever happen in entertainment as far as I'm concerned. The price of Netflix at $9.99 per month with no sales tax is definitely worth every penny.

preview: Change shows and movies every month. Don't keep same stuff. The same shows and movies I already saw... They're supposed to change it and keep the same shows and a better variety too.
review: Change shows and movies every month. Don't keep same stuff. The same shows and movies I already saw... They're supposed to change it and keep the same shows and a better variety too.

review: The Netflix experience is wonderful! NO COMMERCIALS. I have been able to watch series that are entertaining and allows for personal input.
