review: Netflix continued charging my credit card even after cancellation. They said that somebody reinstated my membership but no emails or notifications were sent that the membership was re-activated. I just found out because they sent me an email that my credit card has expired.

preview: Customer service see that hangs up the phone on me or because they don't want to help me they actually told me to watch Hulu Plus. They swear at me. They treat me like garbage and this is a product that we all watch that was supposed to be happy about Ne
review:
Customer service see that hangs up the phone on me or because they don't want to help me they actually told me to watch Hulu Plus. They swear at me. They treat me like garbage and this is a product that we all watch that was supposed to be happy about Netflix treat their customers like ** hundred percent legit like I'm treated. They hang up the phone with me or they tell me they're going to work on it and intends to move stuff from my wishlist on my list wish.
Read full review

preview: I called several days before going out of town to see my payment date could be extended. It was scheduled to come out a few days before my direct deposit and I didn't want an overdraft fee. The lady I talked to told me to call back two days later and ask
review:
I called several days before going out of town to see my payment date could be extended. It was scheduled to come out a few days before my direct deposit and I didn't want an overdraft fee. The lady I talked to told me to call back two days later and ask to put my account on hold for five days, which would be more than enough time for my deposit to go in. When I did, the lady I talked to was extremely unwilling to help me. She said it was too late for them to put a hold on my account, that they have two million customers to deal with and that if I had called two days earlier, it may have been possible. I told her I did call two days earlier and was told to call two days later! Anyhow, even though I've been with Netflix for many years and have always had the money in the bank to cover the payment and have never called to request a hold, she wouldn't budge.
Read full review

preview: I called to ask for my billing date to be changed. The man said "sure just let the account cancel and then call and we will extend a courtesy for the few days.'' Not true, I did everything I was asked and called only to be told "we don't, why he would te
review: I called to ask for my billing date to be changed. The man said "sure just let the account cancel and then call and we will extend a courtesy for the few days.'' Not true, I did everything I was asked and called only to be told "we don't, why he would tell you that." I've have been a customer for years, and they would not offer anything. I have been with Hulu less time and they were very accommodating and most importantly truthful. Not sure if I'll even renew. There are other companies that care to keep business.

preview: Netflix has lots of movies and shows to watch but majority of them suck. They rarely update their inventory. The only thing I see that the update is a different photo cover of the movie and when renting movies that are slow at sending them to you and rec
review: Netflix has lots of movies and shows to watch but majority of them suck. They rarely update their inventory. The only thing I see that the update is a different photo cover of the movie and when renting movies that are slow at sending them to you and receiving them in the mail they put on the report a problem like seven days after it's been mailed to you that you can finally report something. The time frame is ridiculous. Everybody should just stop watching Netflix for one year. Put the hurt on them. There's other sources of movie entertainment.

preview: I've never been a big fan of Netflix. First their multimedia is old, outdated and selections are limited. Even with the massive database to choose from it's not all that great. Secondly their software does not support the most current version of windows
review:
I've never been a big fan of Netflix. First their multimedia is old, outdated and selections are limited. Even with the massive database to choose from it's not all that great. Secondly their software does not support the most current version of windows I.E. even though it's suppose to. I have to use third party browsers to utilize the streaming. Third their streaming application needs severe fixing. It's slow, laggy, times out, freezes and often forgets what's being watched. Fourth their dvds require a waiting list. With the no return date it can be months of waiting before you receive a disk. New releases need to be added to your waiting list the minute they put them on unless you want to wait months for it.
Read full review

preview: Extremely disappointed with Netflix. We were billed twice each month for over a year and when I called customer service, they quoted their policy of only being able to refund charges up to 3 months, no exceptions. As a company you would think they would
review: Extremely disappointed with Netflix. We were billed twice each month for over a year and when I called customer service, they quoted their policy of only being able to refund charges up to 3 months, no exceptions. As a company you would think they would want to retain loyal customers and not cheat them out of their money. Very disappointed!!!

preview: I am a new user of Netflix. I've been thinking about it for a while now and I wondered why they never put Mr. Robot on Netflix. Like c'mon now. I wanna watch Mr. Robot. It's a really great series. I think you should add it to Netflix. Please do. I really
review: I am a new user of Netflix. I've been thinking about it for a while now and I wondered why they never put Mr. Robot on Netflix. Like c'mon now. I wanna watch Mr. Robot. It's a really great series. I think you should add it to Netflix. Please do. I really wanna watch that show. Literally I made a account just to make this complaint and that's it because I want Mr. Robot on Netflix cause it's my favorite show and I can't find anywhere else to watch it. So if anyone has any ideas of where I can watch Mr. Robot please tell me cause I would really like to know where I could watch my favorite show. I'll even take some crappy website. I just want to watch Mr. Robot. I'll watch it for free or I'll pay to watch. I just need something badly.

preview: I noticed a charge on my bank statement that appeared suspicious. It looked like someone had purchased a Netflix movie I've never heard of named "Los Gatos." I logged into their website and didn't see a reference to "Los Gatos" on my account billing info
review: I noticed a charge on my bank statement that appeared suspicious. It looked like someone had purchased a Netflix movie I've never heard of named "Los Gatos." I logged into their website and didn't see a reference to "Los Gatos" on my account billing information, so clicked the "Start Live Chat" button to report the fraudulent charge. The chat window connected me with Marcela, who was helpful and gentle in informing me that Los Gatos is the location of a Netflix office, not the name of a movie and that the charge was just my monthly subscription charge. I was relieved that my bank account was not at risk, and my ego was only slightly scathed. The process took about five minutes of my time, provided me with the information I was seeking, and didn't feature any intrusive upsell attempts or irrelevant nagging. For routine account information inquiries, Netflix customer service is quite agreeable.

preview: I have been buying gift cards for almost a year now for Netflix. This month (October 2016) I put my normal 40 Dollar gift card in the redeem box and everything was as usual. It said it was successful. I went on to order more DVDs and streaming on my comp
review:
I have been buying gift cards for almost a year now for Netflix. This month (October 2016) I put my normal 40 Dollar gift card in the redeem box and everything was as usual. It said it was successful. I went on to order more DVDs and streaming on my computer. Then on the 11th of October I went to my DVD account and it tells me they are having difficulties with my account and to contact them.
Read full review

preview: When I disable my VPN because Netflix wants our computers open to hackers all over the globe while we watch movies, I still get the error message. I tried refreshing Netflix and also closing it and going back in to watch a movie after disabling my VPN. S
review: When I disable my VPN because Netflix wants our computers open to hackers all over the globe while we watch movies, I still get the error message. I tried refreshing Netflix and also closing it and going back in to watch a movie after disabling my VPN. Same thing happens. The only way I could find to use the streaming of movies or videos was to uninstall my VPN. Then the damn thing worked. Then I have to reinstall my VPN afterwards to reprotect my PC. Who the hell do you think you are Netflix? If this continues, I will immediately cancel both my Netflix accounts.

preview: We always want to complain about our negative experiences with companies and seldom do we make take the time to write a positive review. So am taking the initiative to do just that. Not going into too much detail the first customer service rep didn't do
review:
We always want to complain about our negative experiences with companies and seldom do we make take the time to write a positive review. So am taking the initiative to do just that. Not going into too much detail the first customer service rep didn't do her job and I had a problem with that since Netflix charged my account twice on a one month free trial because of her not taking care of the issue I had in the first place. Then when I notice two charges on my bank account I called Netflix Customer Service for the second time (to be honest I was ready to cancel my monthly subscription). But after speaking with the customer service rep. and him going the extra mile by going beyond what I needed or expected he change my mind and kept me as a customer.
Read full review

preview: Netflix is pushing Homosexual agenda on my children in Category and refuses to remove it or place a parental lock on it to remove it. Whenever my 2.5yo would watch Netflix, the LGBT category kept showing up on her home page. I called Netflix and customer
review: Netflix is pushing Homosexual agenda on my children in Category and refuses to remove it or place a parental lock on it to remove it. Whenever my 2.5yo would watch Netflix, the LGBT category kept showing up on her home page. I called Netflix and customer service was absolutely useless. They said they can't do anything about it. I told them if they can't remove the Homosexual/AIDS category from my accounts then I will be forced to cancel my 10+ year subscription. I also have Amazon Prime TV and Android TV. I have no more use for Netflix and their homosexual-AIDS agenda being pushed on my children.

preview: I have had a Netflix (Canadian) account for a few years, as I travel to non-English speaking countries frequently. When VPN use was blocked, I lost the ability to watch/access a lot. I am paying the equivalent of US pricing and I am getting a lesser serv
review: I have had a Netflix (Canadian) account for a few years, as I travel to non-English speaking countries frequently. When VPN use was blocked, I lost the ability to watch/access a lot. I am paying the equivalent of US pricing and I am getting a lesser service. Now, the price is going up. I am paying more for less. I can watch a Netflix Original show and not be able to access current episodes. If I can access these episodes online elsewhere, but cannot access them through Netflix itself (the service I pay for), what is the point of having an account?

preview: A long time ago I took advantage of the free month from Netflix - I only used it for about 2 or 3 days as the site was far from user friendly. Looking for UHD/4K/Bluray content I checked out Netflix again. But I had to pay this time to see the content an
review: A long time ago I took advantage of the free month from Netflix - I only used it for about 2 or 3 days as the site was far from user friendly. Looking for UHD/4K/Bluray content I checked out Netflix again. But I had to pay this time to see the content and went for their more expensive UHD package. However once inside it is clear that whatever UHD content that is available is simply somewhere in their list of movies etc. and when you click on a movie (eg Call Saul) you are not informed what the format is or given a choice. When you "chat" to anyone at Netflix about this you are just wasting your time - they try to confuse the simple issue with all sorts of nonsense. And for an internet service, guess what - no email facility or other way to get your concerns across. Talk about "head in the sand" - unbelievable in the 21st Century. So my new membership has lasted less than one day - I have canceled again.

preview: I am a new user of Netflix. I was hesitant to call tech support due to previous experiences with other companies. I was delighted when I was connected to a real person within 20 seconds! Rose was pleasant, cheerful and very knowledgeable. Thank you for a
review: I am a new user of Netflix. I was hesitant to call tech support due to previous experiences with other companies. I was delighted when I was connected to a real person within 20 seconds! Rose was pleasant, cheerful and very knowledgeable. Thank you for a great experience, Rose! I would highly recommend Netflix!!

preview: I have previously signed up to the Netflix one month free trial, and recently received an email offering me another one. I immediately signed up to this through the email which already had my details, so no payment details needed to be added to sign up.
review:
I have previously signed up to the Netflix one month free trial, and recently received an email offering me another one. I immediately signed up to this through the email which already had my details, so no payment details needed to be added to sign up. I had set up the payment plan with Netflix previously using PayPal as a payment method should I wish to continue after the free trial.
Read full review

preview: So I just found out tonight that since my streaming and dvd account with Netflix didn't start at the same time that if my payment is late I need to update my card to my account twice for them to take out both payments. I was like how in the world am I su
review:
So I just found out tonight that since my streaming and dvd account with Netflix didn't start at the same time that if my payment is late I need to update my card to my account twice for them to take out both payments. I was like how in the world am I suppose to know that when I get an email stating that "your account was successfully charged and everything should work fine as long as you remain a Netflix customer." It's the most ridiculous system I have ever heard. I had about $400 in my account when I updated my information on Netflix, why should I have to update my card information twice when it's the same card!!! So now I have to wait until I get paid to pay for streaming which should have already been charged 2 weeks ago.
Read full review

preview: We have Netflix for several years now. My teenage girl wants to watch some shows during the summer break. We didn't want her to access my credit on file so we decided to buy some Netflix gift cards. We thought she can use the account for three months the
review:
We have Netflix for several years now. My teenage girl wants to watch some shows during the summer break. We didn't want her to access my credit on file so we decided to buy some Netflix gift cards. We thought she can use the account for three months then we can put the account on hold while she's in school. We called their customer service, ask if we can freeze our account and if they can hold the remainder balance of my gift card until we reinstate. Rep responded: "Unfortunately, we cannot put your subscription on hold. You can cancel your account but any remaining credits will be void." Per REP there is no way for us to hold your account or your credits.
Read full review

preview: I subscribed to Netflix off/on since their very start. They have a current, updated browsing system that no longer works. I cannot get anything to load very well, if at all. Sometimes it will load after a long time. But most of the times it is just a big
review: I subscribed to Netflix off/on since their very start. They have a current, updated browsing system that no longer works. I cannot get anything to load very well, if at all. Sometimes it will load after a long time. But most of the times it is just a big fail. Simply put nothing will load and it's a huge fight to find a good video to watch. I cannot browse the web while the Netflix website is open (I have to close my browser to use Google after I am at the Netflix website, for example). I feel like their competitors provide a better system for streaming videos that don't tie up my browser.

preview: I subscribe for a free trial membership with Netflix on July 15, 2016. I discovered that they had charged me for this so called free membership and asked for a refund. Well I have talked to 3 different reps and a supervisor and they all give me this bogu
review: I subscribe for a free trial membership with Netflix on July 15, 2016. I discovered that they had charged me for this so called free membership and asked for a refund. Well I have talked to 3 different reps and a supervisor and they all give me this bogus story about the system being down and they have to enter refunds manually. It is as of today August 12, and still no refund from July 18. This is the worst customer service I have ever had to deal with. I warn everyone to not give Netflix your information cause they will screw you over. I asked the supervisor if they could give me a definite date on when my money would be refunded and his response was "there is no definite date."

preview: I am replying to a comment made earlier... I am having the same issue. When I contacted Netflix about it, they instructed me to fill out a police report against Netflix. WTF?!!! Yes, I have the email saved that stated in order for me to receive past doub
review:
I am replying to a comment made earlier... I am having the same issue. When I contacted Netflix about it, they instructed me to fill out a police report against Netflix. WTF?!!! Yes, I have the email saved that stated in order for me to receive past double charges, that I needed to fill out a police report for fraud against Netflix!!! And this is not Australia or New Zealand....but in the USA!

review: Great Customer service! I called today from Italy about a couple issues, and their representative were extremely helpful in resolving all issues. Netflix Rocks, and will be keeping it for life. I think the representative name was James.

preview: Netflix thank you for treating your loyal long time customers like they matter. The fact that you keep our price locked for being with you makes me happy. Other companies should follow suit. It would serve them well. There is a lack of customer value now
review: Netflix thank you for treating your loyal long time customers like they matter. The fact that you keep our price locked for being with you makes me happy. Other companies should follow suit. It would serve them well. There is a lack of customer value nowadays and you have been a game changer. New customers should have a different rate than those whom have been around for years. Netflix for life for me. 7.99 makes me smile. I always recommend you to others.

preview: The first month free is a scam. I was charged for my free first month. Then advised it was due to the phone being used before. My phone is a brand new phone. Then was advised they will refund 3-7 business days. After that I still was not refunded. Called
review: The first month free is a scam. I was charged for my free first month. Then advised it was due to the phone being used before. My phone is a brand new phone. Then was advised they will refund 3-7 business days. After that I still was not refunded. Called back to Scamflix and they proceed to lie and tell me it has been refunded contact my back. I call my bank and they states on sign of a refund. Call back again to Scamflix and now they tell me 10 business days. Ask why does it take 10 business to refund something 1- they should have never charged me for, 2- it only took less than 24 hours for them to take out my account. To date I still don't have my refund. They insist my bank has it. I would never refer anyone to this scam company.

I enjoy watching a movie when I want and not have to wait for it in the mail, but 2 years ago they said they were going to cancel the mail service because all the movies could be streamed. NOT. preview: I love Netflix... their original programming is awesome and the price is excellent. I am bothered, however, about how they throttle movies beginning at 10 pm every night. I am a responsible data user... I know how many gb I have in my AT&T account. I mon
review: I love Netflix... their original programming is awesome and the price is excellent. I am bothered, however, about how they throttle movies beginning at 10 pm every night. I am a responsible data user... I know how many gb I have in my AT&T account. I monitor my use constantly. I found an article that says Netflix says they are throttling "to protect the consumer from overages." PLEASE stop treating me like I am not a responsible adult and PLEASE STOP THROTTLING YOUR STREAMING SERVICE every night at 10 pm on AT&T.

preview: We tried the free month-long trial Netflix offered wanting to know what the deal was about it. First off, the good points. It offered new and refreshing shows and movies that were not readily available online or on cable channels with HD quality such as
review:
We tried the free month-long trial Netflix offered wanting to know what the deal was about it. First off, the good points. It offered new and refreshing shows and movies that were not readily available online or on cable channels with HD quality such as Jane the Virgin, Jessica Jones, How to Get Away with Murder, Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt, Daredevil, etc. It was entertaining following such shows and I liked that Netflix recommended movies and shows based on my viewing preferences. That introduced me to similar shows that were worth checking out. Another good point is Netflix allows various users to create their own account and chose and save the shows they like.
Read full review

preview: I've had huge issues with this stuck at 25% issue. I'll be watching a show and then they'll get stuck at 25% - same when I want to watch a movie. It's even more annoying when you take the time to weed through the many lists to find something you're actua
review: I've had huge issues with this stuck at 25% issue. I'll be watching a show and then they'll get stuck at 25% - same when I want to watch a movie. It's even more annoying when you take the time to weed through the many lists to find something you're actually interested in and... no luck. And yes, I've reset everything. I've backed in and out, turned things off and on. After research still nothing works and it's beyond annoying. It's getting to the point where I won't continue service because I can't watch what I paid for. Thank goodness for Hulu and Amazon Prime.

preview: I have been using Netflix for around 4 years now, mainly to watch movies instantly, but it is becoming tiresome how they keep endlessly removing movies from streaming. I understand that it has to do with rights to the films, but come on guys, do you real
review: I have been using Netflix for around 4 years now, mainly to watch movies instantly, but it is becoming tiresome how they keep endlessly removing movies from streaming. I understand that it has to do with rights to the films, but come on guys, do you really need to remove EVERY good flick from streaming??? I am seriously about to close my Netflix account completely over this!!!

preview: When I signed up for 1 month free trial I was assured no payment would be taken from my card until the end of free trial period. But payment for a full month was taken within 24 hours of taking the trial period. I have been in touch with them and they ar
review: When I signed up for 1 month free trial I was assured no payment would be taken from my card until the end of free trial period. But payment for a full month was taken within 24 hours of taking the trial period. I have been in touch with them and they are adamant that no payment was taken despite my assurances that payment has been taken. So I have cancelled my subscriptions and got in touch with my bank. Avoid this company at all costs if you do not want any hassle.

preview: I have one complaint about Netflix. Most of the good movies, especially good foreign films, appear in the unavailable list with delivery time "unknown". They can be in this category for years and years. If there is no intention of ever making it availabl
review: I have one complaint about Netflix. Most of the good movies, especially good foreign films, appear in the unavailable list with delivery time "unknown". They can be in this category for years and years. If there is no intention of ever making it available, why not say so? Why keep the film in limbo?

preview: I do not recall signing up for two separate charges or services. I thought I was paying too much for the terrible services at the $7.99, then to find out I am paying for 2 separate services and $22 a month in all?? For Streaming and DVDs. Why on earth wo
review:
I do not recall signing up for two separate charges or services. I thought I was paying too much for the terrible services at the $7.99, then to find out I am paying for 2 separate services and $22 a month in all?? For Streaming and DVDs. Why on earth would I want two separate services with the same company and 2 separate billings? Sounds like a scam. Then I call the Customer service line. They have no idea, and don't care. If I really wanted to waste an entire day to request to speak with a human to request I be refunded for two separate services/billings to me for however many months they were billing me for two separate services. Then I decide to read up on some reviews to see if others have the same issue. Imagine that, I am not the only one!
Read full review

preview: I have been using Netflix Canada account for quite long time. There is so many shows. Movies are missing comparing to US account, and lost serial is lost from my account. It was there previously. There is no ETA for Better Call Saul serial session 2. The
review: I have been using Netflix Canada account for quite long time. There is so many shows. Movies are missing comparing to US account, and lost serial is lost from my account. It was there previously. There is no ETA for Better Call Saul serial session 2. There is no session 8 is available for serial called Weeds. Already called customer care center but my issue is not solved yet. Like these I have so many complaints for Netflix Canada account. Please help me sorted out all these things.

preview: Viewing movies on Netflix has been an enjoyable experience for me, so far. They have a great selection to choose from and I like how they can be filtered by category, making it easier to look for specific types of movies that I'm in the mood to see. I ap
review: Viewing movies on Netflix has been an enjoyable experience for me, so far. They have a great selection to choose from and I like how they can be filtered by category, making it easier to look for specific types of movies that I'm in the mood to see. I appreciate the site making movie suggestions based on what I've viewed recently and I find it awesome that they have so many original series of sorts to choose from. However, I noticed that they hardly have any Disney/Pixar movies available. I think it'd be great to see them available there as they're good for my daughter and nieces to watch, and myself too. But apart from that, Netflix has been a reliable companion during days or nights of free time and relaxation.

preview: You know I was a subscriber for a long time then they jacked up the price and I quit. So then the idiot CEO sends an email to the zillions of people he pissed off literally saying "Ok I'm an idiot please come back and I did." My bad. So now they throttle
review: You know I was a subscriber for a long time then they jacked up the price and I quit. So then the idiot CEO sends an email to the zillions of people he pissed off literally saying "Ok I'm an idiot please come back and I did." My bad. So now they throttle and I don't get service but still get charged. Complained and they have same "so what" attitude. Won't be back until the board fires that dishonest jerk. Hope they go out of business. Don't let them screw you.

preview: I think the answer to so many Netflix complaints since it merged with Comcast is simple. Netflix was destroying Comcast. Comcast acquired it and is sabotaging it. My only recent complaint is the request for my phone number. The choice is now or later not
review: I think the answer to so many Netflix complaints since it merged with Comcast is simple. Netflix was destroying Comcast. Comcast acquired it and is sabotaging it. My only recent complaint is the request for my phone number. The choice is now or later not never. It is small but they are starting to sound evil like Google and others that compile and sell your profile to marketers and government.

preview: I previously enjoyed excellent, personal customer service with Netflix. Now a real live human being answers (giving the impression of personal service), listens patiently to your issue before transferring you to the "dvd department". What else is Netflix
review: I previously enjoyed excellent, personal customer service with Netflix. Now a real live human being answers (giving the impression of personal service), listens patiently to your issue before transferring you to the "dvd department". What else is Netflix except dvd? Being in voicemail jail for 10 minutes was too frustrating, so I gave up. I no longer expect or enjoy personal, efficient customer service from Netflix. I guess they've just gotten too big for their britches and don't care.

preview: Having been a member of Netfilx for over 8 years I was shocked to see my account canceled. I called and got Marcus on Saturday who was very nice and laughed at my name since he's a rapper. I told him how my Netflix wasn't working and he said it was becau
review:
Having been a member of Netfilx for over 8 years I was shocked to see my account canceled. I called and got Marcus on Saturday who was very nice and laughed at my name since he's a rapper. I told him how my Netflix wasn't working and he said it was because my credit card didn't accept their charges. I get an updated card every year (VISA) from my credit union but have always gotten an email from Netflix letting me know that there was a problem and that I should login to my account to update the card info... which I've done several times over the years of new cards. This time they never sent me any email but shut off my account. When I called, Marcus told me that he needed the last 8 digits of my old VISA card. Anyone who's ever gotten a new card knows that you destroy the old card when you get a new one. The new card (obviously) had a new card number and expiration date.
Read full review

preview: They don't have some of the shows I would be interested in. But they did finally add one South Park movie. They need more South Park and they need Falling Skies. More too, just can't think of them. Good overall though.
review: They don't have some of the shows I would be interested in. But they did finally add one South Park movie. They need more South Park and they need Falling Skies. More too, just can't think of them. Good overall though.

preview: My account was hacked into a couple of months ago. Luckily, I noticed it pretty quickly and called Netflix customer service to fix it. They said it was happening more and more and we walked through the steps to fix it. What they didn't tell me is that th
review:
My account was hacked into a couple of months ago. Luckily, I noticed it pretty quickly and called Netflix customer service to fix it. They said it was happening more and more and we walked through the steps to fix it. What they didn't tell me is that the hackers had increased my account to the max. monthly cost, when it had previously been the lowest monthly cost. In my opinion, since they deal with this issue regularly, they should have made me aware of that. Fast forward two months later and I realize that I am being charged much more per month for my service for the last two months.
Read full review

preview: Thought this would be great! Wow were we wrong! We did get our free introductory month. From there it was all downhill! Then they decided to make a lot of the program's streaming & at the time it was go with it or miss out on a lot plus it was a higher p
review:
Thought this would be great! Wow were we wrong! We did get our free introductory month. From there it was all downhill! Then they decided to make a lot of the program's streaming & at the time it was go with it or miss out on a lot plus it was a higher price! 99% of the stuff they have are programs we find totally boring, worthless, no good or just completely lousy to say the least! Every single time we search for classic movies or TV shows or series we get nothing! We have tried for years to get two complete series. We add them to our list & suddenly they appear on the Unknown list! Which they have been on now, no kidding, for years! No series is ever sent in order, ever! One series only had season one available despite the fact it was on tv for 8 seasons! Most seasons were skipped or just put on the unknown list and of course it ended up on that good ol' unknown list!
Read full review

preview: Very disappointed with Netflix. They pass for new acquired movies that I've seen long time ago! I couldn't even see movies like 2012 Life of Pi without an additional charge! What a joke! Thank you very much Netflix but you can keep your lousy choice of m
review: Very disappointed with Netflix. They pass for new acquired movies that I've seen long time ago! I couldn't even see movies like 2012 Life of Pi without an additional charge! What a joke! Thank you very much Netflix but you can keep your lousy choice of movies!

preview: I joined Netflix for a free trial for a month then $9.99 after a month within my first week they charged me. I sat on the phone with them then back and forth with Apple iTunes wasting my time to end up with a two week refund and they canceled my subscrip
review: I joined Netflix for a free trial for a month then $9.99 after a month within my first week they charged me. I sat on the phone with them then back and forth with Apple iTunes wasting my time to end up with a two week refund and they canceled my subscription with them. I called them back and they tell me to do it all over again. The first time I subscribed I used a credit card. Now I get nothing and no refund till whenever. Basically it's bs!! But they want to take another ten bucks for me to do it all over again. Wow... So frustrated!!

preview: I decided to rejoin Netflix because they sent emails saying if I rejoined I would enjoy a free month. That was a joke. They immediately charged my credit card saying "Welcome back." So, I decided to add a DVD plan to my account for a series for the weeke
review: I decided to rejoin Netflix because they sent emails saying if I rejoined I would enjoy a free month. That was a joke. They immediately charged my credit card saying "Welcome back." So, I decided to add a DVD plan to my account for a series for the weekend. I started my account on a Wednesday and didn't receive the series until after the weekend on a Monday. Since I hadn't received it for the weekend, I got the series from Blockbuster and cancelled Netflix. So, I paid for a whole month's worth and only got a few DVDs to mail back as soon as I got them. I realized when I logged on to add movies, they weren't sending anything unless I rejoined. What a waste and what a disappointment.

preview: Lost my Netflix login and password because I didn't use the account much, then had to get a new credit card because of a theft, and haven't been able to get into my Netflix account since. Because I couldn't remember the login and password or the old cred
review: Lost my Netflix login and password because I didn't use the account much, then had to get a new credit card because of a theft, and haven't been able to get into my Netflix account since. Because I couldn't remember the login and password or the old credit card number I had purchased the account with, they said they couldn't help me. Apparently they have no way to search for a customer by name!!! Will be cancelling the account.

preview: Only a member of Netflix for days but already peeved off by the intended lack of proper parental controls. I want to set the account holder's level of viewing to the lowest kid level but the system won't allow it. Teen productions will be available for m
review: Only a member of Netflix for days but already peeved off by the intended lack of proper parental controls. I want to set the account holder's level of viewing to the lowest kid level but the system won't allow it. Teen productions will be available for my younger child. I object to this and the attitudes behind it. Maybe this honeymoon won't last all too long.

preview: I had Netflix for 18 years and never called to complain about anything until today when I had to scroll through multiple movie suggestions to find my "List". My "List" happens to be a list of movies that I created and am interested in and now I must scro
review: I had Netflix for 18 years and never called to complain about anything until today when I had to scroll through multiple movie suggestions to find my "List". My "List" happens to be a list of movies that I created and am interested in and now I must scroll through movie after movie that I have no interest in, to get to my list which is at the bottom. Netflix tried to blame it on TiVo, then realized that they make changes to test out different options. Customer Service said that it is their hope that customers will call in to let them know what they like and don't like. Really? "What we can do for you" they said, "is give your feedback to the decision makers and if enough people feel the same way, we will change it". When I told them that that didn't feel like they were doing something for me, they said "well, we would hate to lose you as a customer, but if you are unhappy, we could close your account". And I said, "ok" and that was the end of an 18 year relationship.

preview: I cancelled my Netflix account today, after 2 years of ongoing difficulties, but my main reasons are as follows: 1. The service offered to Australian subscribers is nothing short of a rip-off. There is absolutely nothing Netflix offers that cannot be fou
review:
I cancelled my Netflix account today, after 2 years of ongoing difficulties, but my main reasons are as follows: 1. The service offered to Australian subscribers is nothing short of a rip-off. There is absolutely nothing Netflix offers that cannot be found on other sites, either for free, or subscriber sites with better services (for much less). 2. Their "tech-support" seems to consist of trained monkeys who just trot out pre-ordained scripts, that often have very little to do with your problem. They certainly don't ever solve your problem, whatever it may be. Mostly, they just waste your time until you give up in frustration.
Read full review

preview: I have been with Netflix for over 6 years, but this is coming to an end. Every time I try to watch something an error message comes up "We currently having trouble playing this title, please try again later or select a different title" or something like
review:
I have been with Netflix for over 6 years, but this is coming to an end. Every time I try to watch something an error message comes up "We currently having trouble playing this title, please try again later or select a different title" or something like this. This is happening now for long and long months. I had been on to customer service several times, but they seem to blame it on everything, including birds singing too close to my house, but themselves. I have over 80Mb super fast broadband speed, everything else literally flying on my internet, and had no problem in the past five years. It was streaming on the same smart TV, same router, in the same spot within the house, but Netflix claims my internet is too slow, or it doesn't work at all, there is a bug with my connection, my TV is too far from the router, my TV is not compatible, my router is not compatible, I' not compatible, etc...
Read full review

preview: Netflix was far from being perfect in the first place, but after merging with Comcast it definitely acquired the business rules dealing with their customers that for years being cultivated in this failing company. Received a Polish movie without English
review: Netflix was far from being perfect in the first place, but after merging with Comcast it definitely acquired the business rules dealing with their customers that for years being cultivated in this failing company. Received a Polish movie without English subtitles. Reported a problem. The next week received the same copy without English subtitles either. Called the customer service and talked to Sam. Apparently if it is a foreign movie that you order, it does not give you any guarantee that it has English translation. Even if it does not specify about that on the sleeve or on the web description, or anywhere else that it does not. So it will be your lucky number unless you are multilingual (which I am close to, but unfortunately Polish is not in my list). So out of 2 DVD plan movies received this month we managed to watch none. The guy in the DVD department was very rude too.

preview: I have had a hybrid NetFlix account (Streaming + DVD) for many years (like 10 years) that I paid once a month on the 13th. I recently received a NetFlix Gift Card for my birthday that applies credit to an existing NetFlix account. I applied the NetFlix G
review:
I have had a hybrid NetFlix account (Streaming + DVD) for many years (like 10 years) that I paid once a month on the 13th. I recently received a NetFlix Gift Card for my birthday that applies credit to an existing NetFlix account. I applied the NetFlix Gift Card to my account in February 2016. Then in March, NetFlix split my account into two accounts of Streaming and DVD which have two separate billing dates of the 4th and 13th of each month. This split all occurred when the NetFlix Gift Card was applied to my account in February.
Read full review

preview: Was going over my bank statements for tax purposes and noticed that for the last 21 months I have been being billed 3 times a month. I called Netflix and tried to talk with them about it, and became even more frustrated than when noticing the extra charg
review: Was going over my bank statements for tax purposes and noticed that for the last 21 months I have been being billed 3 times a month. I called Netflix and tried to talk with them about it, and became even more frustrated than when noticing the extra charges. "Ross" a supposed supervisor out of Colorado, who would not give me a last name or let me talk with any other supervisors was not very helpful. He said all he would do for me is refund me for 6 months and if I was not satisfied I could cancel my account. What a lot of help they were after paying for Netflix for the past 3 1/2 years.

preview: Netflix has removed taste preferences, replaced by an algorithm of starred content. I have completed "one" starring programs that I would not watch in my wildest imagination and 5 starring the genre of the ones I like, as their "Global Algorithm" has sug
review:
Netflix has removed taste preferences, replaced by an algorithm of starred content. I have completed "one" starring programs that I would not watch in my wildest imagination and 5 starring the genre of the ones I like, as their "Global Algorithm" has suggested. AND they are all still right there for me to view. I am very happy to find out that a middle aged professional woman in Japan and I, a middle aged southern American woman, are seemingly getting the same suggestions. And with one star, they move nowhere except the same spot I saw them last.
Read full review

preview: Unfortunately after all this time with Netflix I am thinking of making a change. Their service is starting to slip. Got a notification via email that the Mindy Project Season 4 was now online. Later that night starting watching it. After about 4.5 episod
review:
Unfortunately after all this time with Netflix I am thinking of making a change. Their service is starting to slip. Got a notification via email that the Mindy Project Season 4 was now online. Later that night starting watching it. After about 4.5 episodes watched, all of a sudden the screen went blank and some sort of error message appeared. Well after chatting with customer support the show was yanked because the episodes were not in order. 24 hours later still Season 4 was not up. Contacted them once again and told soon but given no real info. Seriously? Right in the middle of a show and it gets yanked and no one knows when it will be back again?
Read full review

preview: Once again got a DVD and of course it was scratched up so we couldn't watch it. The movie was over 2 hours long. We watched an hour of it and it took about 1 1/2 hours to watch and missed probably 15 mins of it because it kept freezing up and skipping pa
review:
Once again got a DVD and of course it was scratched up so we couldn't watch it. The movie was over 2 hours long. We watched an hour of it and it took about 1 1/2 hours to watch and missed probably 15 mins of it because it kept freezing up and skipping parts. Finally it froze up so hard it would start over at "Push Play". So I called them and they are suppose to send one out right away. I am so ready to drop them because it costs so much for the DVD's and we only get two a month. A lot of money for CRAP.
Read full review

preview: I've been having trouble accessing Netflix while connected to a VPN (which in my case is a special router, not a program or extension that runs on my computer). Which I use solely for privacy/security purposes (in fact it's a requirement for my job so I'
review:
I've been having trouble accessing Netflix while connected to a VPN (which in my case is a special router, not a program or extension that runs on my computer). Which I use solely for privacy/security purposes (in fact it's a requirement for my job so I'm left with little choice). I have never even tried to stream something not available in my country nor do I connect to servers outside my own country. Yet, Netflix feels it necessary to block me on the grounds that I may be trying to watch content blocked in my own country. This obviously makes no sense in my case.
Read full review

preview: I signed up for the free month, followed by then $7.99/mo DVD plan. After my free month was up I was billed $18.46. Apparently you have to pay the monthly price for EACH service (DVD and streaming), but I never signed up for the streaming just the DVD. W
review:
I signed up for the free month, followed by then $7.99/mo DVD plan. After my free month was up I was billed $18.46. Apparently you have to pay the monthly price for EACH service (DVD and streaming), but I never signed up for the streaming just the DVD. When I called customer service they informed me I could get a refund but had to transfer me to another department.
Read full review

preview: I had realized after 11 months of subscriptions that I had been inadvertently paying for two accounts, one Canadian one European. I called the help line and dealt with Daniel (Feb 15, 4:45pm MST) who not only cancelled the account but refunded my money (
review: I had realized after 11 months of subscriptions that I had been inadvertently paying for two accounts, one Canadian one European. I called the help line and dealt with Daniel (Feb 15, 4:45pm MST) who not only cancelled the account but refunded my money ($85 with currency conversion) for the unused subscription. All dealt with under 5 minutes, very positive experience.

preview: Don't ever have financial troubles or they will charge you 15% plus the monthly fee to restart your account. I told the agent, "I was .08 short." and he laughed at me and said, "If you don't have enough you aren't going to get it." Sorry life happened fo
review: Don't ever have financial troubles or they will charge you 15% plus the monthly fee to restart your account. I told the agent, "I was .08 short." and he laughed at me and said, "If you don't have enough you aren't going to get it." Sorry life happened for a month. I now subscribe to Hulu, which is way better anyway.

preview: Today February 2016 to my surprise, I found out that my bill was due yet I didn't receive notice from Netflix, yet they still managed to send me a email stating that there was a problem with my account. When I called customer service, William's response
review: Today February 2016 to my surprise, I found out that my bill was due yet I didn't receive notice from Netflix, yet they still managed to send me a email stating that there was a problem with my account. When I called customer service, William's response to my complaint is that "we don't have to notify you." Then he went on to say that "I don't know why you're telling me I'm at the bottom of the totem poll". I then agreed with him on that and hung up.

preview: I have been with this company 10 years and the last couple of months have been unable to play the movies they send to me. Called on a weekend told them the above statement and received no advice so I cancelled due to the response of that person. They are
review: I have been with this company 10 years and the last couple of months have been unable to play the movies they send to me. Called on a weekend told them the above statement and received no advice so I cancelled due to the response of that person. They are charging for a product that does not work well and with no responsibility.

preview: I have been a member of Netflix for many years and I have seen their level of customer service steadily decline since their splitting the streaming and DVD divisions into two companies debacle of a few years ago. That episode showed extremely poor compan
review:
I have been a member of Netflix for many years and I have seen their level of customer service steadily decline since their splitting the streaming and DVD divisions into two companies debacle of a few years ago. That episode showed extremely poor company management with no regard for their customers and it seems that their management hasn't improved since.
Read full review

preview: Back before Netflix was affiliated with Comcast they were great. I had them long ago when they first came out. Great movie choice. You return a movie, you pretty much get another the next day. And streaming use to be included and if you accidently sent o
review:
Back before Netflix was affiliated with Comcast they were great. I had them long ago when they first came out. Great movie choice. You return a movie, you pretty much get another the next day. And streaming use to be included and if you accidently sent one of your DVDs, they gave you credit on your bill. I was with them 3 happy yrs till I didn't have the money.
Read full review

preview: NETFLIX has recently changed their website for both DVD and Streaming and is basically unusable via Windows 10. Takes so long just to do a search when in the streaming portion and can hardly move movies to the top of the queue. Also when have both servic
review: NETFLIX has recently changed their website for both DVD and Streaming and is basically unusable via Windows 10. Takes so long just to do a search when in the streaming portion and can hardly move movies to the top of the queue. Also when have both services can't add to your watch list a movie that is streaming when in the DVD portion - you can play it though. The website has become ridiculously difficult to use and is frustrating, diminishing the ease of watching movies - with the advent of using a laptop as a tablet NETFLIX has dropped the ball. They need to get website developers that know what they are doing. Considering dropping the service - searching for a movie should not take 20 mins.

preview: Mail takes one day to get from our town to Honolulu. Netflix takes 3-4 days. They seem to purposefully delay shipping so that customers get few DVDs per month. I cancelled a couple of days before the billing date and noticed they had still charged my cre
review: Mail takes one day to get from our town to Honolulu. Netflix takes 3-4 days. They seem to purposefully delay shipping so that customers get few DVDs per month. I cancelled a couple of days before the billing date and noticed they had still charged my credit card. They got an extra $12 out of a customer by doing so, but have lost my business permanently.

preview: I did not use Netflix for more than a half year, and Netflix staff decided to give a refund from last used month. Basically, they did not achieve it as what they promised. They always provide wrong and different information. Please be care for their serv
review: I did not use Netflix for more than a half year, and Netflix staff decided to give a refund from last used month. Basically, they did not achieve it as what they promised. They always provide wrong and different information. Please be care for their service as it is not always true. If you did not cancel your Netflix account they will charge you for your whole life, perhaps you would not notice. If you realize that you have lost money from your bank account, they won't give you right and responsible answer. Do suggest to use other companies. When I ask for a value responds, the Netflix staff said "You have to manage your account, everything up to you."

preview: To start I only stream for $8.00 a month. Approx. 3 wks ago my Netflix came due and since I was running low on money in my bank acct I decided to buy a $20 gift card so I wouldn't chance over drafting because we think my bank acct was hacked. Called in t
review:
To start I only stream for $8.00 a month. Approx. 3 wks ago my Netflix came due and since I was running low on money in my bank acct I decided to buy a $20 gift card so I wouldn't chance over drafting because we think my bank acct was hacked. Called in the card and they took it over the phone. Several hrs later still no Netflix. Called them up again and they finally turned it on. Several days later that week it was turned off again for payment. I called them up and they tell me they didn't know how to make the card apply to my acct, but somehow they turned it on again. The same thing happened a week later. Then again this week. So when I asked to speak to the supervisor, Kerry put on Calvin. Calvin proceeds to tell me that they need to charge my bank account in order to apply the $20 card I purchased.
Read full review

preview: Always having problems with film titles. You try to watch a film, comes up having problems with that title. Try another, same problem, all old films. I shall change ASAP. £5.99 for total rubbish, not good enough, total rubbish.
review: Always having problems with film titles. You try to watch a film, comes up having problems with that title. Try another, same problem, all old films. I shall change ASAP. £5.99 for total rubbish, not good enough, total rubbish.

preview: I have been a customer of Netflix since 2008. My payments are always made on time. I was looking at possible changes to my streaming account, made a change by accident, their system didn't give me an option to reverse or cancel the change. I called Netfl
review: I have been a customer of Netflix since 2008. My payments are always made on time. I was looking at possible changes to my streaming account, made a change by accident, their system didn't give me an option to reverse or cancel the change. I called Netflix customer service immediately to see if they could cancel the change since it doesn't go into effect until my next billing cycle. Of course they can't. WOW NETFLIX, way to treat your long term clients, no wonder you’re losing them.

preview: I was a member for a year until I decided to partner up with Hulu. After a couple months I canceled my Netflix account and then I came back to Netflix. Little did I know they raised a DOLLAR. $9.99? So I accepted it, didn't know they CHARGED 15% to come
review: I was a member for a year until I decided to partner up with Hulu. After a couple months I canceled my Netflix account and then I came back to Netflix. Little did I know they raised a DOLLAR. $9.99? So I accepted it, didn't know they CHARGED 15% to come back to Netflix. WTF? So basically, I paid another $11.72 with a 15%. Especially for that much a month with tax I wouldn't pay that much because they don't UPDATE UNTIL MONTHS. Smh at Netflix, I'm done with it.

preview: I was not able to connect to Netflix, so I called their support. Very nice people but useless support. They told me that the version of Netflix app was old and I had to call Panasonic to get a firmware update. I checked online and my version of the firmw
review: I was not able to connect to Netflix, so I called their support. Very nice people but useless support. They told me that the version of Netflix app was old and I had to call Panasonic to get a firmware update. I checked online and my version of the firmware was the latest version. So, after 4 calls to Netflix support I ended up calling Panasonic since Netflix support would not help otherwise. Panasonic fixed my problem in less than 5 minutes. The problem was the DNS. Netflix had changed their servers and for some reasons my DNS did not change. Once I changed the DNS, everything started working.

preview: Been a paying Netflix member for many years. Seems like about a year ago they stopped sending movies on Saturdays. As of about 1 month ago, it takes Netflix 3-4 days for movies to arrive and, 3-4 days to get back to the outlet. This is a far cry from the
review: Been a paying Netflix member for many years. Seems like about a year ago they stopped sending movies on Saturdays. As of about 1 month ago, it takes Netflix 3-4 days for movies to arrive and, 3-4 days to get back to the outlet. This is a far cry from the service I have been receiving for the many years prior. When did they get the right to renegotiate my terms/contract and get away with going from movies being here next day to 3-4 days for each movie? So I'm still paying the same rate for 1/4 the service. A blatant rip off!

preview: I was wondering why we pay so much for Netflix and you dont even play new episodes of svu, or don't even have Chicago fire or Chicago pd.
review: I was wondering why we pay so much for Netflix and you dont even play new episodes of svu, or don't even have Chicago fire or Chicago pd.

preview: Netflix offers me a 2nd free trial ad in my email saying "We would like to offer you ANOTHER free trial." So, I sign up to see if their selection has improved. I did not get a free trial. I got charged. When I called and asked them about it they said tha
review: Netflix offers me a 2nd free trial ad in my email saying "We would like to offer you ANOTHER free trial." So, I sign up to see if their selection has improved. I did not get a free trial. I got charged. When I called and asked them about it they said that my e-mail address has already had a free trial. Whoops. I thought they really were offering me a second free trial. Silly me. Btw - Hulu offers better streams for free than Netflix makes you pay for. So long, Netflix.

preview: I was under my son's account but somehow it stopped. Since I was enjoying the service with other kids in the house, I started my own account today to continue service. It still would not open and I paid, followed all steps, re-downloaded, and finally con
review: I was under my son's account but somehow it stopped. Since I was enjoying the service with other kids in the house, I started my own account today to continue service. It still would not open and I paid, followed all steps, re-downloaded, and finally contacted Customer Service who was so confusing, they eventually hung up after I requested a refund. Who does that? On to another.

preview: What happens is that Netflix will send you a replacement or the next disc in your queue. Fair enough. But you're paying by the month, which is time. You are not compensated in any way for the time you have been forced to waste in your subscription when y
review: What happens is that Netflix will send you a replacement or the next disc in your queue. Fair enough. But you're paying by the month, which is time. You are not compensated in any way for the time you have been forced to waste in your subscription when you receive a damaged disc. So - if you watched a DVD on the day you received it, you would be able to watch X number of discs each month that you are paying for. If you lose time by not being able to watch a damaged disc, you have been ripped off. Netflix makes no provision to compensate paying members for lost time.

preview: After being frustrated by a problem streaming Netflix--I can play a program, but am unable to go back to my homepage; instead, it automatically restarts whatever program I am watching. I called their customer service department. (It took two calls and at
review:
After being frustrated by a problem streaming Netflix--I can play a program, but am unable to go back to my homepage; instead, it automatically restarts whatever program I am watching. I called their customer service department. (It took two calls and at least 20 minutes to get anywhere, and even then, I was left feeling completely dissatisfied.)
Read full review

preview: There are TV series that I'd like to watch on Netflix DVDs, but many are not available; e.g., "The Killing". Only its first season is available on DVD, yet there have been four seasons (and Netflix owns that particular series!). When I complained, the re
review: There are TV series that I'd like to watch on Netflix DVDs, but many are not available; e.g., "The Killing". Only its first season is available on DVD, yet there have been four seasons (and Netflix owns that particular series!). When I complained, the rep told me that all she could do is note my complaint. She said the problem is the limited amount of DVDs that Netflix is now producing. It is much cheaper for Netflix to stream. As a matter of fact, "The Killing's" four seasons are available via streaming. Unfortunately, for those of us who cannot obtain unlimited Internet in our area, streaming is too costly for our limited GBs. Another Netflix-produced series is "House of Cards". Its third season premiere was February 27. It has been at the #1 spot on my queue since it became available on DVD. I have yet to receive it -- 8 months later.

preview: These ** charged my card, did not supply the movies for two whole months, turned around, charge the card again, (owed me 3 free months) and then tried to charge my card a third time!!! I have received none of what I was supposed to see at all!!! I hate *
review: These ** charged my card, did not supply the movies for two whole months, turned around, charge the card again, (owed me 3 free months) and then tried to charge my card a third time!!! I have received none of what I was supposed to see at all!!! I hate ** thieves... (They even admitted that they were doing it!!!)

preview: I noticed Netflix was charging me for DVDs for approximately 1 year. I realized that all I was using was the "Streaming" and never signed up for DVDs nor received any. I called to get a @ year refund. The customer service DVD dept. advised. She (Krystal)
review: I noticed Netflix was charging me for DVDs for approximately 1 year. I realized that all I was using was the "Streaming" and never signed up for DVDs nor received any. I called to get a @ year refund. The customer service DVD dept. advised. She (Krystal) said we can only refund 3 months for their error!!! I asked to speak to a manager and Calvin the supervisor got on the phone and stated he/they can only refund 3 months of the 12 months. I asked to speak to his boss and he said "I cannot" nor did he supply me his supervisors contact E-mail. This company fraudulently overcharged me and will not do the right thing. I'm disgusted. I told him to cancel my subscription. He did not attempt to keep my business nor work with me. Netflix is an unethical company. Do not use them!

preview: I've been a customer of Netflix for over a decade. Out of corporate greed, they have often displayed a dismissal of customer service but this tops it for me. I have almost always returned my discs on a Saturday and 99% of the time I've been sent whatever
review:
I've been a customer of Netflix for over a decade. Out of corporate greed, they have often displayed a dismissal of customer service but this tops it for me. I have almost always returned my discs on a Saturday and 99% of the time I've been sent whatever newly released discs at the top of my list, which I received on Tuesdays. When there was an error, 90% of the time it was due to the post office. However, for the past 5 weeks, this has suddenly stopped. Netflix has stopped acknowledging the receipt of the returned discs until Tuesday and that delays me receiving the new discs until Wednesday. And, thanks to the delay, I am rarely getting the newly released discs at the top of my list.
Read full review

preview: I got a new debit card (new number) a little less than a month ago. Netflix turned off my account when the monthly fee came around. I was fine with this as I hardly use it anymore and I'm currently out of work. Fast forward two days and I get an email th
review: I got a new debit card (new number) a little less than a month ago. Netflix turned off my account when the monthly fee came around. I was fine with this as I hardly use it anymore and I'm currently out of work. Fast forward two days and I get an email that my account has been renewed using my new debit card with numbers ending in ** (this is the last 4 digits of my new card). I didn't renew and never gave them this information. I talked to customer service and they said they would give me my money back. This is all well and good, but there is no reason they should have access to my new debit card number or be able to reactivate my account and start charging me without my permission. Not sure how they got it, but there is no legal way they could have done so.

preview: I have not been able to stream for 3 days. My internet connection is fine. I have internet everywhere else in my apartment. I was prompted to run a connection test and was conveniently "disconnected" but only from Netflix. This is ridiculous.
review: I have not been able to stream for 3 days. My internet connection is fine. I have internet everywhere else in my apartment. I was prompted to run a connection test and was conveniently "disconnected" but only from Netflix. This is ridiculous.

preview: I signed up for Netflix for the free trial for one month. It ended Aug. 25, 2015. I canceled a couple of days before the end of the trial and received confirmation by e-mail. One day after the trial ended I noticed a payment being processed by PayPal for
review: I signed up for Netflix for the free trial for one month. It ended Aug. 25, 2015. I canceled a couple of days before the end of the trial and received confirmation by e-mail. One day after the trial ended I noticed a payment being processed by PayPal for Netflix. I chatted with Netflix and they said someone reactivated the account yesterday. That is just not true. I knew this monthly trial was too good to be true, right? Netflix said they do not reactivate accounts. Well I know I did not do it. Netflix movies suck. Not one did I recognize. Never again.

preview: I just got off the phone with Netflix and here are the facts: I noticed a suspicious charge on my bank account and called to find out what the explanation was. I was told, very courteous call, that I had another open account, however the login account na
review:
I just got off the phone with Netflix and here are the facts: I noticed a suspicious charge on my bank account and called to find out what the explanation was. I was told, very courteous call, that I had another open account, however the login account name was misspelled in the Netflix database. Instead of **@hotmail.com this other account login name was **@hotmal.com. Notice the second login name is missing a character, the "i" in hotmail. Based upon the explanation that I was given I agreed to a refund of 3 months, however I had discovered that I hadn't used the streaming account since 9 months ago! But, the DVD plan sent DVD's to me that I had returned except for K-Pax and another DVD that I can't remember the name of right now. The last DVD that was sent to me was sent 4 months ago. It was an automated process by the way.
Read full review

preview: Netflix has been charging my credit card but I have never used their service! Tried contacting them via Facebook and Twitter but no reply until now. Telephone call is not feasible for me. I just need to cancel my account. It is bizarre that an online com
review: Netflix has been charging my credit card but I have never used their service! Tried contacting them via Facebook and Twitter but no reply until now. Telephone call is not feasible for me. I just need to cancel my account. It is bizarre that an online company doesn't have an email.

preview: I called for account help and D'Andre from Michigan was absolutely amazing! So helpful and personal. He treated me like a human customer with feelings and frustrations. It felt good to not be treated like just another number. You rock D'andre!
review: I called for account help and D'Andre from Michigan was absolutely amazing! So helpful and personal. He treated me like a human customer with feelings and frustrations. It felt good to not be treated like just another number. You rock D'andre!

preview: I called customer service to downgrade from 2 monitors to 1. I called 3x and none of the residents could hear me. So I called a friend to see if they can hear me and they could... So I called Netflix back 2 more times and they still couldn't hear me... w
review: I called customer service to downgrade from 2 monitors to 1. I called 3x and none of the residents could hear me. So I called a friend to see if they can hear me and they could... So I called Netflix back 2 more times and they still couldn't hear me... wth. Before this issues with cs. The movies would be buffering for long periods of time. It's nothing wrong with internet because everything was checked out with Comcast. Netflix please get it together. I've been with you at least 6 years.

preview: Netflix is forcing its customers to sign an agreement under threat of cancellation. As I understand the law, any contract signed under duress or coercion is illegal. I have done nothing to justify cancellation.
review: Netflix is forcing its customers to sign an agreement under threat of cancellation. As I understand the law, any contract signed under duress or coercion is illegal. I have done nothing to justify cancellation.

preview: I logged on to Netflix the other day and a pop-up or something like that said there was a message on my account. I checked and it said that my payment did not process so I paid the $8.79, which was on 7/26/15, using the same card that was on file. This m
review: I logged on to Netflix the other day and a pop-up or something like that said there was a message on my account. I checked and it said that my payment did not process so I paid the $8.79, which was on 7/26/15, using the same card that was on file. This morning, 7/31/15, I look at my account and noticed that they charged me again, this time for $9.73. I called up and she told me that it's a hold or something like that, and one of the charges will be reversed. The bottom line is both of those payments are deducted from my account and are not included in my available balance. It may be a small amount of money, and I am sure there are thousands of people who are being double billed right now and don't even know it. I cancelled them years ago due to this same issue and so did several other people I know. They all switched to Hulu Plus or Amazon Prime and that's exactly what I am about to do!

preview: After the signing up for the free trial for Netflix, they charged me 2 weeks into the free trial. After the free trial ended they said I have a payment issue. They held my account on hold until I payed. But they already charged me. So why do they have to
review: After the signing up for the free trial for Netflix, they charged me 2 weeks into the free trial. After the free trial ended they said I have a payment issue. They held my account on hold until I payed. But they already charged me. So why do they have to charge me again?

preview: I recently subscribed to Netflix and my account was placed on hold. I put the funds on the card and service was restored. 4 days later we get the same message and they were no help in explaining why. This is the worst experience ever.
review: I recently subscribed to Netflix and my account was placed on hold. I put the funds on the card and service was restored. 4 days later we get the same message and they were no help in explaining why. This is the worst experience ever.

preview: Started to watch a new series, picture but no sound. Called Netflix. I admit to making the following error: The first person I spoke with, I gave the incorrect information as to the series I was attempting to watch. I told her Justified, which is not on
review:
Started to watch a new series, picture but no sound. Called Netflix. I admit to making the following error: The first person I spoke with, I gave the incorrect information as to the series I was attempting to watch. I told her Justified, which is not on Netflix. After realizing my mistake, I told her the correct series I was having trouble with. However, she could not get off Justifed. Kept going back saying it is not a Netflix series. We agreed on that over and over. So, I said I will just start a new call and not mention Justified. Second call I got Avery. He determined that my problem was with Netflix original series. Without all the gory details, by the time Avery got done with me, I had no sound on any station due to instructions from Avery.
Read full review

preview: I do not get paid at midnight on payday and was watching movies in the middle of the night due to my work hours from 6pm-6am, Netflix picks random times to push my bill through and when I asked if it could be resolved until I get paid, which doesn't happ
review: I do not get paid at midnight on payday and was watching movies in the middle of the night due to my work hours from 6pm-6am, Netflix picks random times to push my bill through and when I asked if it could be resolved until I get paid, which doesn't happen until later in the morning, about 8am, they said NO! I asked to speak to a supervisor and he just repeated the same spiel… with a happy tone. So I said "it is unsatisfactory and I would like to cancel". He said "ok", happily and canceled it immediately just as happy as if I'd just signed up. No customer service to help resolve a problem such as this. Even though I had been making payment on time for almost a full year! The supervisor acted as though I were wishing him a merry Christmas instead of cancelling the service and that says… "they do not care". Angry ex Netflix user!!!

preview: I have waited for Netflix to put shows on Netflix - like the game has season 10 on tv they only have up to 3, and they took stuff off that I watch. And every time I ask it takes forever, it's been two years. Netflix is worthless to me and a waste of mone
review: I have waited for Netflix to put shows on Netflix - like the game has season 10 on tv they only have up to 3, and they took stuff off that I watch. And every time I ask it takes forever, it's been two years. Netflix is worthless to me and a waste of money.

preview: I am sick and tired of Netflix's policy of "suggesting" dozens of titles to you just because you selected one title. That apparently gives them the right to suggest many, many titles of their choice that you have no choice but to go through until you can
review: I am sick and tired of Netflix's policy of "suggesting" dozens of titles to you just because you selected one title. That apparently gives them the right to suggest many, many titles of their choice that you have no choice but to go through until you can get to what you actually want! Now I'm adding to this. Why can't Netflix simply categorize movies as they really are? Is it really that difficult to distinguish between an English speaking movie and a foreign one? Apparently it is for Netflix who only cares about collecting their monthly fee, not earning it. Just in case you didn't get my point, I am totally disgusted with Netflix!!!

preview: The streaming service drops out or fails to connect. Drop outs are common while watching a movie. I have Comcast internet. A Comcast technician came to my home and showed me that my internet service was functioning properly. All the Netflix "fixes" liste
review: The streaming service drops out or fails to connect. Drop outs are common while watching a movie. I have Comcast internet. A Comcast technician came to my home and showed me that my internet service was functioning properly. All the Netflix "fixes" listed on their website do not improve the service. I have had Netflix for over ten years.

I am in the process of writing a complaint to the attorney general's office. This should be a story for American Greed. Please investigate them.

review:
Netflix refuses to issue me a refund after mos. of billing for 3 instead of 2 disks! Since April I've tried to adjust my account back to 2 discs: ONLINE as well as in EMAILS to "Netflix Resolutions" & Netflix Customer service NO ONE has ever responded. When my credit card bill arrives, it's for still 3 disks. I didn't order 3, I can't watch 3, and I'm not paying for 3. After umpteen calls they finally switched me back to 2 per week but refuse to issue a refund.
