review: While waiting at the airport in Mexico City, I was able to get a much more varied choice of movies and tv shows. I was so excited! I added MANY of them to My List. Now I'm back in Portland. I cannot find any of the movies/shows. I'm extremely disappointed that you offer items to "regions" rather than to all. If I cannot get my full list back, it might be time to say goodbye to Netflix.

preview: Have been charged twice a month of 8.55 for the past 6 months. Yes, my fault for not checking the date to make sure Netflix is taking the correct amount out, but should I/we really need to check our bank statements every month to make sure Netflix (a ser
review: Have been charged twice a month of 8.55 for the past 6 months. Yes, my fault for not checking the date to make sure Netflix is taking the correct amount out, but should I/we really need to check our bank statements every month to make sure Netflix (a service of $8.55) isn't going to charge me more than once a month?! Ridiculous! I'm calling today and will see what they have to say.

preview: Netflix never went by the profiles that I chose. They chose their own - mostly garbage. Once I chose to delete a movie, series, etc. they would not delete it. I was unable to delete because my smart TV does not allow it. There is no website to Netflix to
review: Netflix never went by the profiles that I chose. They chose their own - mostly garbage. Once I chose to delete a movie, series, etc. they would not delete it. I was unable to delete because my smart TV does not allow it. There is no website to Netflix to delete. This is why I cancelled.

preview: They should email and ask you to pay! It is also hard to cancel Netflix because they don't have a schedule!!!
review: They should email and ask you to pay! It is also hard to cancel Netflix because they don't have a schedule!!!

preview: It has always worked fine and perfect until March 7th and it loads 97% and then stays there for hours!
review: It has always worked fine and perfect until March 7th and it loads 97% and then stays there for hours!

preview: Before I go through all steps. I would like to add, looking at this review page, I am flat out astonished at amount of 1 stars I see scrolling through here. 2 am in the middle of a movie "96minutes", connection drops. I wanted to break my TV. I have had
review:
Before I go through all steps. I would like to add, looking at this review page, I am flat out astonished at amount of 1 stars I see scrolling through here. 2 am in the middle of a movie "96minutes", connection drops. I wanted to break my TV. I have had so many issues with Netflix and this whole connection. I have had tier 3 tech support review my entire connection set up. Have had tier 3 tech come to my house and review connection from main box to my house. No issues. I am 12 miles from main fiber optic panel. I have wifi with turbo due to my job. With all that, I still have this connection issue dropping so randomly. Oh and before you ask. It happens whether I have one person streaming or none.
Read full review

preview: Before mid part of last year things have been great with their services. Timely delivery to my mailbox, when making changes to your dvd check out and getting back to once again subscribe. Now, it is so frustrating that even the past 12 or 16 hours, I upg
review: Before mid part of last year things have been great with their services. Timely delivery to my mailbox, when making changes to your dvd check out and getting back to once again subscribe. Now, it is so frustrating that even the past 12 or 16 hours, I upgraded to an additional dvd checkout, still none is showing that it is ready for delivery. When I resigned and it was on a weekend and called them, I was told that people are out.

preview: Okay, I'll hand it to Netflix. I was having trouble getting my device to activate, so I called the customer service line (with dread). Somebody took my call immediately, and it was fixed within three minutes. The guy who took my call, Jesus, was friendly
review: Okay, I'll hand it to Netflix. I was having trouble getting my device to activate, so I called the customer service line (with dread). Somebody took my call immediately, and it was fixed within three minutes. The guy who took my call, Jesus, was friendly and knowledgeable. You go, Netflix! Give Jesus was a gold star!

preview: What used to take Netflix 1-2 days for me to receive a DVD, now takes 3-4 days. I called Netflix to find out why and was told this was an issue with the Post Office. This is patently incorrect. The DVDs I send them are posted in as little as 12 hours fro
review: What used to take Netflix 1-2 days for me to receive a DVD, now takes 3-4 days. I called Netflix to find out why and was told this was an issue with the Post Office. This is patently incorrect. The DVDs I send them are posted in as little as 12 hours from the time I place it in the mailbox. A quick search of the internet shows this problem is well documented and many others are being told the same lie. Netflix is throttling heavy users and using the Post Office as an excuse. I hope the Post Office sues Netflix for defamation.

preview: It has been months since Netflix email predicted arrival dates of DVD's has been REMOTELY accurate. Postal service has changed their shipping methods and it takes a week or more for a full turnaround! That means I am getting 1/2 the DVD's as before, twic
review: It has been months since Netflix email predicted arrival dates of DVD's has been REMOTELY accurate. Postal service has changed their shipping methods and it takes a week or more for a full turnaround! That means I am getting 1/2 the DVD's as before, twice the cost per movie! This stinks. I have no reasonably priced access to stream movies and shows. HELP!

preview: After spending over ten grand in audio upgrades, Anthem, Nexus player, cables etc... No Dolby!!! Stereo only. It's so funny that Netflix is so far behind!!! So I can stream a 1080 p with Dolby dig DTS HD without any problems from my laptop or my desktop
review: After spending over ten grand in audio upgrades, Anthem, Nexus player, cables etc... No Dolby!!! Stereo only. It's so funny that Netflix is so far behind!!! So I can stream a 1080 p with Dolby dig DTS HD without any problems from my laptop or my desktop wireless to my system!!! Not Netflix! If you want to grow as a company you need to get up to speed!!! Or you will be left out!!!

preview: I love Netflix, but I hate the fact that you can only watch it on two screens. Most households have about 3 or 4 tvs. So I think that if you have to pay for Netflix they should let you watch it on 4 screens.
review: I love Netflix, but I hate the fact that you can only watch it on two screens. Most households have about 3 or 4 tvs. So I think that if you have to pay for Netflix they should let you watch it on 4 screens.

preview: I tried Netflix for a month, and decided it was not worth having because, in a week I watched all the movies that interest me. I couldn't find any movies after I wanted to watch and I searched and still nothing. My genre was always low on movies as well,
review: I tried Netflix for a month, and decided it was not worth having because, in a week I watched all the movies that interest me. I couldn't find any movies after I wanted to watch and I searched and still nothing. My genre was always low on movies as well, and never any new ones.. I have the WII and you can't get a lot of movies. Always the same movies..

preview: Netflix is a complete rip off. I signed up for Netflix because of the variety of TV series they have available. When it works it's great... when it works. Unfortunately most of the time it doesn't. If you have a couple devices using your wi-fi good luck.
review: Netflix is a complete rip off. I signed up for Netflix because of the variety of TV series they have available. When it works it's great... when it works. Unfortunately most of the time it doesn't. If you have a couple devices using your wi-fi good luck. Netflix works maybe 25% of the time and that's being generous. Then I get that awesome loading sign and I am lucky if I can get through even one episode before that happens let alone a whole movie. Honestly sometimes it works fine and if it worked more often I'd love it but the fact is I have had way too many instances when it doesn't. Don't waste your money.

preview: These creeps charged me for service that I cancelled for 4 months then they refused to refund the money after I noticed. Said I should have "called earlier."
review: These creeps charged me for service that I cancelled for 4 months then they refused to refund the money after I noticed. Said I should have "called earlier."

preview: It was bad enough when Netflix stopped sending out DVDs on Saturday, but then they found an even better way to cheat customers. Now instead of mailing out dvds in the morning (so I get them the next day), they now send them out in the afternoon so they a
review: It was bad enough when Netflix stopped sending out DVDs on Saturday, but then they found an even better way to cheat customers. Now instead of mailing out dvds in the morning (so I get them the next day), they now send them out in the afternoon so they arrive in two days. (I know they are sending them later because the email mailing messages arrive much later). A Netflix representative acknowledged I will be getting half as many DVDs but also said that Netflix has no plans to reduce its price. So if I stay with Netflix they get the same money for providing about 50% of the product they used to.

preview: I was charged twice from August 2014 until December 2014. I called first week in January and was promised 3 credits (Oct, Nov, Dec) because both accounts were used. I didn't get the 3 credits and on top of that I was charged twice again in January. I cal
review:
I was charged twice from August 2014 until December 2014. I called first week in January and was promised 3 credits (Oct, Nov, Dec) because both accounts were used. I didn't get the 3 credits and on top of that I was charged twice again in January. I called again and they credited me for January, December and November. I just called today to ask where my October credit was that was promised to me in January before they charged me twice in January, and the woman insisted I got all my credits. She insisted that basically on the 4th of January I was given 2 credits and on the 11th another that included a credit for a double charge that they deducted from my account for January. I hope I'm explaining this understandable.
Read full review

preview: Netflix listed Kirk Cameron's movie "Monumental" as Documentary, Historical Documentary, Social and Cultural Documentary, but not Faith and Spirituality. This is no documentary, just a right wing religious and highly political piece of real slick garbage
review: Netflix listed Kirk Cameron's movie "Monumental" as Documentary, Historical Documentary, Social and Cultural Documentary, but not Faith and Spirituality. This is no documentary, just a right wing religious and highly political piece of real slick garbage. SO misleading. FOX News tactics, reassuring the base while hoping the uninformed stumble upon it and think it's real. I've complained about this before to Netflix, I'm assured there's no agenda, but this just reeks.

preview: I was having a problem with Netflix, so called the tech department to say Netflix not working. So they asked to log in on my computer to see if they could find anything, then the next thing I know the tech shows me a screen full of error problems on my c
review:
I was having a problem with Netflix, so called the tech department to say Netflix not working. So they asked to log in on my computer to see if they could find anything, then the next thing I know the tech shows me a screen full of error problems on my computer which had not been there before. He is telling me that my computer is contaminated and that it was going to cost me 199.00 dollars to clean it up so Netflix would work again. I knew this to be a lie because several months ago I had McAfee install and my computer has not had any problems with this kind of problem. I told him to disconnect my service and that I would be contacting a regional manager about bad operating practices. He just hung up and I went back into my computer where I resolved my own problem and it's now working fine.
Read full review

preview: Groundhog Day. Plays on TV. Over the air. Is on Netflix most of the time. But of course on the actual Groundhog Day Netflix takes it off. Are you doing this ** on purpose? Is it too much to ask that you update your movies and play movies for the holidays
review: Groundhog Day. Plays on TV. Over the air. Is on Netflix most of the time. But of course on the actual Groundhog Day Netflix takes it off. Are you doing this ** on purpose? Is it too much to ask that you update your movies and play movies for the holidays? If it wasn't for a few shows Netflix would be useless. It's like no one is home until you stop payment. I could drop Netflix 6 months out of the year and miss nothing.

preview: Okay I have always loved Netflix. Yes they are popular and yes they have a lot of stuff there but not new or popular stuff. They need a better selection and update their movies and shows faster. I wait for things to upload but they don't and they have ne
review: Okay I have always loved Netflix. Yes they are popular and yes they have a lot of stuff there but not new or popular stuff. They need a better selection and update their movies and shows faster. I wait for things to upload but they don't and they have newer movies but they're the ones nobody wants to see. They’re the cheesy ones or just stupid and they don't have movie suggestion spot on the site. I just don't like it that much. It's a great basis idea but it has more to it. Get more selection, please.

preview: For the past several weeks Netflix has sent out DVD's at least a day later than they stated. This slow down has been consistent and I believe it is purposeful and reduces the number of movies your membership used to receive.
review: For the past several weeks Netflix has sent out DVD's at least a day later than they stated. This slow down has been consistent and I believe it is purposeful and reduces the number of movies your membership used to receive.

preview: Called them about a charge I should not have been charged in first place. Every single time for 4 calls on 4 different occasions was told I will get a refund, until the 5th time I called, he said system is blocking. What a waste of time. Ultimately I hav
review: Called them about a charge I should not have been charged in first place. Every single time for 4 calls on 4 different occasions was told I will get a refund, until the 5th time I called, he said system is blocking. What a waste of time. Ultimately I have up on 7.99 and on Netflix. If they will not be able to credit back they should provide a clear reason and communicate it to customer properly . Instead they tell the customer lie so that they get good reviews at the end of the call, but the issue remains unresolved ultimately.

preview: I have Internet connection, as I a can watch YouTube. But try and use a paid for service like Netflix, no go. 3 out of 4 days it cannot connect. Call, they tell you to unplug all devices and try again. Are you serious? It didn't work the 1st three times,
review: I have Internet connection, as I a can watch YouTube. But try and use a paid for service like Netflix, no go. 3 out of 4 days it cannot connect. Call, they tell you to unplug all devices and try again. Are you serious? It didn't work the 1st three times, why should I do this again (not that I didn't already try that and save a phone call)? What do you get from customer service? Attitude. I wish all who want this service good luck. I had none and refuse to be treated like they treat their customers. It is cheap for a reason. It sucks.

preview: We have had Netflix for a very many years now but lately we have been experiencing it stopping frequently during movies and show that we are watching. It is so frustrating because sometimes it stops for long periods of time. We will unplug it and plug it
review: We have had Netflix for a very many years now but lately we have been experiencing it stopping frequently during movies and show that we are watching. It is so frustrating because sometimes it stops for long periods of time. We will unplug it and plug it back in which sometimes helps for a short period of times. It is not every night but most nights. Please advise. We feel it is a Netflix issue.

preview: I barely get 2 movies a week. I send them in and they claim they don't get them for about 2 or 3 days. What's up with that? Come on! Getting tired of this. Netflix is making money off me and I have nothing to show for it. Why is it taking so long to get
review: I barely get 2 movies a week. I send them in and they claim they don't get them for about 2 or 3 days. What's up with that? Come on! Getting tired of this. Netflix is making money off me and I have nothing to show for it. Why is it taking so long to get a movie? This is getting worse all the time.

preview: These people are nothing but crooks and downright rude! Double charged me for 7 months and tell me no. BUT why did I get 2 different transactions on different days? I will never do business with these knuckle dragging burglars ever again. For 20 bucks a
review: These people are nothing but crooks and downright rude! Double charged me for 7 months and tell me no. BUT why did I get 2 different transactions on different days? I will never do business with these knuckle dragging burglars ever again. For 20 bucks a month I'll actually own a new DVD every month instead of getting jerked around.

preview: Since October after I notified netflix that for over a year I have had been paying twice each month after it was agreed you owed me 13 months of overpayment subscription fees, you then while I was still on telephone made eight payments one after another
review: Since October after I notified netflix that for over a year I have had been paying twice each month after it was agreed you owed me 13 months of overpayment subscription fees, you then while I was still on telephone made eight payments one after another 5.99 eight times - that’s what showed up on my bank account. When realized still owed me five, I rang for you to sort out each time. Have rang you, have told me a different story, this has been since October 2014! Am fuming with netflix -why can’t you just give me money you owe me. Big multimillion company and you can’t give me forty seven pound back that you owe me. It’s a lot money to me as I have been seriously ill and on benefits.

preview: It started June of 2014 when Netflix cancelled my service because the credit card I had agreed for them to bill was lost and I had cancelled. I was ok with them cancelling my service because I wanted to cancel it anyway due to I did not like their old co
review:
It started June of 2014 when Netflix cancelled my service because the credit card I had agreed for them to bill was lost and I had cancelled. I was ok with them cancelling my service because I wanted to cancel it anyway due to I did not like their old content. Months later I noticed they had been charging me on another credit card of mine that I never agreed to allow them to charge. (I have no idea how they even got the card info.) I believe it was like around Nov. 2014 when I noticed it. So I doubled checked that my account was cancelled, disputed the charge to my CC company to no avail on either end.
Read full review

preview: Only problem with Netflix is movies or shows yall put up there sucks. Put something people will like. I will like to see all Rush Hour, Final Destination, Home Alone, Fast and the Furious, House of Payne, Hair Spray, Friday, Step It Up, etc.
review: Only problem with Netflix is movies or shows yall put up there sucks. Put something people will like. I will like to see all Rush Hour, Final Destination, Home Alone, Fast and the Furious, House of Payne, Hair Spray, Friday, Step It Up, etc.

preview: When I have problems, it's annoying! Starts to load hits the 1/2 way point and just "stalls" there. There is no point to even try, #2 going along fine, then can't connect, try later. Most times I hit try again, it will reload and be ok. Some movies I'll
review: When I have problems, it's annoying! Starts to load hits the 1/2 way point and just "stalls" there. There is no point to even try, #2 going along fine, then can't connect, try later. Most times I hit try again, it will reload and be ok. Some movies I'll get message 10-15 times, very aggravating!

preview: We have been watching the series Dark Shadows for several years. There are 26 collections with 4 disk in each collection, Since early Dec. Collection 23 has arrived broken except disc 2. They have sent out at least each disk in collection 23 8 to 10 time
review:
We have been watching the series Dark Shadows for several years. There are 26 collections with 4 disk in each collection, Since early Dec. Collection 23 has arrived broken except disc 2. They have sent out at least each disk in collection 23 8 to 10 times. We waited for these disk up to 5 months. Netflix bought new ones sometime in Nov. and they all are arriving broken.
Read full review

preview: I signed up for Netflix 1 month free trial yesterday January 1, 2015. I was told that I would be charged after the trial period should I decide to continue with the service. However I woke up this morning to a notification from my credit card company say
review: I signed up for Netflix 1 month free trial yesterday January 1, 2015. I was told that I would be charged after the trial period should I decide to continue with the service. However I woke up this morning to a notification from my credit card company saying a was charged $10.34 by Netflix. So I called Netflix's call center to get some answers, the Rep was not very responsive to my situation. She told me I was charged after one night of my 30-day trial service because their is someone else with my last name that has their service. I asked her "So what does that have to do with me?" She said I was charged because they thought that customer of theirs was trying to get another free month of service. How is this right? How many other people out has been wrongfully charged for this same reason and not know about it?

preview: I just found out that Netflix have been taking out two payments a month. Only one was authorized. When I called them about it they said, I must have started a free trial under a different account and they can only give me a refund for one of the seven mo
review: I just found out that Netflix have been taking out two payments a month. Only one was authorized. When I called them about it they said, I must have started a free trial under a different account and they can only give me a refund for one of the seven months they have been overcharging me. The second account was an account that I had about six years ago and I wasn't with PayPal so there is no way the old information would work. So they linked my old account to the new information and charged me twice a month for seven months. I have been with them since 2012 and now they pull this. I will not deal with them anymore and I would advise anyone that is to watch your account.

preview: It's a real problem, especially when holidays happen, that Netflix is no longer willing to receive and send out DVDs on Saturday. I have been without movies for almost a week now because of the Netflix schedule, coupled with the increased possibilities o
review: It's a real problem, especially when holidays happen, that Netflix is no longer willing to receive and send out DVDs on Saturday. I have been without movies for almost a week now because of the Netflix schedule, coupled with the increased possibilities of mail loss at busy times.

preview: Signed up to Netflix via my Xbox 360 console. Used the service for a few months but found their content pretty poor with very few new releases being added. Decided to cancel which I did as directed on screen, got confirmation that my account was cancelle
review: Signed up to Netflix via my Xbox 360 console. Used the service for a few months but found their content pretty poor with very few new releases being added. Decided to cancel which I did as directed on screen, got confirmation that my account was cancelled on screen so assumed everything was sorted. Have just checked my bank account online to find they are still taking payments. Used a savings account which I do not usually use hence I do not check it regularly like my current account. I will be calling them to complain & expect a refund for the payments taken. They can check, I have not logged in as I assumed the account was closed. Very annoying!

preview: I and my wife have been using Netflix for years now and it has always been good. Last May, 'bout mid month, I got a new Linux machine and continued using Netflix and all was well, up 'till this last week. I started getting this tab on the left side of my
review: I and my wife have been using Netflix for years now and it has always been good. Last May, 'bout mid month, I got a new Linux machine and continued using Netflix and all was well, up 'till this last week. I started getting this tab on the left side of my screen, "Your Newsfeed." It stays there at all times. I called last night and was told it would be taken care of inside of 8 hours. Tonight, 24 hours later, it's still there. I call again. Long story short, they tell me it's on my end. "Why," I ask, "if it had been working fine the past six months, did it show up just this past week? And why did they tell me last night that it would be taken care of inside of 8 hours?" They say they don't support Linux. I say they are lying about what's going on.

preview: I was a long time Netflix customer for many years and a Netflix stock investor. I have DVD plan and back in March of 2013 I returned the DVD as usual and waiting for my next DVD. I never received my subsequent DVD after 4 weeks went by. Called Netflix se
review:
I was a long time Netflix customer for many years and a Netflix stock investor. I have DVD plan and back in March of 2013 I returned the DVD as usual and waiting for my next DVD. I never received my subsequent DVD after 4 weeks went by. Called Netflix several times in April, May, June of 2013 but was told the DVD never arrived at the Netflix center. I was told that if it lost in the mail then the customer will have to pay for it before received the next one. I decided to cancel the DVD in July 2013 since Netflix did not sent me next DVD. In July 2013, I logged into the account and was not able to log in or cancel online. So I called the customer service and told them to cancel it. I was a very happy customer and had recommended Netflix to countless of people until this issue surfaced. Netflix continued to "automatic deduct charges" for the last 18 months despite no DVD send out to me for the last 21 months. When I call today, Netflix reply was that there was no record at all that I called and blamed everything on the customer. I lost trust in this company as a customer and an investor.
Read full review

preview: I just made my account yesterday and today it is telling me that my account is on hold until I pay it because I already had my free trial - but I only had it for 2 days not 30.
review: I just made my account yesterday and today it is telling me that my account is on hold until I pay it because I already had my free trial - but I only had it for 2 days not 30.

preview: Netflix continues to impress me. They may be a large company, but still treat customers like they're a small business. I like that. I had a pleasant conversation with a Netflix rep about the possibility for changing my payment date. Though I understood t
review: Netflix continues to impress me. They may be a large company, but still treat customers like they're a small business. I like that. I had a pleasant conversation with a Netflix rep about the possibility for changing my payment date. Though I understood they couldn't do that at the time, it was nice that they were able to tell me that and explain why rather than having a list of responses and just copying and pasting into the message field (which I wouldn't be surprised if some companies actually do). Netflix customer service really is some of the best service and help you can get. I'd say their help surpasses that of Xfinity/Comcast. Attached is a recent chat transcript so you can see how friendly they really are.

preview: For a few years now I have been getting year subscriptions for my girls for Christmas. I have been with netflix for years and have been happy with them until I tried to get a year subscription from them. After having to call them, as I couldn't find the
review:
For a few years now I have been getting year subscriptions for my girls for Christmas. I have been with netflix for years and have been happy with them until I tried to get a year subscription from them. After having to call them, as I couldn't find the subscriptions in my account, I had to call them. I was told they no longer do subscriptions but I could look up who was selling gift cards and could purchase them. He wasn't even sure who had them but did say he thought Best Buy. I told him that I had been getting my year subscriptions from them, which he had confirmed I had, but said that they were no longer able to do that. He didn't know why and said this must be something new they are doing. Usually you got a discount for buying a year in advance, which ran under $100. But now they only sell gift cards in $30 and $60 increments which with them raising new subscriptions to around $11 a month, you can't even get a year unless you get 2 cards at $60 dollars and one more at $30 dollars.
Read full review

preview: I signed up for a free trial with Netflix. A couple days in, I see my bank account has been charged $8.99, which over drafted me as I only had a couple dollars waiting to get paid. I contacted them first via Live Chat, and a man Jhordain was able to refu
review:
I signed up for a free trial with Netflix. A couple days in, I see my bank account has been charged $8.99, which over drafted me as I only had a couple dollars waiting to get paid. I contacted them first via Live Chat, and a man Jhordain was able to refund me the $8.99. However, since I was over drafted $35, I contacted Netflix again via Live Chat and spoke to Renada. She empathized with me and instructed me to call the Phone Call Center and said they would likely be able to help me. I Googled online and can see that people have received refunds before. On the phone, I spoke with a man who promised to help, asked me to go back into my office (I had been standing in the hall making the call while at work) and I had to Google my local TD Bank's phone number. He asked for their fax, which I couldn't find online, so he took the number instead, and said he would send them the proper information to show them they should refund my $35.
Read full review

preview: Tried the one month free with Netflix. Was unable to access after month was up. Said I need to subscribe so I thought everything was ok, they are not charging me. I was charged for over a yr having never used or been able to access Netflix. Notice I had
review: Tried the one month free with Netflix. Was unable to access after month was up. Said I need to subscribe so I thought everything was ok, they are not charging me. I was charged for over a yr having never used or been able to access Netflix. Notice I had a recurring withdraw from my checking. Called and he said "think of it as having a gym membership if not cancelled." I told them Netflix said I needed to subscribe. Anyways I didn't get refunded.

preview: Netflix added the selection to choose "me" or "kids" viewing when Netflix is opened or when it wakes from sleep. I and many other people do not have kids and will never select the kids option. Yet I must click the selection every time I want to watch any
review:
Netflix added the selection to choose "me" or "kids" viewing when Netflix is opened or when it wakes from sleep. I and many other people do not have kids and will never select the kids option. Yet I must click the selection every time I want to watch any content. It's a useless feature to me. This selection should clearly be set up as an option for people with children. Why bother the rest of us with this. I'm sure parents enjoy this feature but why not allow the rest of us to turn this off.
Amazon prime is sounding pretty good to me these days.

preview: Every night, it loses the movie and frequently will not restart. This is a fairly new issue within the last few months, even though my internet has more than doubled. Fix the issue!
review: Every night, it loses the movie and frequently will not restart. This is a fairly new issue within the last few months, even though my internet has more than doubled. Fix the issue!

preview: Tons of TV shows and documentaries, but new movies are added rarely and when they are, they are older or not current. Also, DVD service is no longer available on Saturday and when you restart your DVD service on say Friday morning, your first DVD is not
review: Tons of TV shows and documentaries, but new movies are added rarely and when they are, they are older or not current. Also, DVD service is no longer available on Saturday and when you restart your DVD service on say Friday morning, your first DVD is not mailed out until the following Tuesday, yet your next billing date is exactly 30 days from the moment they took your money. So they use your money for 5 days and you sit with nothing. Don't bother calling customer service, canned responses, upbeat, annoying youngsters who are either rude or TOO bubbly. Just not what it used to be.

preview: This is the most convenient way to watch tv these days. It's extremely entertaining for children with the numerous cartoons and shows available to them. Plenty to choose from. May not have the in progress tv series to catch up on, but it does usually all
review: This is the most convenient way to watch tv these days. It's extremely entertaining for children with the numerous cartoons and shows available to them. Plenty to choose from. May not have the in progress tv series to catch up on, but it does usually allow the season prior on most shows. It outbeats having to pay for the on demand feature of cable. Our girls love it, as well as the other family members when they come over. Best Service for your money.

preview: Sure, it's only $7.99 per month but it seems like the majority of searches I do come up with zero results. Or else I get a page of various movies or TV shows that have nothing to do with the item I was looking for. It also seems like I get pages of searc
review: Sure, it's only $7.99 per month but it seems like the majority of searches I do come up with zero results. Or else I get a page of various movies or TV shows that have nothing to do with the item I was looking for. It also seems like I get pages of search results of the same content over and over again--most of it new shows that I have no interest in but they seem to be trying to promote. Another bothersome thing is that when I do a search on a favorite actor, the results are their lesser known, lesser successful movies. I think I would have to subscribe to both the streaming service and the DVD service in order to see whatever I want. I used to have the DVD service and was able to get almost every movie you could imagine. They really need to add more options to their streaming service.

preview: On Saturday my son was unable to log in to Netflix and I found my account was blocked. When I called Netflix they explained that was a problem they've been experiencing. He then reset my password but the reset email didn't go out (another issue the rep s
review: On Saturday my son was unable to log in to Netflix and I found my account was blocked. When I called Netflix they explained that was a problem they've been experiencing. He then reset my password but the reset email didn't go out (another issue the rep said they'd been experiencing). I was on the phone for more than 45 minutes trying to resolve the issue when I finally got frustrated and hung up. Two days later, I called customer service to see if they'd fixed their issues. They had and I'm finally on. Their resolution was to credit me for 2 days of viewing. What they should do, is pay me for 1 hour of tech support. This infuriates me and I'm going to look for an alternative to this service. Any organization that has customer service like this company deserves to be out of business.

preview: I created this account solely to tell you not to subscribe to Netflix. I even signed up for the newsletters that I'll never read. I even sold out my social network contact list. If you are looking for a way to throw away your hard-earned free time, throw
review:
I created this account solely to tell you not to subscribe to Netflix. I even signed up for the newsletters that I'll never read. I even sold out my social network contact list. If you are looking for a way to throw away your hard-earned free time, throw it away on something other than Netflix. Maybe fly a kite, take up remote control car racing, collect action figures or baseball cards, just don't go down this road. I'm not going to reiterate what countless others have said about [low quality] selection of films and shows. I'd rather accept the fact that I paid for said selection knowing exactly what it was and still found myself insanely disappointed in the quality of service. Features such as 'my list' where one saves movies they'd like to see in the future is available 'sometimes'. Movies will often load to a screen that literally says "whoops, something went wrong..."
Read full review

preview: Netflix is really a 5-star company in many respects. Considering how many subscribers they have, they do provide outstanding customer support. For example, from the get-go, you call and regularly have you wait no more than a minute and the reps are alway
review: Netflix is really a 5-star company in many respects. Considering how many subscribers they have, they do provide outstanding customer support. For example, from the get-go, you call and regularly have you wait no more than a minute and the reps are always professional and do help you to resolve issues. If you receive a damaged disc, they will send a replacement plus an extra disc. One complaint has to do with the fee for ordering Blu-ray discs. I have a Blu-ray disc player but have never used a Blu-ray disc. I asked if I could order a disc, see if I like the Blu-ray effect and thereby decide if it would be worth it to subscribe to their Blu-ray program. "No. No. Cannot. You have to pay the general fee." What would be so difficult about allowing a customer to try it out, for a small fee? All of that kind of stuff is a matter of programming computers, which shouldn't be like programming a rocket launch to the moon, FGS!

preview: I wish that Netflix would update more often as I have watched many series such as Heartland which I found out has now more than 6 seasons but have not come up on Netflix! I was disappointed at this as series such as Heartland, Heroes, Jericho and more ar
review: I wish that Netflix would update more often as I have watched many series such as Heartland which I found out has now more than 6 seasons but have not come up on Netflix! I was disappointed at this as series such as Heartland, Heroes, Jericho and more are amazing and I would really like to watch more of them! Please update as soon as possible as I'm sure many people are waiting on this. Thank you for taking my comment into consideration. :-)

preview: These past three nights (from c. 11:00 pm on, on 11/1-3/2014, San Antonio, Texas time) Netflix has failed to stream movies. Their website for members stated that streaming was not possible to "all streaming devices." After an unsatisfactory discussion wi
review: These past three nights (from c. 11:00 pm on, on 11/1-3/2014, San Antonio, Texas time) Netflix has failed to stream movies. Their website for members stated that streaming was not possible to "all streaming devices." After an unsatisfactory discussion with the first buffer at Netflix's cust svc at 11:20 pm on 11/3/2014, who tried to lead me to believe that the failure to stream was a result of a "power outage", I asked for a supervisor who informed me that this was not the issue, but that Netflix's entire service to all of the US and Asia was down and that they were working to fix the issue - and, "We're sorry for the inconvenience." For the failed streaming to have occurred three consecutive nights in a row at almost the identical time made me think that the cause is more than just a power failure. Very, very unsatisfactory service.

preview: After signing up with Netflix I had my bank call me to advise of 2 dodgy transactions. Both were Netflix to the value of 2 months subscription payments. My welcome email clearly states that money would not be withdrawn until after the trial period ends (
review: After signing up with Netflix I had my bank call me to advise of 2 dodgy transactions. Both were Netflix to the value of 2 months subscription payments. My welcome email clearly states that money would not be withdrawn until after the trial period ends (22nd November 2014). Subscribers beware!!

preview: The majority of my DVDs are cracked or broken. This is getting old. Yesterday I got 3 DVDs and two were broken. That is 2/3rds. Today I got two DVDs & one was broken. That is 50%. This happens week after week. I called & FINALLY got someone. Because I wa
review: The majority of my DVDs are cracked or broken. This is getting old. Yesterday I got 3 DVDs and two were broken. That is 2/3rds. Today I got two DVDs & one was broken. That is 50%. This happens week after week. I called & FINALLY got someone. Because I was not even getting replacement DVDs. He said I was reporting the problem on the wrong browser. OK...but given that I average about 60% of damaged DVDs over the past year...how about comping me in for a month. OR refunding the fortune I am spending for a month. How many weekends have been ruined because I get broken DVDs. I AM PAYING FOR THIS. Come on Netflix...PLEASE do some quality control. Do SOMETHING!

preview: Netflix used to have great customer service but something has happened and they just stink anymore. I would send a DVD back, the next day I would get an email from them acknowledging the dvd. Then I would get another email that same day saying the next d
review: Netflix used to have great customer service but something has happened and they just stink anymore. I would send a DVD back, the next day I would get an email from them acknowledging the dvd. Then I would get another email that same day saying the next dvd in my queue would arrive the following day. Now I send a movie back and I never hear from them. I report the movie missing then I get a new movie. Sometimes it takes four or five days. Today I called them to ask about this and a woman actually yelled, yes raised her voice, and said we all got spoiled with such good service but they were dealing with millions of DVDs so those days were over. I thought I was being pranked. I read that a lot of people were leaving Netflix for Google Play. I am going to check it out as well.

preview: I've been a Netflix subscriber for 4 years, to the DVD service. I've been waiting anxiously for the Fargo TV series to be released on DVD because they were pulled from Comcast on demand shortly after the series aired, and FX hasn't shown reruns yet. Netf
review: I've been a Netflix subscriber for 4 years, to the DVD service. I've been waiting anxiously for the Fargo TV series to be released on DVD because they were pulled from Comcast on demand shortly after the series aired, and FX hasn't shown reruns yet. Netfllix said it would be available the same date it was to be released on DVD/bluray. I check my queue when that day comes, and suddenly it's at the "availability unknown" bin at the bottom. It gets more fishy. I google "Fargo TV series, Netflix" when logged out of Netflix, and this is what their page for Fargo TV says: "Rent unlimited DVDs, including Fargo, for only $7.99 a month." "Including" Fargo, it says. This is false advertisement, plain and simple. Their DVDs available for rent do not include the Fargo TV show. If I wasn't already a subscriber, I would have subscribed just to rent the Fargo TV series, and I would have been mad as heck to find out they didn't even have it.

preview: The commercial for the infinity programming that Netflix shows during the news is totally controlling and will not allow you to continue with that news that you want to watch. Now, after a few days it has gotten to where it is on almost every news story.
review: The commercial for the infinity programming that Netflix shows during the news is totally controlling and will not allow you to continue with that news that you want to watch. Now, after a few days it has gotten to where it is on almost every news story. Is Netflix an affiliate of infinity, or is Netflix without the ability to hire persons of enough intelligence to realize what is going on. Not only am I fed up with Netflix, but infinity would never get my business, and I am so close to dropping Netflix you would not believe. What is wrong with your company. Do us a favor, stop with that ignorant ad, that makes totally no sense, and play ads that complete the commentary, and allow someone to watch the news article in Toto.

preview: Netflix has this feature that asks who is viewing...randomly and multiple times a day. I am the only one that is on the account...the only one that ever uses it yet I have to confirm with them it's still only me...several times per login. I started a cha
review:
Netflix has this feature that asks who is viewing...randomly and multiple times a day. I am the only one that is on the account...the only one that ever uses it yet I have to confirm with them it's still only me...several times per login. I started a chat with them and they tell me there is no way to get around this...so I asked for compensation for my continued and future inconvenience. They said they could do nothing so I told them I wanted to cancel. Suddenly they were willing to refund the current months AFTER cancelling...nothing without cancelling. So I asked for a supervisor. Got a supervisor who claimed to have read what went on and wouldn't give me any credit because the previous rep had already refunded me...but they only refunded out of a legal obligation after cancelling since I had just made the payment a few days ago.
Read full review

preview: I would never join Netflix because they are robbers and I was overcharged by 25 pounds extra. And I'm honest person and have been telling people not to join them because they will get the same treatment. Still annoyed that the fact they had the cheek to
review: I would never join Netflix because they are robbers and I was overcharged by 25 pounds extra. And I'm honest person and have been telling people not to join them because they will get the same treatment. Still annoyed that the fact they had the cheek to take out 11.98 out of my account each month. And I tried contacting them but did not get any joy because they are based in the us. That was the reason I cancelled my membership.

preview: I signed up for a free one month trial. After a couple of months I decided to cancel. I had problems with it not working, or cutting off in the middle of movies. I called to cancel the service and was told May 2014 would my last month. I was charged for
review:
I signed up for a free one month trial. After a couple of months I decided to cancel. I had problems with it not working, or cutting off in the middle of movies. I called to cancel the service and was told May 2014 would my last month. I was charged for June and July, so I called and was told I was not being charged by them. I called my credit card company. They removed the last charge, and told me to contact Netflix again to be sure because it was Netflix who was charging the account.
Read full review

preview: I used to love Netflix until my recent experience with them. I have asked to receive a full refund of $25 bucks they stolen from me on top of that $3 bucks for decline charges on my account!! I shouldn't have decline charges because I had money on my car
review: I used to love Netflix until my recent experience with them. I have asked to receive a full refund of $25 bucks they stolen from me on top of that $3 bucks for decline charges on my account!! I shouldn't have decline charges because I had money on my card at the time and it shouldn't have been declined. Way to screw people out of money!!!! I WILL NO LONGER BE USING NETFLIX AS OF TODAY. Not only that I'm just fed up with them not having any up to date tv shows with the newer episodes. Also they have the sequels to movies but not the original movie to begin with. I'm just so fed up with them stealing money from me and not being a top quality streaming video site. At least I'm getting my $25 bucks back! I believe they should pay me my 3 dollars back but it's not worth the fight. As long as I get my $25 bucks back I will be happy. Just don't do business with them at all because they con people out of their money with decline fees if they can get away with it!!!

preview: I am set up to pay the 2nd on every month. This month they decided to bill me on the 30th.. My account is now not active and I have nothing to watch on my television due to no cable. I called Netflix customer service and even the supervisor was not able
review: I am set up to pay the 2nd on every month. This month they decided to bill me on the 30th.. My account is now not active and I have nothing to watch on my television due to no cable. I called Netflix customer service and even the supervisor was not able to help me out till the morning when the bank is open and I can put money on my card. I been with them forever, used their so called great service and I can't even get help for one night. How pathetic.

preview: I signed up for Netflix two years ago, and was a happy customer for both of those years. Being in university (and being the primary user of the account), I paid the monthly charge and let my family use it. For the first twelve months, however, my mother
review:
I signed up for Netflix two years ago, and was a happy customer for both of those years. Being in university (and being the primary user of the account), I paid the monthly charge and let my family use it. For the first twelve months, however, my mother was under the impression that she was supposed to pay for the account, and for twelve months, we both paid the monthly charge of $7.99. I called Netflix promptly after discovering this, and I was compensated the twelve months of double charge on my mom's credit card. I was also told that her information would be entirely deleted from the Netflix account system.
Read full review

preview: I was charged $99MXN pesos the day after my "free" trial began. One month later, after canceling prior to the end of the trial, this is yet to be refunded. Netflix say because they can't see the amount in their system, it hasn't been charged (though my b
review: I was charged $99MXN pesos the day after my "free" trial began. One month later, after canceling prior to the end of the trial, this is yet to be refunded. Netflix say because they can't see the amount in their system, it hasn't been charged (though my bank statement shows a Debit to Netflix). They won't offer a refund, nor will they provide a person for me to contact about this. All they have "offered" is that I take it up with my bank. Great service!

preview: Here's my rant for today... Netflix is a horrible company with terrible customer service that doesn't honor their word! Called them yesterday to reconnect service after being put on hold due to my husband's credit card on file being stolen. Well, I had t
review:
Here's my rant for today... Netflix is a horrible company with terrible customer service that doesn't honor their word! Called them yesterday to reconnect service after being put on hold due to my husband's credit card on file being stolen. Well, I had to start up an entire new account because I didn't have his stolen credit card info. No big deal. NATASHA was really helpful walking me thru the steps. She even told me that email account we were using had been so long that it indicated I would have a free month trial to my surprise. Great! Wasn't looking for that, just wanted to reconnect.
Read full review

preview: I don't understand what all the negativity is surrounding a Netflix subscription. I recently signed up for Netflix and my free one month trial. The process was simple, clean, and quick. Name, email address, credit card number. Netflix quickly responded w
review:
I don't understand what all the negativity is surrounding a Netflix subscription. I recently signed up for Netflix and my free one month trial. The process was simple, clean, and quick. Name, email address, credit card number. Netflix quickly responded with a confirmation email detailing when my free trial would end, and when my credit card would be charged and for how much. Netflix immediately activated my account and I was able to stream high definition movies directly to my computer, TV, or Android cell phone. The streaming process was quick, the buffering process was smooth, and the movies played uninterrupted throughout their entirety.
Read full review

preview: I ordered Netflix after seeing they have a 30 day free trial and after the 30 days, if not cancelled my card will be billed for a month of service... Well, MY CARD WAS IMMEDIATELY charged, causing a minus figure in my bank acct and on top of that, it was
review: I ordered Netflix after seeing they have a 30 day free trial and after the 30 days, if not cancelled my card will be billed for a month of service... Well, MY CARD WAS IMMEDIATELY charged, causing a minus figure in my bank acct and on top of that, it was for more than the price... Netflix says it will be reversed back into my acct in 2-5 BUSINESS DAYS. In the meantime I have to stress about getting an overdraft charge. The terms for free trial offer CLEARLY says that card will be charged at the end of the free trial offer.... I’M PISSED. IDKY THEY OVERCHARGED MY ACCT NOR EVEN CHARGED IT AT ALL.

preview: I have been a customer of Netflix for 7 years and they still have the same stupid movies and are horrible about updating their selection. When there is a movie you actually want to see, you get an error code - this movie is not available at this time or
review: I have been a customer of Netflix for 7 years and they still have the same stupid movies and are horrible about updating their selection. When there is a movie you actually want to see, you get an error code - this movie is not available at this time or it is very, very slow! They have no email to contact them about problems. When you call them and complain, it's, "I'm sorry." That's it, no incentives - nothing to keep your business. Soon they will be like Blockbusters - out of business!!! Get with the times and with the competition, Netflix. Soon, you will hear... What's Netflix?

preview: I've been a customer of Netflix since 1999! I'm now going to quit. I'm sick and tired of watching my DVDs go back by snail to their warehouses and not getting a quicker turnaround time. I mail these DVDs back the very next day and it takes almost a week
review: I've been a customer of Netflix since 1999! I'm now going to quit. I'm sick and tired of watching my DVDs go back by snail to their warehouses and not getting a quicker turnaround time. I mail these DVDs back the very next day and it takes almost a week for them to receive them. However, when one is on my queue it gets to me in one day! Why? Because the longer they hold on to them the less they have to shell out for postage. I'm livid that after being a customer for 15 years that I would get screwed like this. Go to hell, Netflix!

preview: I wouldn't be as angry about the games Netflix plays with delaying shipment, if they were just honest about their service and quit saying they offer "Unlimited DVDs". Netflix stopped processing on Saturdays, so that slows everything down. In addition, th
review: I wouldn't be as angry about the games Netflix plays with delaying shipment, if they were just honest about their service and quit saying they offer "Unlimited DVDs". Netflix stopped processing on Saturdays, so that slows everything down. In addition, they delay processing the disks they receive back on Wednesdays. I pay for 4 disks at a time, and Netflix is making their best effort to delay shipments in such a way as to prevent me from getting more disks a week. Netflix, just be honest with your customers, pull the false advertising and quit manipulating the shipments.

preview: Every movie I want to see is "unavailable". I called Netflix and was told that movie selections vary in different areas depending on contracts Neflix makes. I wonder how they decide what areas of the country get the good movies? We have very discerning m
review: Every movie I want to see is "unavailable". I called Netflix and was told that movie selections vary in different areas depending on contracts Neflix makes. I wonder how they decide what areas of the country get the good movies? We have very discerning movie buffs here in the Traverse City area where the TC Film Festival attracts huge attention, ticket sales and membership. It seems that we should qualify us for better selections from Netflix. I have joined Netflix about 3 times, each time hoping for improvement. No luck!

preview: I noticed that my bank account and my credit card had a monthly charge for Netflix. After researching both accounts, I noted that there were 3 occurrences. I immediately called Netflix to cancel one of them and see about a credit or refund for the extra
review: I noticed that my bank account and my credit card had a monthly charge for Netflix. After researching both accounts, I noted that there were 3 occurrences. I immediately called Netflix to cancel one of them and see about a credit or refund for the extra 3 payments that were made. Both the customer service rep and his higher up stuck to the Netflix rule of only granting one credit since it "wasn't their fault". Despite the fact that they received payment twice 3 months in a row for the same household. The manager apologized and said it was their policy. He also said that the customers need to be responsible. I explained that it was an oversight on our end but that they still were paid twice regardless. I would have been satisfied with 3 credits to our account. We have been customers for a number of years. Instead I canceled both accounts and won't utilize their service again. Better luck to anyone else should you have Netflix issues!

preview: They don't have all the seasons of the shows.
review: They don't have all the seasons of the shows.

preview: Constant crashing. Very annoying & frustrating every single day since the installation.
review: Constant crashing. Very annoying & frustrating every single day since the installation.

WHAT HAPPENED - Firstly, the very fact that a million dollar company doesn't have an email address and a complaints procedure is insane.
